Content: What an amazing beach to spend the day. There are nice day beds, good food around the corner and it's nice to see the surfers in the water.
review: amazing spend day nice day bed good food around corner nice see surfer water

Content: Good place to catch some waves and do more extreme water activities. Wouldn't recommend it if you're into crystal blue waters.
review: good place catch wave extreme water activity wouldnt recommend youre crystal blue water

Content: This is a great beach if you're 25 +/- and into surfing and chasing girls wearing a little more than a string.I'm not but I had a lovely walk.
review: great youre 25 surf chase girl wear little stringim lovely walk

Content: During daytime toe beach is soooooo cool with all the surf activities. What a vibes.During the night the beach turns into one big club..... excellent place to loose all stress
review: daytime toe soooooo cool surf activity vibesduring night turn one big club excellent place loose stress

Content: I absolutely loved watching the surfers on Canggu beach. I walked quite a way along, past Finns blaring noise, found a sunbed and parasol for 50k, a few beers from one of the local guys and a good book set me up for the day.
review: absolutely love watch surfer canggu walk quite way along past finn blaring noise find sunbed parasol 50k beer one local guy good book set day

Content: Booked a lesson in the first surf school you get to in the Carpark- they gave me a lesson with Yasno and he was amazing, learned so much from him - had tried a few lessons elsewhere with limited success but this lesson with Yasno helped me fix some errors and really get into the fun of it!
review: book lesson first surf school carpark give lesson yasno amaze learn much tried lesson elsewhere limited success lesson yasno help fix error really fun

Content: I do not like this beach to chill because is full of tourist and rubbish as well I just go there when I want to surf because I am not a champion.
review: chill full tourist rubbish well go want surf champion

Content: Our expectations of Canggu Beach were not to be disappointed. It’s kept fairly clean. The ocean is pretty clean apart from the creeks which would have pollutants coming out from inland.  There are many bars and places to eat as you walk around. A must is BBQ corn. There are very clean toilets opposite Old Mans Bar, you just have to pay 2k.
review: expectation canggu disappointed keep fairly clean ocean pretty clean apart creeks pollutant come inland many bar place eat walk around must bbq corn clean toilet opposite old man bar pay 2k

Content: Stayed in a hotel a 5 minute walk away from Canggu beach and had many happy experiences there. There is a good selection of beach bars/restaurants/cafes along the beach front and this beach is very popular with the local/expat Surf community. When I visited I saw some of the biggest waves I'd ever seen whilst walking along this beach. Stunning place to just look out and watch the sea at it's finest. Would definitely recommend a visit!
review: stayed hotel 5 minute walk away canggu many happy experience good selection barsrestaurantscafes along front popular localexpat surf community visit saw big wave id see whilst walk along stun place look watch sea fine definitely recommend visit

Content: Top up on the suncream if you're thinking of strolling along this beach. Watch the surfers, and swimming in marked safe areas. Watch the tide as there a couple of rivers running into the sea and at high tide getting across may become trickey. Lovely sand. Many places to stop for a drink or a bite to eat. All tastes catered for.
review: top suncream youre think stroll along watch surfer swim mark safe area watch tide couple river run sea high tide get across may become trickey lovely sand many place stop drink bite eat taste cater

Content: We walked along this morning from Ecco up to Legian. Definately a lovely beach to stroll along, especially early in the morning when not too hot. Watch out for some of the waves that thump their way in, and try to knock you over. Able to swim here and yes it is super refreshing , do watch the currents though, very strong. Kids need to be closely watched before they float away. Water is nice and clean.  A great place to get lessons for surfing or if you have mastered it...go nuts, amazing action out there.
review: walk along morning ecco legian definately lovely stroll along especially early morning hot watch wave thump way try knock able swim yes super refresh watch current though strong kid need closely watch float away water nice clean great place lesson surf master itgo nut amaze action

Content: The surf was so huge & messy most of the time, swimmers would just try to get wet & get out, so they didn't get pulled under by the rips.You have to be fit to surf- the waves can be strong & dumpy. More for short boards than Malibus.It was very enjoyable to sit up in the little surf shacks with a drink & watch the local surf competition - they knew what they were doing!
review: surf huge messy time swimmer try wet didnt pull ripsyou fit surf wave strong dumpy short board malibusit enjoyable sit little surf shack drink watch local surf competition know

Content: This road is my favorite shopping destination.  Great shops, plenty of places to eat , more laid back and relaxed..
review: road favorite shopping destination great shop plenty place eat lay back relaxed

Content: Great spot for surfing and swimming or just relaxing at one of the warongs along the beach and perhaps getting a massage or a Bintang. Canggu beach is very pleasant and has the most spectacular sunsets during November and December.Surf instructors available for beginners and board hire. Entry to the parking area is Rp2000
review: great spot surf swim relax one along perhaps get massage bintang canggu pleasant spectacular sunset instructor available beginner board hire entry park area rp2000

Content: If you like to surf this beach is great, good waves and plenty of places to rent boards and get lessons if needed. It's not somewhere to spend the day on a nice beach however, the sand is dirty and rough. The sea is fun to swim in if you like to play in the waves but not have a relaxing time in as it's too rough.
review: surf great good wave plenty place rent board lesson need somewhere spend day nice sand dirty rough sea fun swim play wave relax time rough

Content: This beach is settled only 30 minutes drive from crowded Kuta and is a good place for relaxed days at the beach or even for catching some good waves. There are enough spots where you can rent a surf or hire a "surf instructor", there are some bars and places where you can get a snack.  Along the Canggu beach you can find several good places to stay, villas and other accomodation fascilities with swimming pools, even walking distance from the ocean.
review: settle 30 minute drive crowd kuta good place relax day even catch good wave enough spots rent surf hire surf instructor bar place snack along canggu find several good place stay villas accomodation fascilities swim pool even walk distance ocean

Content: the waves were good in the mornings and evenings, im from Hawaii and had a blast surfing the right down on the north end.
review: wave good morning evening im hawaii blast surf right north end

Content: The area has a great vibe but the beach is not a sun worshipers paradise, it's absolutely in line with the areas surf community... Sand is volcanic, water is quite agitated!
review: area great vibe sun worshiper paradise absolutely line area surf community sand volcanic water quite agitate

Content: The beach is very nice, and absolutely stunning to watch sunsets from (highly recommend!). It is great for surfers as it has fairly big waves (probably a good size for new surfers), but for swimming it's not so good, but overall it's good and I would give it 4/5.
review: nice absolutely stunning watch sunset highly recommend great surfer fairly big wave probably good size new surfer swim good overall good give 45

Content: Ideal place for surfing (or so it seems). The back sand is absolutely amazing and the whole area is nice to walk. Good restaurants and definitely a place you must go even if you do not sure but enjoy a nice view of the sea.
review: ideal place surf seem back sand absolutely amazing whole area nice walk good restaurant definitely place must go even sure enjoy nice view sea

Content: Only for the waves, you'd go.Black hot sand, beaches littered with all types of rubbish & plastics. Bali needs to act now !
review: wave youd goblack hot sand beach litter type rubbish plastic bali need act now

Content: After leaving seminyak we turned heading to Canggu we were stoped by police, this is a known corner! Make sure to always wear helmets! And get a international driving permit from RACQ before heading over also carry small amount of cash just in case police fine you! $30 Aus
review: leave seminyak turn head canggu stop police know corner make sure always wear helmet international drive permit racq head carry small amount cash case police fine 30 au

Content: The Canguu beach area is lovely with lots of surfers and friendly tourists/expats around, and the food/restaurant quality is great! So many areas to sit and eat and drink and watch the pretty sunset at about 630pm. The beach itself however is good if your a surfer but not fantastic for a peaceful swim. The ocean is very wavy with even the shallow waves packing quite a hit and it can be dangerous with strong tides. Wouldn’t recommend taking young children here. Beach can be a bit smelly sometimes too with small river channels coming into the beach along it.
review: canguu area lovely lots surfer friendly touristsexpats around foodrestaurant quality great many area sit eat drink watch pretty sunset 630pm good surfer fantastic peaceful swim ocean wavy even shallow wave pack quite hit dangerous strong tide wouldnt recommend take young child bite smelly sometimes small river channel come along

Content: First beach we went on Bali. Nice surprise.Dark sand, great waves and perfect for a stroll until Seminyak. You can walk for hours and there is a great choice on spots were you can eat and drink. If you see the La Laguna bridge, get inside. Great spot.
review: first go bali nice surprisedark sand great wave perfect stroll seminyak walk hour great choice spot eat drink see la laguna bridge inside great spot

Content: Popular surfing beach with decent breaks.  More accomplished surfers go outside while the inside is popular with those learning to surf and surf schools; can be busy as a consequence.  Super cool vibe though.
review: popular surf decent break accomplish surfer go outside inside popular learn surf surf school busy consequence super cool vibe though

Content: First time to cangguNO NEED TO PAY ENTRACEYou just have to pay parking fee at IDR 5.000 for car and IDR 2.000 for motor, shower IDR 5.000/person, toilet IDR 2.000/personCoconut only IDR 15.000Surf lesson around IDR 200.000 a 350.000 depend how good you negotiateNo sellers force you to buy thingsHope this clean peace beach will longlast
review: first time cangguno need pay entraceyou pay park fee idr 5000 car idr 2000 motor shower idr 5000person toilet idr 2000personcoconut idr 15000surf lesson around idr 200000 350000 depend good negotiateno seller force buy thingshope clean peace will longlast

Content: Too many tourist people, most of them drinking in the bars wich are located right at the entrance. There is a lot of traffic also wich make this beach "stressful" and dirty.
review: many tourist people drink bar wich locate right entrance lot traffic wich make stressful dirty

Content: If you like to observe beautiful sunset , great big waves, sitting on the beach, drinking cocktails from small “ beach bars”  you can do it . Canggu Batu Bolong beach attracts surfers , travellers, musicians and many local dogs. Relax, sit down and observe.
review: observe beautiful sunset great big wave sit drinking cocktail small bar canggu batu bolong attract surfer traveller musician many local dog relax sit observe

Content: The place is nice yet the cleanliness is something that need to be look after to. Relaxing place to be for family
review: place nice yet cleanliness something need look relax place family

Content: I went here 3 times for sunset. I like watching the surfers and the dogs running around like kids. It made me miss my pets so much. I recommend this place for anyone who will be visiting North Kuta, Bali. Best time to come during sunset
review: go 3 time sunset watch surfer dog run around kid make miss pet much recommend place anyone will visit north kuta bali best time come sunset

Content: We were staying at jimbaran and we caugth a taxi to Canggu as we had been told from locals to go there.We paid 200k rupias (one way) and we spend almost 2 hours to arrive there due of the traffic.It absolutely didn't worth it!The black sand beach is small, crowded, and everything is overpriced. Kids could not swim because of the big waves.Went to an italian restaurant for lunch and it was just average and they only serves salad as a gluten free option (my husband is celiac)The worst thing happened when we tried to catch a taxi to back to our hotel. Local drivers are very rude and after a long bargain with a few drivers, we paid 450k rupias for the same trip that we paid only 200k in the morning!We only throw a day of our holiday...Definetely not a place to go!
review: stay jimbaran caugth taxi canggu tell local go therewe pay 200k rupias one way spend almost 2 hour arrive due trafficit absolutely didnt worth itthe black sand small crowd everything overpriced kid swim big waveswent italian restaurant lunch average serf salad gluten free option husband celiacthe bad thing happen tried catch taxi back hotel local driver rude long bargain driver pay 450k rupias trip pay 200k morningwe throw day holidaydefinetely place go

Content: beach has hawkers. vendors with drinks. waves. beds and umbrellas. for hire. a temple. a busy bar full of backpacker types. clean beach to swim in.
review: hawker vendor drink wave bed umbrellas hire temple busy bar full backpacker type clean swim

Content: There is no doubt, Bali has many beautiful beaches. One of them is Canggu. Nice to visit here. The waves are also very suitable for surfers.
review: doubt bali many beautiful beach one canggu nice visit wave suitable surfer

Content: The beach is vibrant and cool with a good mix of crowd. Food and beverage options are great . All together great place to chill hand relax with a nice sunset view .
review: vibrant cool good mix crowd food beverage option great together great place chill hand relax nice sunset view

Content: We had visited this place in the last week of Aug-2018. This beach could be recognized as surfing heaven for the surfers. Across the beach there are some nice beach club, where you can enjoy the sunset with a small piece of drink to great dinner.
review: visit place last week aug2018 recognize surf heaven surfer across nice club enjoy sunset small piece drink great dinner

Content: This is a very cool part of Bali just north of Seminyak and it is becoming famous for surfing with its black volcanic sand and it has cool shops and restaurants. Finns and La Laguna are some of the big name restaurants here. Loved it. Great shops.
review: cool part bali north seminyak become famous surf black volcanic sand cool shop restaurant finns la laguna big name restaurant love great shop

Content: A great beach any time of day but particularly beautiful at sunset. Plenty of places to buy food and drinks along the beach and sit back and take in the view
review: great time day particularly beautiful sunset plenty place buy food drink along sit back take view

Content: Black beach. Strong waves, easy and relaxt swimming not possible. Beautiful sunset and cheap diner on beach possible. Nice music. 13/10 would go again.
review: black strong wave easy relaxt swim possible beautiful sunset cheap diner possible nice music 1310 go

Content: I heard Canggu was a popular spot.  Then, when I got there, I would have to add...Popular Spot if you like tourists.Also, the beach, although beautiful, is not maintained - lots of dog poo and general trash.  If the Westernized business owners decide to invest here, there should be some sort of commitment in their licensing to clean up the beaches that draw people to Canggu.
review: heard canggu popular spot get addpopular spot touristsalso although beautiful maintain lot dog poo general trash westernize business owner decide invest sort commitment license clean beach draw people canggu

Content: Despite the densely populated residential area of Canguu the beach is really pleasant and inviting.  Loads of surfers so enjoy!!
review: despite densely populate residential area canguu really pleasant invite loads surfer enjoy

Content: It looked better than Kuta Beach, calm and far away from noisy thing around there.Local people so nice and help to get direction to find the beach. Worth it.
review: look well kuta calm far away noisy thing around therelocal people nice help direction find worth

Content: If you are looking for great surf, fun restaurants and KILLER sunsets, Canggu Beach is the perfect place.  Easy to rent a surf board and go yourself or find an instructor for lessons. Highly recommend!
review: look great surf fun restaurant killer sunset canggu perfect place easy rent surf board go find instructor lesson highly recommend

Content: I heard the most amazing things about Canggu before I went there so I had high expectations but looking back I feel like I wasted my time going there. I spend 3 days there, 3 days too much. The beach was a big disappointment. Not a good place for sunbathing or swimming (or snorkeling). Just only for surfing. I had expected a relaxing feel to the place and nice bars and restaurants just next to the beach, like in Seminyak, but this wasn't the case. There were some facilities but a bit far from the sea and the restaurants more close to it had very uncomfortable seats and didn't feel cozy at all. I would not go here again.
review: heard amazing thing canggu go high expectation look back feel wasted time go spend 3 day 3 day much big disappointment good place sunbathe swim snorkel surf expect relax feel place nice bar restaurant next seminyak wasnt case facility bite far sea restaurant close uncomfortable seat didnt feel cozy go

Content: Great playa. Great to learn surf.Black send and cool waves. We had a lot of fun in the morning hour.
review: great playa great learn surfblack send cool wave lot fun morning hour

Content: Fabuloud beach. With lots of food and drink options...comfortable seating is available everywhere and the service is impeccable...wonderful surfing
review: fabuloud lot food drink optionscomfortable seating available everywhere service impeccablewonderful surfing

Content: Beautiful Beach, shared a coconut with my wife while enjoying the breeze and ocean waves. Can't find any halal shopes so didn't have any food by the beach, but there are plenty of shopes offering varies seafood meals  with cheap price..
review: beautiful share coconut wife enjoy breeze ocean wave cant find halal shopes didnt food plenty shopes offer varies seafood meal cheap price

Content: Canggu beach is very relaxed. Less tourist and normal prices for drink,food and a bed to lay in the sun.
review: canggu relax less tourist normal price drinkfood bed lay sun

Content: Canggu is a nice beach maybe for Surfers but not as good as the beaches in southern Bali in Uluwatu. Canggu is a nice area for cool cafes and Restaurants and a relaxed atmosphere, but the beach is nothing Special.
review: canggu nice maybe surfer good beach southern bali uluwatu canggu nice area cool cafe restaurant relax atmosphere nothing special

Content: The beach is quite nice but the water is dirty, the locals are very friendly, are lots of hotels and restaurants to eat at and surf schools and surfing but not suitable for kids. Strong currents.
review: quite nice water dirty local friendly lots hotel restaurant eat surf school surf suitable kid strong current

Content: Definitely not the best looking beach , a black looking sand , with rubbish through it , possibly black caused by the volcano ?. Water doesn’t look inviting like other parts of Bali. Had a few waves , hence what must be the big ticket item maybe here .Few bars along the beach , but doesn’t compare to Seminyak.Possibly won’t visit again .
review: definitely best look black look sand rubbish possibly black cause volcano water doesnt look invite part bali wave must big ticket item maybe bar along doesnt compare seminyakpossibly wont visit

Content: Great hip beach. Excellent eats, nice sandy beaches with opportunity to rent surf boards. Try the young cocnuts; refreshing and cheap.
review: great hip excellent eats nice sandy beach opportunity rent surf board try young cocnuts refresh cheap

Content: I've lived in Bali for 10 years now and have to say that I really really miss the old canggu... The hipster surf tourist trap that it's become makes me sad enough to cry real tears. It was so nice back when it was just cows, Black sand, a few little places to eat breakfast, and good uncrowded surf... but such is Bali.
review: ive live bali 10 year now say really really miss old canggu hipster surf tourist trap become make sad enough cry real tear nice back cow black sand little place eat breakfast good uncrowded surf bali

Content: Beautiful beach...flooded with foreigners..lots of dogs are found in the beach..one of the best pet friendly beaches.Sunset is spectacular.Many restaurants and bars are nearby..local as well as continental and Asian cuisine is available with loud music.
review: beautiful beachflooded foreignerslots dog find beachone best pet friendly beachessunset spectacularmany restaurant bar nearbylocal well continental asian cuisine available loud music

Content: Frequented by top surfers. Black sand and beach not particularly clean as no beach cleaning system in place.
review: frequent top surfer black sand particularly clean clean system place

Content: Canggu is such an amazing gem- bustling with cafe's, great eats and people- behind it's seemingly countryside look. You will be walking along encountering cows and local farmlife- and next minute you stumble across small cafes and restaurants and will be served the meal of your life. We extended our stay there- ditched other destinations, came back before leaving- and even contempleted extending our flight home- just because we were so smitten with Canggu
review: canggu amaze gem bustle cafes great eats people behind seemingly countryside look will walk along encounter cow local farmlife next minute stumble across small cafe restaurant will serve meal life extend stay ditched destination come back leave even contempleted extend flight home smitten canggu

Content: Good place for relaxing on the deck chairs or doing some surf.The waves were high in the morning but the sea was calmer in the afternoon.I paid 50.000 IDR for a full day renting of a deck chair.There are many places were you can get drinks: beers, coconuts...
review: good place relax deck chair surfthe wave high morning sea calmer afternooni pay 50000 idr full day rent deck chairthere many place drink beer coconut

Content: We really love staying here,  usually closer to Pererenen Beach.  Over there its quiter and calmer,  but still close enough to great eating spots and beaches.  We will stay here again.
review: really love stay usually closer pererenen quiter calmer still close enough great eat spots beach will stay

Content: Although we do not surf this beach is fab and lovely surrounding restaurants and a lot quieter than Kuta and Seminyak.
review: although surf fab lovely surround restaurant lot quiet kuta seminyak

Content: Beautiful place to meet a lot of cool people and to start surfing. In some days there is a very big Party in the Evening. I will defenetly Come back to this place.
review: beautiful place meet lot cool people start surf day big party evening will defenetly come back place

Content: Nice quiet beach, great watching the fishing boats come in each day. Lots of surfers and nice little cafes overlooking the beach
review: nice quiet great watch fishing boat come day lot surfer nice little cafe overlook

Content: So peaceful and easy to find quiet time especially in the mornings. Great bars and cafes.  A walk from our fabulous villa down a quiet street also filled with fab organic and healthy cafes and yoga studio. It’s so peaceful here.
review: peaceful easy find quiet time especially morning great bar cafes walk fabulous villa quiet street fill fab organic healthy cafe yoga studio peaceful

Content: It’s clear that this was once a beautiful place to visit as Bali culture is beautiful but unfortunately it’s been overrun with Starbucks, drunk tourists, and westerners with no respect.  The locals are still friendly but if you travel all the way to Bali but need to have everything convenience of western life, do everyone a favor and stay home.
review: clear beautiful place visit bali culture beautiful unfortunately overrun starbucks drink tourist westerner respect local still friendly travel way bali need everything convenience western life everyone favor stay home

Content: Great surfing beach but not well suited to children or sun bathing as dramatic waves and rocky foreshore.  Good for wave and surf watching.Cluster of small bars at one end and bbq restaurants at the other.
review: great surf well suit child sun bath dramatic wave rocky foreshore good wave surf watchingcluster small bar one end bbq restaurant

Content: You can rent surfboards for 50,000 for 2 hours. Easy rolling waves, but gets crowded. There's a good club Old Man's for evening after surf fun.
review: rent surfboard 50000 2 hour easy roll wave get crowded there good club old man even surf fun

Content: Good just for surfing. Not clean and relaxing. You can take a surf in the rentals points, with all equipment
review: good surf clean relax take surf rental point equipment

Content: If you are surfing, then Canggu Beach is one of the spots you have to go to. Otherwise, it has no specific interest. The beach can get a bit dirty. One of the issues being the dogs that are wandering and using the beach as their toilets,
review: surf canggu one spot go specific interest bit dirty one issue dog wander use toilet

Content: We visited Canggu (awesome place) for the first time in Oct 2018. Decided to check out the beach as it was walking distance from our Villa. It might be great for Surfing but it is NOT FOR KIDS!  We had 2 toddlers age 3 and 4 with us. The beach sand is black (tiny, tiny rocks that shine in the sun like gems, very pretty but heats up so much you can't really walk on it! it's that hot! Also sticks everywhere and gets in your cloths (our kids rashies still got some of the sand stuck inside the fabric even after weekly washing for a year!) The waves are way to rough! Our house keep told us scary stories how some tourists have lost their toddlers to the sea! I can imagine that as it would take seconds! so i you do visit keep alert!    I must say there was no rubbish on the beach itself! There were some guys you could rent a sun bed from (bargain with them!) also a guy who sold some cold water and  Bintang beer :)   No life guards!
review: visit canggu awesome place first time oct 2018 decide check walk distance villa might great surf kid 2 toddler age 3 4 u sand black tiny tiny rock shine sun gem pretty heat much cant really walk hot stick everywhere get cloths kid rashies still get sand stick inside fabric even weekly wash year wave way rough house keep tell u scary story tourists lose toddler sea imagine take second visit keep alert must say rubbish guy rent sun bed bargain guy sell cold water bintang beer life guard

Content: Really cool place and vibe. Lots of fun places to sit and eat. Lots of places to lounge in the sun and a good surf beach too.
review: really cool place vibe lot fun place sit eat lot place lounge sun good surf

Content: It’s a nice & cozy hotel. Hotel staffs are helpful. There was a day that my room was cleaned twice. Staffs take off their shoes during  cleaning process. I was disappointed when it comes to pillow. Pillows were dirty full of brown spot, I was asking for clean pillows but still get the pillow with brown spot. It would be better if hotel has spare clean pillow to replace the dirty ones.
review: nice cozy hotel hotel staff helpful day room clean twice staff take shoe clean process disappoint come pillow pillow dirty full brown spot ask clean pillow still pillow brown spot well hotel spare clean pillow replace dirty one

Content: We stayed outside Canggu so only came to the beach a couple of times.  Very large and super busy but excellent for surfing and large area of sand and good access into the sea.  We hired two loungers and a brolly.Good way to pass half a day chilling
review: stay outside canggu come couple time large super busy excellent surf large area sand good access sea hire two lounger brollygood way pas half day chill

Content: It's so crowded for surfing, even when you get out at first light. And when it gets crowded it gets competitive. I had more fun at other breaks and the beach isn't so beautiful either.
review: crowd surf even first light get crowd get competitive fun break isnt beautiful either

Content: The Beach is not quiet, but clean enough, I entered from the gate next to Finn's Club.It has many coconut stalls, you can pick one and lay down on the bean bag they provide. the coconut price is Rp. 20.000 (approx. USD 1,5).
review: quiet clean enough entered gate next finns clubit many coconut stall pick one lay bean bag provide coconut price rp 20000 approx usd 15

Content: If you want to surf while in Bali, this is the beach to come to. Also a great spot to hang out and lounge in the sun and enjoy the gentle breeze through the heat. Nice views of other parts of Bali in the distance as well.
review: want surf bali come great spot hang lounge sun enjoy gentle breeze heat nice view part bali distance well

Content: Its my first beach i saw at bali. For me its avarage in comparison of Malaysia or Thailand... but i seems to be perfect to learn how to surf.
review: first saw bali avarage comparison malaysia thailand seem perfect learn surf

Content: This is probably the dirtiest beach I've ever been too. So much rubbish on the beach and in the water. Having said that though in my week here I have seen a lot of clean up teams trying to tidy this filth up, that's good to see. But I do have to mention all the stray dogs on the beach that are intimidating. They are not aggressive yet but I won't be long. Makes it difficult to enjoy your morning runs.
review: probably dirty ive much rubbish water say though week see lot clean team try tidy filth thats good see mention stray dog intimidate aggressive yet wont long make difficult enjoy morning run

Content: Nice beach with tons of surfers, but the beach itself is not accessible by wheelchair due to steep stairs. It's nice to watch the surfers at sunset from the boardwalk and have a drink or bite at "old man" bar. That as sort of an accessible toilet for small wheelchairs.
review: nice ton surfer accessible wheelchair due steep stair nice watch surfer sunset boardwalk drink bite old man bar sort accessible toilet small wheelchair

Content: If your staying in Canggu it’s not a bad spot, a fair trip from other tourist centres and old style Bali with open drains and rough roads. Beach is small but the outlook with the volcanic rock breaks and  volcanic sand beach is something different. Lots of new private places being built with rice paddies and cows next door.
review: stay canggu bad spot fair trip tourist centre old style bali open drain rough road small outlook volcanic rock break volcanic sand something different lots new private place build rice paddy cow next door

Content: Echo beach club has great seafood and is right on the beach! The lobster is to die for! I will be dining there again next time I go there as it is such good food and great value. Cocktails are also great.
review: echo club great seafood right lobster die will din next time go good food great value cocktails great

Content: We stood in Canggu village in a nice villa and went to Canggu Beach. We were very disappointed and we didn't expect a perfect beach. We were looking for a relaxed beach with a few people. The beach was very dirty, with rubbish from local people but also from tourists. The surfers like the good waves, but for the rest there is nothing. We would not recommand it at all. On the way to the beach are some very nice restaurants and bars. Stopp there for lunch or dinner and go to Echo Beach, it's a little bit better.

Content: Not your typical tropical beach that looks like paradise, but there aren´t crowds, and it is pretty quiet. Good for beginner surfers as there are many breaks around, even though the crowds can be huge ate sunset, which is also worth watching.
review: typical tropical look paradise arent crowd pretty quiet good beginner surfer many break around even though crowds huge ate sunset worth watch

Content: A great place to get away from the hustle & bustle of Kuta or Seminyak. Great restaurants, nice places to stay, surf beach..
review: great place away hustle bustle kuta seminyak great restaurant nice place stay surf

Content: A wide selection of reefs and breaks that allow you to get the most out of your trip away from Kuta.  A good community of restaurants and proximity to Seminyak for a little city life make Canggu a great region to explore.
review: wide selection reef break allow trip away kuta good community restaurant proximity seminyak little city life make canggu great region explore

Content: People say it's the place beach to surf. You can also just relax if you want to and get a sun bed for 20/25k, negotiate always! Loads of spots that you can rent a surf board and get a teacher if you're interested in learning how to surf.
review: people say place surf relax want sun bed 2025k negotiate always load spots rent surf board teacher youre interested learning surf

Content: Great beach for a sunset, but there is often a lot of trash after rain storms. Good place to surf, chill and have a beer or listen to music from Finn's Beach Club
review: great sunset often lot trash rain storm good place surf chill beer listen music finn club

Content: I don't understand the appeal. I'm sure you can find a better beach to surf at. This was officially the dirtiest beach I have ever seen and I have seen a lot of beaches. We stayed one night and left for Ubud.

Content: Perfect waves, surf board rentals and lessons, photographers to capture your surfing experiences, amazing restaurants and cafes, great beach atmosphere.

Content: The place is beautiful lovely village feel and quirky stuff happening all around. Because it is being developed its not quite at the standards of Seminyak etc.. I found out the hard way walking on a footpath that had a drain cover taken off, it was pitch black about 9pm, no street lights or other lightning.. We thought it safer on the footpath than the road, fell straight down the drain.  Oops. This was in the main rod down to the beach. Get a taxi.

Content: Nice place to stay if you wanna watch the sunset, people go here to surf too. We stayed at a beach front restaurant so we could watch the sunset without the hassle of where to stay.One downside is going and leaving here. There is a local conflict between Grab/GoJek/BlueBird and local taxis here. It is kinda traumatizing since we already booked a grab, and we were already inside the car when a guy in a motorcycle followed us and forced us to go down. Apparently, grab is not allowed in that area. It was scary since it’s in the middle of the night, we were forced to walk to our hotel, and the streets are already dark. No cars/scooters were passing. The guy in a motorcycle was harassing the grab and kept shouting (we dont know the language coz they spoke indonesian).We are tourists so we dont know where to get a taxi (since there are no taxi around) so Grab is the most convenient way, yet somehow, some of the locals cant understand that. Also, if you choose the option to ride them, it is freaking expensive compared to taxi and grab considering the distance is only 1-2km away. They will charge you for as much as 150k. None of us also know how to drive a scooter so we cant rent one (most of the tourist here rent a scooter to go to places since it’s a lot cheaper, cars could be really expensive here)To the local government of Bali, please fix this. We were two girls traveling that time so imagine how scared we were.
review: nice place stay wanna watch sunset people go surf stay front restaurant watch sunset without hassle stayone downside go leave local conflict grabgojekbluebird local taxi kinda traumatize already book grab already inside car guy motorcycle follow u force u go apparently grab allow area scary middle night force walk hotel street already dark carsscooters pass guy motorcycle harass grab keep shout dont know language coz speak indonesianwe tourist dont know taxi taxi around grab convenient way yet somehow local cant understand choose option ride freak expensive compare taxi grab consider distance 12km away will charge much 150k none u know drive scooter cant rent one tourist rent scooter go place lot cheap car really expensive hereto local government bali please fix two girl travel time imagine scar

Would recommend going out at dawn to avoid crowds - and high tide is best for beginners , low tide best for intermediate surfers (because of the rocks/ reef )

If you are in the area, definitely come by. But if you have no purpose coming to the area, I'd say you're probably not missing much.

Content: We were there during low rainy season so it might be totally different in high season. The beach is ok but nothing special for Asian standards. Good surfing I guess, nice waves. Beach suffers from plastic invasion unfortunately. Beach is lined with small beach bars that all look the same and have limited choice of drinks and soso food, no WiFi. Content: Canggu is a relatively new 'beach resort' and few lessons seem to have been learned from Kuta, Legian, Seminyak and Sanur tourist hot spots. No efficient public transportation system, garbage collection and sewers very problematic, no planning resulting in shops, restaurants and other buisnesses popping up everywhere, especially near the beaches and along the -already very busy- roads. I cycled to Canggu several times from relatively laid-back Sanur right through busy Denpasar. Not really recommended. Most Western tourists rent motorbikes and many stay in hostels. Cheap 16-bed dorms are available. Some make an effort to learn how to surf, which is good, though wave ethics are often not included in the training. Compared to the other side of the Southern Bali peninsula the waves in Canggu are great, but they also bring a lot of dirt to the beach. If you are more into swimming, cleanliness and quietness Sanur is a better place.
review: canggu relatively new resort lesson seem learn kuta legian seminyak sanur tourist hot spot efficient public transportation system garbage collection sewer problematic plan result shops restaurant buisnesses pop everywhere especially near beach along already busy road cycle canggu several time relatively laidback sanur right busy denpasar really recommend western tourist rent motorbike many stay hostel cheap 16bed dorm available make effort learn surf good though wave ethic often include training compare side southern bali peninsula wave canggu great bring lot dirt swim cleanliness quietness sanur well place

Content: That seems like a self-promoting axiom, but it is true. Canggu is where Bali gets its reputation as a surf capital in Asia. Yes, Uluwatu has much bigger swells, upwards of 25 feet, but Canggu is where the locals really know how to surf and where they spend a good deal of time.This is a great, non-crowded beach. It has about four to seven Warungs on the beachside, depending on how you are counting. It has a few big restaurants near the rocks, at the end of the road. And it's filled with everyone from locals to Europeans, to Americans to Australians. And there are even the occasional bare-breasted ladies who think it's cool to go au natural in one of the more conservative cultures in Asia. The people are friendly. For the most part the beach is clean. Yes, you see dogs around, but then if you don't see dogs, you are not on a SE Asia beach.There are also cows. Lots of cows. Even cute baby cows every rainy season who like to frolic and gambol in the sand. Respect them. They are very nice cows.
review: seem selfpromoting axiom true canggu bali get reputation surf capital asia yes uluwatu much big swell upwards 25 foot canggu local really know surf spend good deal timethis great noncrowded four seven warungs beachside depend count big restaurant near rock end road fill everyone local european american australian even occasional barebreasted lady think cool go au natural one conservative culture asia people friendly part clean yes see dog around dont see dog se asia beachthere cow lot cow even cute baby cow every rainy season frolic gambol sand respect nice cow

Content: I spent this afternoon at Canggu Beach. It is a fabulous little beach where for 30000 IDR you can chill under a beach umbrella. Hardly any touts sell in this area either. If you head south towards Seminyak, you will also find some nice areas of the beach that don't have any tourists on them.

Content: Canggu Beach is like a contradiction. It should be a quiet beach, it is described as a quiet beach. So lots of people holidaying in the busier resorts go to the quiet beach of Canggu, which means it is not a quiet beach.Canggu seems popular with younger people who want to enjoy the surf and lounging on the beach, there isn't much else to do there.Take a walk towards Batubelig and Seminyak and you will find some fishermen's huts with some neat Banksy style artwork.There is a nice temple complex adjacent to the car park and the area is being renovated quite neatly.Canggu looks as though it's going to be the next add-on to the already overcrowded "popular" tourist resorts, so it's worth visiting before the developers ruin it.Walk about 200 meters along the road away from the beach and find Warung Ithaka, an excellent fusion type cafe.

Content: A private beachfront shared on a wide expanse of beach with strong waves. Many surfing instructors dot the beach touting their expertise. Beach washes up a huge amount of sand bed, which colored the waves with brown sediments while the waves further out are blue. Nice for sunsets and strolling, though the filth and debris washed ashore this time of year spoilts the prestine beach image. Not suitable for swimming, especially with the sand in the waves and the strong waves now (red flags warning).Free towel, beach chair, and ice cold mineral water for guests of Double Six and Courtyard Seminyak. Friendly attendant John.

Content: We have travelled to Bali every year for about the last 15 years in March/ April. Sitting on the beach with a cocktail or beer, listening to the waves break & watching the sunset was romantic & relaxing  before strolling to one of the beach side restaurants for dinner. Sadly our sunset  experience this year was totally ruined by by the absolutely  deafening Afro American music blaring out from Double Six making it impossible to talk to one another let alone hear the waves. We had to walk a fair way to find a restaurant along the beachfront where the thumping music did not intrude. We are not against the  music per se but the volume should be kept within reasonable levels so that everyone can appreciate whatever they have come for. Happy hour by the pool with duh duh duh music is fine for those who enjoy it but it should not be so overly invasive & spoil the evening for more peaceful beach  sunset lovers.   The sunset magic has been lost.......we won't be back.
review: travel bali every year last 15 year march april sit cocktail beer listen wave break watch sunset romantic relaxing stroll one side restaurant dinner sadly sunset experience year totally ruin absolutely deafen afro american music blare double six make impossible talk one another let alone hear wave walk fair way find restaurant along beachfront thump music intrude music per se volume keep within reasonable level everyone appreciate whatever come happy hour pool duh duh duh music fine enjoy overly invasive spoil even peaceful sunset lover sunset magic lostwe wont back

Content: Double Six Beach is located between Legian and Seminyak. I guess about a kilometre strip of beach. During the day it is the same as any other beach but toward sunset and into the evening the place begins to buzz. There are numerous bars along the beach each offering some sort of seating, food and drinks and live music. All at inflated prices with plus plus to cap off the price. BUT if you go you are there for a sunset and balmy evening on the beach. Best advice I can give is to monitor your bill as it can too easy get out of hand. Food is at best ordinary.  If you choose to swim be aware there are quite large waves (Dumpers) which form in very shallow water. Be aware of the rips that form quickly and the odd idiot on a surf board out of control. For all that a very pleasant evening can be had here if you are carefull.

We spent 5 minutes there and ran away. We ended up learning to surf on a lovely beach next to OM restaurant in Canggu and had a great time.

Content: The beaches of Bali are are awful. They are lowest common denominator tourist traps. The beach itself is dirty and polluted with garbage everywhere. If it rains or the wind blows onshore they seriously become like an garbage tip and you have to actually step over mountains of plastic. It's very sad to see the effect tourism has had here. It's kind of weird because millions of tourist come here, they sit there watching the sun set over the sea and they lounge about on the beach as though they don't even see the garbage. I'm from Australia and fortunately our beaches are pristine paradise.p so I just don't see the attraction of Kuta and seminyak etc.  I suppose some people live in some freezing grey part of Europe or some massive high rise in a polluted city and so for them just to see the ocean is an amazing expereince even if it is a filthy sewer.  This beach is also lined by deck chairs which you must pay for if you want shade because they have built  over where all the trees used to be. The guys who own the deck chairs will try to charge you ridiculous amounts of money but the going rate is about 50,000 per person.  All along here from seminyak and further north there are Bars and warungs. They all play really loud music to drown out the neighbouring bars. We were going to eat dinner there and found the entire experience really annoying so we had one beer and left. I like music with dinner but I don't like it blasting and I don't like to hear 3 different musics from all directions.   These bars also seem to be populated with pretentious people staring at their smart devices and taking selfies particularly 'la  Plancha'.  You're better off buying some bin tangs and go further up where there are no bars and enjoy the sunset on a towel with some quiet.
review: beach bali awful low common denominator tourist trap dirty pollute garbage everywhere rain wind blow onshore seriously become garbage tip actually step mountain plastic sad see effect tourism kind weird million tourist come sit watch sun set sea lounge though dont even see garbage im australia fortunately beach pristine paradisep dont see attraction kuta seminyak etc suppose people live freeze grey part europe massive high rise pollute city see ocean amazing expereince even filthy sewer line deck chair must pay want shade build tree use guy deck chair will try charge ridiculous amount money go rate 50000 per person along seminyak north bar warungs play really loud music drown neighbour bar go eat dinner find entire experience really annoy one beer leave music dinner dont blast dont hear 3 different music direction bar seem populate pretentious people star smart device take selfies particularly la plancha youre well buying bin tang go bar enjoy sunset towel quiet

Content: We went to Double Six Beach for the sunset.  We were excited to spend our last evening in Bali watching the sun fall beneath the horizon.  As with all things in the Kuta area, shops outnumber everything but the stray dogs.  Just know, if you go by foot, you'll have to say "no" about a hundred times.  However, the biggest disappointment was how the natural beauty of this beach and those waves were spoiled by the trash and general lack of cleanliness.  That's what really hurts, because we've been around the world before and seen high traffic areas and never seen a beach that had such natural beauty so spoiled by man-made, preventable debris.  It was just everywhere and overwhelmed our opportunity to be in the moment.  Though the clouds obscured our direct view, we wanted to stay in the moment, but surrounded as we were by the trash, it was hard to engage fully.  Even as we went to a bar to sit and have a cocktail, the uncleanliness just followed through.  The beach chairs were stained terribly, if I were a business owner, I'd offer a towel to patrons who would like one, I know we would have used it (the stains were irrespective of the beach bar, which were often placed right on the sand).  We left Bali a bit disappointed that they haven't managed their naturally beautiful space carefully, leaving it to tourists, vendors and stray dogs to manage the trash instead of making an effort to keep the area pristine. PS:  the waves are absolutely beautiful, if you want to surf or splash, I see no reason not to here.

Content: My favourite beach in Bali. I have been here around 7 times at various times in the year. Yes, unfortunately there is alot of rubbish on the beach around Xmas time, but this rubbish all comes from Java and the nearby islands. The Balinese do their best to clear it up - but there really is alot. At any other time of the year the beaches are lovely. A great place to sit on a deckchair under an umbrella and relax. Surf lessons and boogie board hire is also on offer. Drinks service available. A great way to spend the way.
review: favourite bali around 7 time various time year yes unfortunately alot rubbish around xmas time rubbish come java nearby island balinese best clear really alot time year beach lovely great place sit deckchair umbrella relax surf lesson boogie board hire offer drink service available great way spend way

Content: Much better beach than Kuta. Was clean and not that many hawkers. Great place to kick back and have a few Bitangs and grab some food. Nice sunset's also
review: much good kuta clean many hawker great place kick back bitangs grab food nice sunset

Content: Double six beach is one of my family "sunset spot" place.The cleanes, the cafe arround, the ambiance were very nice.
review: double six one family sunset spot placethe cleanes cafe arround ambiance nice

Content: A beautiful spot to kick back and relax. Hire a beach chair and umbrella by day then as the sunsets out come the beanbag sofas, cocktails and live music.Probably not the beach for a swim though, surfing is the option here.
review: beautiful spot kick back relax hire chair umbrella day sunsets come beanbag sofa cocktail live musicprobably swim though surf option

Content: It is really disappointing to see what unregulated development has done to what is potentially a spectacular beach. There is clearly an infrastructure problem which sees streams dumping all sorts of rubbish directly into the sea. This impacts water quality as well as dumps all sorts of plastic rubbish on the beach. This is the dark side of tourism laid bare, and one which all tourists must take some responsibility for. Having said that there are still great opportunities to enjoy the amenity of the beach, watch a great sunset and contribute positively to the environment.
review: really disappointing see unregulated development do potentially spectacular clearly infrastructure problem see stream dump sort rubbish directly sea impact water quality well dump sort plastic rubbish dark side tourism lay bare one tourists must take responsibility say still great opportunity enjoy amenity watch great sunset contribute positively environment

Content: The location is very close from city , you can enjoy the beach and buy coconut water during waiting the beautiful sunset
review: location close city enjoy buy coconut water wait beautiful sunset

Content: Music on the beach at bean bag bars! Great way to start your evening. Half of Melbourne and a lot of Bali will be there!
review: music bean bag bar great way start even half melbourne lot bali will

Content: The sea view was nice with nice weather but it wasn't clean in many places and there was dogs I liked the idea of sitting a while in front the sea but didn't like the idea of swimming there

Content: great bintangs on the beach and friendly singalongs. Nothing is ever to hard always willing to help with a sun lounge and umbrella.

Content: Great beach for sundowner drinks. Find one of the numerous bars on the beach, pull up a chair, bean bag or sun lounger and watch the sunset while having a few Bintangs. Plenty of resyaurants nearby for a meal once the sun has set.
review: great sundowner drink find one numerous bar pull chair bean bag sun lounger watch sunset bintangs plenty resyaurants nearby meal sun set

Content: not too much hawking. Plenty of beach side cafes   Like the bean bag dining.   Dry close to our hotel and walking distance to Gado Gado restaurant. Close to a wide choice of places to eat.

Content: The beach and water was the cleanest I've ever seen. The beach is always full of life. It's easy to get a drink or a boogie board.

Content: When you visit Double six beach be sure to stay for a drink a dusk. They set up bean bags and tables on the shore and you can enjoy a drink whilst watching the ocean and people watching. The guys that look after you are amazing and only too happy to look after your needs. Most of the cafes and restaurants serve great cheap food.
review: visit double six sure stay drink dusk set bean bag table shore enjoy drink whilst watch ocean people watch guys look amaze happy look need cafes restaurant serve great cheap food

Content: An amazing experience, relaxing in a beanbag with a cocktail watching the sunset, a must do while in Bali.

Content: We love that beach which is so beautiful. The beach is so wider and the weather is so nice. that monment before the sunset I will remember it for ever.

Content: Disappointing with the hawkers constantly harassing you to buy something every 2minutes. Sunset was lovely however the area did smell unpleasant. Hired the deck chairs/umbrellas for $7AUD for two people for the afternoon, but the first person to approach asked us for $25AUD. Still, the $7 was probably by no means a bargain, neither were the prices any of the hawkers offered, be they for goods or services.

Content: the beach is busy with sun beds, umbrellas and vendors. we enjoy looking at the big waves and surfers riding the waves is also good for beginners they have many surf schools in the beach you can choose from,  very nice to stay for the sunset when they change the atmosphere and set all the colorful beanbags and umbrellas music and ights with cocktails, we enjoyed.
review: busy sun bed umbrellas vendor enjoy look big wave surfer rid wave good beginner many surf school choose nice stay sunset change atmosphere set colorful beanbag umbrellas music ights cocktails enjoyed

Content: Visited here from Kuta. Take blue bird taxi and go on meter. Quoted 105000 rupiah 23000 on meter big difference. Beach is nice not as crowed as Kuta. Big waves here but safe if you stay between flags. Not as many hawkers thanks be to god. Sunbeds hired out two for 100000 for day haggle. If looking for a beer drink at vendors hiring sunbeds much cheaper than beach bars. La planche almost twice the price. Overall nice experience.

Content: Worth visiting... Take beach view room... Very good break fast. Veg preferences available. Very very cooperative staff.. Thanks to Mr. Vincent pillai n special thanks to Sari for serving with beautiful smile

Content: Relatively  clean beach by Bali standards. Lots of food outlets, with various types of  bean bags on the beach. An interesting place to have an evening meal and watch the sunset. You will need to find a sweet spot between the many music groups and Djs all playing very close to each other. This beach does have hawkers selling various items, but not as pushy as in Kuta. If you are in one of the beach side food outlets they tend to leave you alone. Beware as the tide comes in it will reach some of the bean bag restaurants.

Content: Dirty beach with a constant sewage smell.  Don't know why people spend their days on the sunbeds here.  Too many stray dogs and hawkers.  If you want a beach holiday, don't stay in Seminyak.

Content: Great place to enjoy sunset, get there about 4.30 and pick your bar/bean bag, soak up the live music, people watch and generally enjoy !

Content: This beach is awesome with lovely wavesBe aware of strong undertow especially weak swimmersBeach was pristine clean no rain to wash in waste Would recommend this areaGreat beach shacks with music and food

Content: On our last day of our stay in Bali we headed down to the beach where our hotel had a beach club (basically chairs, towels and umbrellas). At first glance the beach is beautiful with a few restaurant/bar options. What we found as we went for a swim was the sand and the water inundated with rubbish, mainly plastic. We did have a big storm yesterday with loads of rain so I am not sure if the rubbish problem is exacerbated by stormwater discharge into the ocean which is likely. The black beach sand is like mud when wet and sticks to everything. We left shortly after and headed back to our hotel pool.

Content: Nice beach, we can use the sun bed without renting it (not like any other beach). The waves is good for surfing and there's a lot of restaurants to pick if you're hungry. Would give more stars if it's easy to find toilet and car parking lot.
review: nice use sun bed without rent wave good surfing there lot restaurant pick youre hungry give star easy find toilet car parking lot

Content: Best meals while over the ocean, such a variety to choose from.loved them all tried all restaurant s ,
review: best meal ocean variety choose fromloved tried restaurant s

Content: A walk along the beach is one of the pleasures of a Bali visit.Double Six Beach is fronted by Luxury Hotels right to the beach.Dozens of AirAsia umbrellas line the beach along with  beach chairs all of which have a price on them if you wish to spend time.The hawkers are there but not too bad.Always a highlight during a visit.
review: walk along one pleasure bali visitdouble six fronted luxury hotel right beachdozens airasia umbrellas line along chair price wish spend timethe hawker badalways highlight visit

Content: We walked from Double Six to Potato Head. A lovely walk in the ever-present breeze. But it's sad to see such a beautiful location scattered with plastic debris. The debris created mainly by the very reason the beach ( and other areas ) needs to be clean - tourism and all the people and industries that sustain it.There's a simple solution to some of the pollution - the government should ban the single use plastic bags and have a monetary incentive for recycling soft plastics.
review: walk double six potato head lovely walk everpresent breeze sad see beautiful location scatter plastic debris debris create mainly reason area need clean tourism people industry sustain ittheres simple solution pollution government ban single use plastic bag monetary incentive recycle soft plastic

Content: Double six is between Legian and Seminyak beaches. The road behind the beach is open for motorized traffic which means convenient access for people who want to take it easy. There are many restaurants and bars with (loud) live Western style music right on the beach, offering luxury seating and cold beer. At the end of the afternoon it can get crowded as people come to see the sunset. Moreover it is not as hot as during the day.This beach is not a place for peace and quiet seekers.

Content: Had so much fun at double six last time i was there im going again in the next few days. There will be a break in the rain and I'm there. Very impressed with the food but you cant beat the atmosphere with lanterns under coloured umbrellas. Have to mention the double apple shisha and the bands. The lovely happy staff and the waves crashing, its an awesome sunset.

Each beach side cafe/restaurant have the same beach set up with umbrellas, bean bags and tables on the beach and a set up in the middle facing the venue for live performers to entertain.

Content: A very busy and long beach. So clean and relaxing. Lots of different flags with different meanings can be confusing for first timers.  Saw a man drowning and screaming for help, he was not being watched whilst swimming alone.  Ran to alert guards and he was rescued in time.

Content: This beach is beautiful and particularly gorgeous in the evening when the sun is setting.  Very nice also in the mornings for a nice walk.

Content: We actually visited sept 2016 but can't go back that far. The beach was kept really clean, there were lifeguards which, unfortunately, my teens had to be aided by.l as they were nearly swept out in a strong rip. Beach hawkers were plentiful and a bit pushy but it was all stuff we were interested in. Daughters got their braids done for $15 for long hair which was way cheaper than anywhere else and, in my opinion, more memorable for them. We had pedicures and bought souvenirs. Rented a tent but was charged the full day price even though he cleared up an hour after we arrived at 3.30pm. He just laughed at me and said, per hour price so be clear! We didn't get upset, it's one of those things! One night we had dinner st the beach and it was a magical experience. We sat on bean bags around the table as the sun set and the musicians set up. We danced, laughed, talked and ate. Seven of us and it cost around $70 AUD. we didn't let the kids swim at night of course. Renting surfboards was easy, arranging surf lessons was easy. Everyone is geared up for Aussie families. Plenty of pubs around the place. Good cheap breakfasts.
review: actually visit sept 2016 cant go back far keep really clean lifeguard unfortunately teens aided byl nearly sweep strong rip hawker plentiful bit pushy stuff interested daughter get braid do 15 long hair way cheap anywhere opinion memorable pedicure buy souvenir rent tent charge full day price even though cleared hour arrive 330pm laugh say per hour price clear didnt upset one thing one night dinner st magical experience sit bean bag around table sun set musician set dance laughed talked ate seven u cost around 70 aud didnt let kid swim night course rent surfboard easy arrange surf lesson easy everyone gear aussie family plenty pub around place good cheap breakfast

After the sun goes down then the music start up with lots of the bars having live bands. It's worth noting that the traffic around here can get very heavy so it can be worth travelling quarter a mile on foot.

Content: Early morning the re can be some good fun waves to be had here before the wind picks up. There are always plenty of beach chairs and easy to get a cold drink. The sunsets here are amazing, and there are so many choices to find a table, a bean bag and enjoy the good food and drinks
review: early morning re good fun wave wind pick always plenty chair easy cold drink sunset amaze many choice find table bean bag enjoy good food drink

Content: Double six is in a great location for those wanting to experience the real Seminyak atmosphere and night life. The service was excellent and I felt comfortable the entire stay. However the only down side was that my room had a few issues with lighting and technology not working - in saying that the butler had an engineer on site quickly and it was remediated quickly. would recommend for people wanting to experience great hospitality in Seminyak.

Content: Plenty of beds. Surfing available, lots of beach bars and restaurants nearby. Cashpoint machines at at bottom of Jl Arjuna. Nice breakfast at the Trattoria
review: plenty bed surf available lot bar restaurant nearby cashpoint machine bottom jl arjuna nice breakfast trattoria

Content: As far as beaches go Double 6 beach is a true Bali experience in itself. The sunbed guys will try and rip you off by saying 2 beds are 80,000 when you can get them for 50,000. Then once you've actually settled on your sunbeds which granted are very comfy, half of the hawkers in Bali will descend on you and offer you anything from tattoos to pedicures to ice-creams (he was actually a favourite). Even pretending to be asleep doesn't work! We are pretty laid back so it didn't bother us too much but when two balinese families set up camp behind our sunbeds and kept knocking into them we were starting to wonder if we were on Punk'd. The beach itself isn't that pretty but I could people watch all day and there are plenty of beach dining and bar options if sun bathing gets a bit too much. The sea is great for surfing not so much for swimming but there are a few guys offering surfing lessons along the beach if you want to try it.
review: far beach go double 6 true bali experience sunbed guy will try rip say 2 bed 80000 50000 youve actually settle sunbeds grant comfy half hawker bali will descend offer anything tattoos pedicure icecreams actually favourite even pretend asleep doesnt work pretty lay back didnt bother u much two balinese family set camp behind sunbeds keep knock start wonder punkd isnt pretty people watch day plenty din bar option sun bath get bit much sea great surf much swimming guy offer surf lesson along want try

Content: Double Six is a wide beach area between Seminyak and Kuta. A few hotels are next to it but it is one of the more underdeveloped areas of Bali. When we were there the beach was quite dirty, it was shocking to be honest, according to some reviews it has improved a lot it seems. We strolled along the beach all the way from Seminyak to Kuta and it is a fantastic beach walk, and once the sun starts to set even more picturesque.

Content: Seminyak beach is very clean at the moment,  We are here in July 2015. Seminyak beach is a lovely long beach to walk along. It is at it's best at sunset when you can watch the sun go down and chill while listening to live music. Definitely not optimal for kids.

Content: Two and three years ago, this beach still offered a peaceful ambience, as not really much hotel were built. Content: When the swell and tides are right double six has a really nice little beach break. The last 3 days of our stay I manged to get my 5 and 7 year olds standing up and surfing in the perfectly sized kid friendly waves. It's not always like this however and small kids under 5 should be watched at all times. The beach itself is your typical volcanic sand, it was relatively clean and there are some nice little restaurants that you can dine at, sitting in bean bags dining at sunset on the beach was great. I had some nice service of Mahi Mahi there washed down with a few cold Bins you couldn't go wrong.
