Content: This beach was beautiful and jam packed with restaurants and activities.The Unfortunate Issue was Rubbish every where
review: beautiful jam pack restaurant activitiesthe unfortunate issue rubbish every

Content: A must-see if you are in Bali. The restaurants along this beach are cheap and delicious, incredibly talented singers woo you as the sun goes down. Sipping on cocktails under brightly coloured umbrellas and fairy-lights is just perfect!

Content: There's a sign before the beach letting us know it's "garbage season" at seminyak beach from December to April. It wasn't swimmable when we went, there was so much garbage floating around. I would give it a miss during this time of year, there are much nicer beaches around Bali to enjoy.
review: there sign let u know garbage season seminyak december april wasnt swimmable go much garbage float around give miss time year much nicer beach around bali enjoy

Content: Good option Enjoy the nice views during sunset Suitable for coming early or at sunset Sandy nice beach area
review: good option enjoy nice view sunset suitable come early sunset sandy nice area

Content: We enjoyed a couple of lazy days on this beach with our teenage children.  Plenty of little warungs to eat and drink at and cheap surf board hire.

Content: Great spot to see sunset, many spot to learn how to surf, easy to buy drinks and snack at convinjence store, come here already 5 times
review: great spot see sunset many spot learn surf easy buy drink snack convinjence store come already 5 time

Content: Lovely friendly beach with lots of colourful beanbags in my opinion its more of a evening beach hangout
review: lovely friendly lot colourful beanbags opinion even hangout

Content: The beach mainly attracts surfers. There are beach chairs everywhere where you can sit and grab some drinks from beach bars. Garbage can be seen in general.
review: mainly attract surfer chair everywhere sit grab drink bar garbage see general

Content: We were here in March 2017 and the beach was quite clean. We were lucky to be staying at Alila with an Ocean view room so it was great waking up to see locals and tourist having morning walks and having fun. From Alila, we walked along the beach front to Kuta which didn't take long (prob shorter than a taxi ride!) and we also walked in the opposite direction towards Canggu. On our walks we discovered a few local bars (no hype type...) on beach front, so take some Rp with you for a quick stop and support the locals.
review: march 2017 quite clean lucky stay alila ocean view room great wake see local tourist morning walk fun alila walk along front kuta didnt take long prob shorter taxi ride walk opposite direction towards canggu walk discover local bar hype type front take rp quick stop support local

Content: The view during sunset is great. Explains all the beach bar in the area.The beach is much cleaner than Kuta beach and there are less people
review: view sunset great explains bar areathe much clean kuta less people

Content: A beautiful landscape of beach for public to enjoy... there are several beach club along the beach that will ensure you to enjoy your moment and relaxation
review: beautiful landscape public enjoy several club along will ensure enjoy moment relaxation

Content: I was disappointed. There was alot of trash in the water. The surf was so strong couldn't really swim, just stand and let the waves crash around you. Lots of surfers in training, but no real waves for them to ride, waves broke before any rideable curl. There were warning flags for rip currents and if you didn't get knocked down while waves were coming in there was a big chance they were dragging you out! We got 2 lounge chairs and an umbrella for 150k and had it for as long as we wanted. Lots of people walking around selling food and souvenirs.
review: disappointed alot trash water surf strong couldnt really swim stand let wave crash around lots surfer train real wave ride wave break rideable curl warn flag rip current didnt knock wave come big chance drag get 2 lounge chair umbrella 150k long wanted lot people walk around sell food souvenir

Content: Lovely beach at sunset, great cheap bars along the beach as well as the W Hotel for cocktails would recommend
review: lovely sunset great cheap bar along well w hotel cocktail recommend

Content: Very big and lively bech. Huge waves, perfect for surfers. You can hire surf lessons and gear every 10 meter. Lots of places to have a drink in the fantastic sunsets. Nice mixture of locals, tourists, dogs and everything else!
review: big lively bech huge wave perfect surfer hire surf lesson gear every 10 meter lot place drink fantastic sunset nice mixture local tourists dog everything

Content: Great busy beach but the water is a bit tough great for surfers Lots of great restaurants to choose from too
review: great busy water bit tough great surfer lot great restaurant choose

Content: the beach at seminyak just supurb on sunset, walk towards kuta and checkout all the cafes and hotels,quiet, no wind everybody happy lovely
review: seminyak supurb sunset walk towards kuta checkout cafe hotelsquiet wind everybody happy lovely

Content: I went to this beach the first week of April and it was nice! no plastics or trash on the beach as others wrote. I was on the part of the beach right in front of the Potato Head Beach Club. I would definitely go back and the sunsets are amazing.
review: go first week april nice plastic trash others write part right front potato head club definitely go back sunset amaze

Content: Good spot to learn to surf.  Sand is a mix of black volcanic and silica, so looks fairly good and very little rubbish.  Lots of access points on to the beach and variety of pop-up style bars.

Content: Better than kuta beach i loved this place swimming is difficult you just get your feet wet and thats it so dangerous but lovely view and quiet , clean...
review: well kuta love place swim difficult foot wet thats dangerous lovely view quiet clean

Content: If you're expecting beautiful white beaches and swaying palm trees forget it. Instead you get dirty sand (and the sea doesn't look too clean either). No change rooms or toilets, and just about the entire length signposted "for surfers only". If you want to go in and cool off no choice but to ignore the signs. Loads of tacky souvenir shops, eateries and bars plus outrageous prices to hire the deckchairs. On the other hand lots of "Bali watches" for sale, some of which might even still be working once you get back on the plane!
review: youre expect beautiful white beach sway palm tree forget instead dirty sand sea doesnt look clean either change room toilet entire length signpost surfer want go cool choice ignore sign load tacky souvenir shop eateries bar plus outrageous price hire deckchairs hand lot bali watch sale might even still work back plane

Content: Our hotel was just 10 min walk down to Seminyak Beach.  Minus the vendors trying to sell you items, it’s a lovely walk/swim along the beach.  There are day beds you can hire.  A line of restaurants both casual and formal for a great view of the sunset.  The beach was clean.
review: hotel 10 min walk seminyak minus vendor try sell item lovely walkswim along day bed hire line restaurant casual formal great view sunset clean

Content: The dirty beach in colour and with rubbish as well as filthy deck chairs, although the little bars sell cold bitang beer and are cheaper than in town
review: dirty colour rubbish well filthy deck chair although little bar sell cold bitang beer cheap town

Content: Seminyak Beach is a beautiful white sandy beach...grt spot to surf & sunbath & if you wanna a cheap reflexology trust me its worth i after getting stressed on the beach
review: seminyak beautiful white sandy beachgrt spot surf sunbath wanna cheap reflexology trust worth get stress

Content: We were constantly hounded by taxes & people selling stuff. Scooters made walking around Seminyak dangerous & completely unsafe, was pretty scared.
review: constantly hound tax people sell stuff scooter make walk around seminyak dangerous completely unsafe pretty scar

Content: We watched the sunset from the beach and it was beautiful. The fine soft sand just makes you so wanna play with it.

Content: great beach, lots of seating and good bars close by....................................................

This beach is excellent for surfers but not that great for swimming bcoz of the strong currents. Perfect place to enjoy the sunset as well.
review: beautiful restaurant side bar rent lounger pretty cheap price enjoy wave breeze excellent surfer great swim bcoz strong current perfect place enjoy sunset well

Content: I'll believe it when I see it, but I can't imagine there ever being a nice time to visit this beach. We were there in December and it was covered in trash. You couldn't walk on the beach, let alone fathom going in the water. AVOID in December!!

Content: This beach is really nice to look at. Unfortunately the tide works the wrong way here as the waves become stronger as the day passes. Get a beachclub with a pool and enjoy. But sitting on this beach is not an alternative.... there are better places to sit in the sand. After 16:00 you have the best sun set in the world.... so.... take it for what it is, not how it sounds.
review: really nice look unfortunately tide work wrong way wave become strong day pass beachclub pool enjoy sit alternative good place sit sand 1600 best sun set world take sound

Content: Seminyak has got to be the busiest and most exciting beach resort destination in Asia! Although no longer a quiet little fishing village (which I expect some people lament) it now has something for everyone, all ages, and surprises everywhere to keep you entertained and on your toes!Highly recommend grabbing a bean bag on the beach at dusk and trying some of the local cocktails ;) Selfie stick not necessary!
review: seminyak get busy excite resort destination asia although long quiet little fishing village expect people lament now something everyone age surprise everywhere keep entertain toeshighly recommend grab bean bag dusk try local cocktail selfie stick necessary

Content: Nice beach but crowded. Not very good place to go if it is peak season. Good to sit down in evening to watch sunset.

Content: If you are in Seminyak you absolutely must take in the sunset at Seminyak beach. On a clear day the view of the sunset beyond the crashing waves was one of the most beautiful sights I have ever seen. Just be aware, my partner and I went to the beach hoping to sunbathe and learn to surf, neither of which were possible as sunbathing isn't permitted on the majority of the beach (as you would be laid in front of one of the beach-side bars); also the waves are huge so swimming isn't allowed and I wouldn't surf unless you know what you're doing.
review: seminyak absolutely must take sunset seminyak clear day view sunset beyond crash wave one beautiful sight see aware partner go hop sunbathe learn surf neither possible sunbathing isnt permit majority lay front one beachside bar wave huge swim isnt allow wouldnt surf unless know youre

Content: Seminyak beach is one of my preferred beaches in along Kuta. A little quieter, cleaner and you can get some amazing sunsets.
review: seminyak one preferred beach along kuta little quieter cleaner amaze sunset

Content: We would rock up at this beach at the end of a long hot day, and just grab a bean bag in one of the many beach bars and watch the sunset. It's a beautiful setting and so relaxing. The one issue is in some parts there is some mess and waste, this could easily be cleaned up by the local government each night.
review: rock end long hot day grab bean bag one many bar watch sunset beautiful set relax one issue part mess waste easily clean local government night

Content: It is lovely being near the beach and viewing it from restaurant decks etc but I did not like being on the beach so much. We are spoilt in Australia, beautiful white sand so the dark colour was a little strange. I did not enjoy swimming as there was quite a bit of rubbish in the water
review: lovely near view restaurant deck etc much spoilt australia beautiful white sand dark colour little strange enjoy swim quite bit rubbish water

Content: great views for a great sunset.....very colourful with all the lounges and umbrellas and the music is good too...sit back and relax with a cocktail and watch the sun go down...magicial
review: great view great sunsetvery colourful lounge umbrellas music good toosit back relax cocktail watch sun go downmagicial

Content: Seminyak Beach has so many great restaurants but sitting on the beach with a Bintan and watching the sunset is so tranquil.  Beaches are as clean as they can be in Bali
review: seminyak many great restaurant sit bintan watching sunset tranquil beach clean bali

Content: We stayed at Double Six, with a beach front balcony. The beach is nearly always lively. New Year’s Eve the front street is mayhem, which if you love Bali you’ll be used to!We went to the rooftop club and watched the fireworks along the bay, amazing.The beach it self has a rubbish \ garbage problem, some say due to it being the wet season the garbage is wash down streams into the sea. Early morning groups clean the beach every day, but to no avail as later in the day the garbage is back.The water is murky and you feel garbage washing around you.Some hawkers, but not too pushy.Pricing in bars is on the high side, for Bali.There are nicer beaches in Bali for surfing and relaxing, the area does have a great selection of good restaurants though, and sunsets are good anywhere on the west side of the island.
review: stay double six front balcony nearly always lively new year eve front street mayhem love bali youll use towe go rooftop club watch firework along bay amazingthe self rubbish garbage problem say due wet season garbage wash stream sea early morning group clean every day avail later day garbage backthe water murky feel garbage wash around yousome hawker pushypricing bar high side balithere nice beach bali surf relax area great selection good restaurant though sunset good anywhere west side island

Content: Seminyak beach offered great wave for surfing, splendid sunset view, easy access to restaurants and shops in Seminyak, and a chain of restaurants and bars along the beach. One problem is, there is a canal (looks like a sewage canal)near Jl Camplung Tanduk cutting through the beach, with piles of waste around the area. This makes the walk from Pura Petitenget to Double six beach (same for the reverse direction)     a little bit unpleasant.
review: seminyak offer great wave surf splendid sunset view easy access restaurant shop seminyak chain restaurant bar along one problem canal look sewage canalnear jl camplung tanduk cut pile waste around area make walk pura petitenget double six reverse direction little bit unpleasant

Content: Fantastic beach and a great place to watch the surfers. Great beach lounges so you don’t have to be on the sand.

Content: It has the most amazing sunsets and best place to have a drink and some food on the beach whilst listening to music. Later in the night either a dj will play or live band !!
review: amaze sunset best place drink food whilst listen music later night either dj will play live band

Content: Seminyak has become overdeveloped like Kuta and Legain.  It's good for shopping, watching sunset and spending time a bars& cafes.  There are nicer beaches in the north west corner of Bali.  The beaches a bit further away are a lot nice
review: seminyak become overdeveloped kuta legain good shopping watch sunset spending time bar cafes nice beach north west corner bali beach bite away lot nice

Content: Very uninviting beach bit dirty and too rough for swimming.  maybe wrong time of year, but no beach paradise. Loved the corn from the corn seller in carpark beside beach, and enjoyed looking at the local temple
review: uninviting bit dirty rough swimming maybe wrong time year paradise love corn corn seller carpark beside enjoy look local temple

Content: if you want you can avoid seminyak beack as its not that great. south bali beaches are better and if you wanna party then pls goto kuta..
review: want avoid seminyak beack great south bali beach well wanna party pls goto kuta

Content: It's a very nice beach to watch the sunset. It's very popular under the locals as well.Swimming is dangerous and the beaches are not the cleanest but even with that you can have a nice (long) walk.Only big disadvantage I found is that a water out of the city ends up into the sea at different points and it's hard to continue your way without putting at least 1 feet into it.
review: nice watch sunset popular local wellswimming dangerous beach clean even nice long walkonly big disadvantage find water city end sea different point hard continue way without put least 1 foot

Content: Nice beach, not as crowded as kuta. Beach chairs with umbrellas to rent really cheap and nice. Our hotel was right on this beach very nice. Fun restaurants to watch the sunset on this beach
review: nice crowd kuta chair umbrellas rent really cheap nice hotel right nice fun restaurant watch sunset

Content: Large beach, was not too crowded, a few hawkers, some trash, strong waves and currents, beautiful sunsets
review: large crowd hawker trash strong wave current beautiful sunset

Content: Splendid!  Love the beach and the swells. Be sure to take time to read the waves first before jumping in.
review: splendid love swell sure take time read wave first jump

Content: I was disappointed by the beach at Seminyak.  Strong rip tide, Trash and an Algae bloom at the shoreline didn't make for good swimming or an enjoyable time at the beach.  Coarse grey sand isn't really my thing either. I do recommend visiting any number of the beach clubs along the beach such as Ku De Ta and Potato Head. There are a lot of nice resorts on the waterfront, but I cannot recommend that you spent too much time on the beach itself.The area of Seminyak was a great place to stay, and I would stay there again.  Having been to so many other beaches in South East Asia, I was disappointed - my expectations were unrealistic.If you like white Sandy beaches, try out Nusa Dua, or even the pristine ones out by Jimbaran or Ungasan.
review: disappointed seminyak strong rip tide trash algae bloom shoreline didnt make good swimming enjoyable time coarse grey sand isnt really thing either recommend visit number club along ku de ta potato head lot nice resort waterfront recommend spent much time itselfthe area seminyak great place stay stay many beach south east asia disappoint expectation unrealisticif white sandy beach try nusa dua even pristine one jimbaran ungasan

Content: Stunning beach very clean not to busy plenty to do from surfing to scuba diving and just having a beer and watching what has got to be the most romantic sunset to watch with your wife
review: stun clean busy plenty surf scuba dive beer watch get romantic sunset watch wife

Content: Very busy but quite spectacular! Took our young children and they all enjoyed running along the beach and playing in the sand.
review: busy quite spectacular take young child enjoy run along play sand

Content: Not good for people looking for peace or privacy. The beach is dotted with several good restaurants organizing DJ parties or live music.
review: good people look peace privacy dot several good restaurant organize dj party live music

Content: A panoramic beach, black sand, with many walkers. One can rent a sun lounge but do get some quotes before settling on the right one. Cafes are on the beach front. Overall has a nice feel.
review: panoramic black sand many walker one rent sun lounge quote settle right one cafe front overall nice feel

Content: Am I missing something here? We are staying in the middle of Seminyak so a trip to the beach was a must do. Went to the Mosaic Beach club (which is quite okay) but very disappointed in the beach and can't recognise what I saw in some of the reviews! Hot, grey, coarse sand, ungroomed beach access points, strong tides (and I can swim well) and sewage outlets so a walk along the beach is an obstacle course. I like lots of things about Bali but give me Aussie beaches anytime, rather than Seminyak, although I will go back to enjoy the Sunset!
review: miss something stay middle seminyak trip must go mosaic club quite okay disappointed cant recognise saw review hot grey coarse sand ungroomed access point strong tide swim well sewage outlet walk along obstacle course lots thing bali give aussie beach anytime rather seminyak although will go back enjoy sunset

Content: During the night all beaches in Seminyak are full of big colorful pillow, each bar has a live band and all cocktail are very cheap!!The atmosphere is awesome.. That was our first activity in Bali.. A nice mojito on the beach, 30 degrees... What else?
review: night beach seminyak full big colorful pillow bar live band cocktail cheapthe atmosphere awesome first activity bali nice mojito 30 degree

Content: What a shame that what could be a great beach is filthy. Rubbish everywhere and the main entry smell disgusting. The beach is long and pretty is it went for this. Tourist will be more and more turned of visiting if the local population don't start to take a pride in where they live.  There was no one renting sun loungers, why would you to look at rubbishing washing in and out on the beach. There were a lot of surfers so I assume that's the main draw, however there are red flags lining most of the beach indicating rips and unsafe swimming areas. We only visited once preferring to swim in our villa pool instead.
review: shame great filthy rubbish everywhere main entry smell disgust long pretty go tourist will turn visit local population dont start take pride live one rent sun lounger look rubbish washing lot surfer assume thats main draw red flag line indicate rip unsafe swim area visit prefer swim villa pool instead

Content: Dark, hot sand.  Definitely will need to rent an umbrella and lounge chairs.  Beautiful and delicious restaurants right on the beach! Great shopping nearby as well.
review: dark hot sand definitely will need rent umbrella lounge chair beautiful delicious restaurant right great shopping nearby well

Content: the beach of seminyak is surprisingly clean. i loved it there since there arent as many tourist and local people there as in Kuta. I was less bothered here by locals trying to sell stuff. I took surfing classes and succeded quiet well. I guess everywhere in the South of Bali you will find really good surfing teachers.
review: seminyak surprisingly clean love arent many tourist local people kuta less bothered local try sell stuff take surf class succeded quiet well guess everywhere south bali will find really good surfing teacher

Content: When the tide is up, there is no beach sand to stay so you HAVE to rent chairs or beds, there is also too many people trying to sale fake goods, bracelets and more.
review: tide sand stay rent chair bed many people try sale fake good bracelet

Content: Nice beach for walk, sunbathing and sunset with a glass of cocktail. It's not like Kuta beach, this beach is quite.
review: nice walk sunbathe sunset glass cocktail kuta quite

Content: Clean and nice beach with coarse sand. Good for surfing, not too good to swim. A lot of nice places to get a fresh fruit juice at an amazing price. I enjoyed sunsets on the beach.
review: clean nice coarse sand good surfing good swim lot nice place fresh fruit juice amazing price enjoy sunset

Content: A very nice long clean stretch of beach, superb for a good run or even just a walk, If your a guest at SAMAYA u'll have the pleasure of chilling on the seaside lounger sipping iced water or a drink, its bliss…and those moments just stay with you...
review: nice long clean stretch superb good run even walk guest samaya ull pleasure chill seaside lounger sip iced water drink blissand moment stay

Content: John and Jevi run the best chairs and umbrella's on double six.  Just drive down until you get to the "Seaside Mexican Restaurant" it has a blue sign and is right after the circle K.  Enter the beach near there and ask where Gee Wiz Bar is.  They will point you towards the yellow and green umbrella's.
review: john jevi run best chair umbrellas double six drive seaside mexican restaurant blue sign right circle enter near ask gee wiz bar will point towards yellow green umbrella

Content: Looks great from afar. Once there you'll see wandering dogs taking a dump in the sea, litter and trash washed onto the sand from sea. Hassle galore from garbage sellers on the sand. Pretty much sums it up. Oh the water is lovely and warm. Just has dog dump in it among other things.
review: look great afar youll see wander dog take dump sea litter trash wash onto sand sea hassle galore garbage seller sand pretty much sum oh water lovely warm dog dump among thing

Content: Not my favourite beach in the world.Went on an overcast day so that didn't help sell it to me but over all this beach is fine but a bit dirty (rubbish). Plenty of medium sized surf (if that's what your into). Heaps of beachside bars with sofa beds / bean bags for you to crash out. Overall it's ok.
review: favourite worldwent overcast day didnt help sell fine bit dirty rubbish plenty medium size surf thats heap beachside bar sofa bed bean bag crash overall ok

Content: Put this place on your must visit list. Have been here numerous times and has never disappointed. Can be busy but worth the wait.
review: put place must visit list numerous time never disappoint busy worth wait

Content: Nice beach, not the best but the location is great with a lot of beachside restaurants and bars (limited vegetarian options and they all seem to have pretty much the same menu).  Week-ends tend to be very crowded.  You can rent chairs, take leisurely walk, swim in designated area (others have big under current).
review: nice best location great lot beachside restaurant bar limit vegetarian option seem pretty much menu weekend tend crowd rent chair take leisurely walk swim designate area others big current

Content: I walked the whole bay from Kuta (southernmost point) to Petitenget beach (northernmost point). Best place I found for family was just north of Jl Camplung Tanduk (the road with The Royal Beach Hotel). When you get to the beach turn right and about 200 M is a place to avoid the masses, a bit quieter, Sunbeds are around 100,000 Rupiah on the beach (£6)
review: walked whole bay kuta southernmost point petitenget northernmost point best place find family north jl camplung tanduk road royal hotel turn right 200 m place avoid mass bit quiet sunbeds around 100000 rupiah 6

Content: We were quite disappointed by the amount of trash at the beach. We just did a beach walk from Seminyak down to Legian. We wouldn't go here with our kids, not even on our own. It's sad to see places like this ruined by garbage.
review: quite disappointed amount trash walk seminyak legian wouldnt go kid even sad see place ruin garbage

Content: Went once did not go back again just dirty and off putting disappointing there was nothing happening down there would not go back
review: go go back dirty put disappointing nothing happen go back

Content: I would like to come back and learn to surf, the waves looked incredible! You could literally taste the salt from the beach - there were lots of people trying to sell you stuff but they weren't too bad if you just say No politely !
review: come back learn surf wave look incredible literally taste salt lot people try sell stuff werent bad say politely

Content: he beach is 3 minutes walk from the villa and an early morning walk is a great way to start the  day- before the stresses of massages and swimming and reading!
review: 3 minute walk villa early morning walk great way start day stress massage swim reading

Content: We tried to catch a sunset but it wasn’t much- the kids had fun running along the beach! Lots of cool restaurants and bars.
review: tried catch sunset wasnt much kid fun run along lots cool restaurant bar

Content: Amazing, long beach, really good for a long wander and perfect place to see an amazing sunset in Bali.During the build up to New Year’s Eve there was a lot more ‘chavvy’ guests arriving and the vibe changed a bit from chilled out place to party party party!! Would deffo recommend still!
review: amaze long really good long wander perfect place see amazing sunset baliduring build new year eve lot chavvy guest arrive vibe change bit chilled place party party party deffo recommend still

Content: Went here to watch the sunset and walk to a restaurant. Beach was very busy but clean. Had lots of sand.
review: go watch sunset walk restaurant busy clean lot sand

Content: Having good times. Sunset very good spot. Many cafe and good restaurant surround. Facility was quite good especially if you are in anantara hotel or alila hotel.
review: good time sunset good spot many cafe good restaurant surround facility quite good especially anantara hotel alila hotel

Content: Seminyak beach in June was pretty clean and rubbush free (for a Bali beach). It was great to people watch with Ex-Pats walking their 'horse-like' dogs and locals participating in ceremonies as the sun rises. The sand is still pretty grey but the setting is lovely worth the effort of a walk in the steamy air.
review: seminyak june pretty clean rubbush free bali great people watch expat walk horselike dog local participate ceremony sun rise sand still pretty grey set lovely worth effort walk steamy air

Content: Great place to watch the sunset with your special friend.  Can sometimes be crowded during peak holiday periods. In the same vicinity of the beach are a couple of markets and really nice coffee shops.
review: great place watch sunset special friend sometimes crowd peak holiday period vicinity couple market really nice coffee shop

Content: Overall very nice. There are not too many sunbeds in general, so be aware of this. Best is you use a Beach Club (but also there, be aware that you need to be early to get a sunbed)
review: overall nice many sunbeds general aware best use club aware need early sunbed

Content: I like the waves it’s the best black sand and clean with 100,000 rent a chair and enjoy and it’s safe
review: wave best black sand clean 100000 rent chair enjoy safe

Content: The beach itself is great, especially if after some waves....but it really needs looking after...I picked up broken glass on 2 occasions, and the amount of plastic waste coming on shore is a very sorry sight ...apart from myself and one family I saw picking the litter, I see no other effort generally...It’s all of us’ problem and we need to take collective responsibility for it :-)
review: great especially wavesbut really need look afteri pick broken glass 2 occasion amount plastic waste come shore sorry sight apart one family saw pick litter see effort generallyits u problem need take collective responsibility

Content: Visited twice, both times before dusk. Bit cloudy on the horizon so the sunset was not really beautiful although once was pretty good. But the beach itself is great - wide, flattish & genuinely one of the great beaches of my life especially in the late afternoon. Maybe not spotlessly clean but better than those in my Melbourne experience. Romantic & exotic as well as great weather always - quite vibrant too with so many things happening on the beach.
review: visit twice time dusk bit cloudy horizon sunset really beautiful although pretty good great wide flattish genuinely one great beach life especially late afternoon maybe spotlessly clean good melbourne experience romantic exotic well great weather always quite vibrant many thing happen

Content: Very excellent beach with white sands, clean and only 30 minutes from Kuta. Location always be traffic jam on midday.All expensive in Seminyak. We rent 4 beach seats for 400K IDR with hard bargain to local man but he's very take care of us. Many small restaurants and bars surrounding beach, also hotels, shopping centres and spa services.Really made us relax for sleeping and swimming on Seminyak beach.
review: excellent white sand clean 30 minute kuta location always traffic jam middayall expensive seminyak rent 4 seat 400k idr hard bargain local man he take care u many small restaurant bar surround hotel shop centre spa servicesreally make u relax sleep swim seminyak

Content: The public beach is nice and there are a variety of restaurants!  You seem to need to purchase something to get a chair - but you can bring your own blanket and rest on the beach for free!
review: public nice variety restaurant seem need purchase something chair bring blanket rest free

Content: Seminyak is a long beach that merges into Legian and Kuta as you head towards the airport.  It's a wide beach with good waves for surfing and body boarding.  Watch out for rip tides/currents and follow beach flags for safe swimming.  The beach is quite coarse at points with broken coral and shells, so wear your water shoes if you go swimming.The beach has a few local sellers who approach to offer their crafts, a simple 'no thankyou' and you are left in peace - no hard sales chat.  There are a few dogs on the beach too but are often searching for shade under a lounger and not approaching people.  My one grievance is there are a few rivers from the town that run straight into the ocean and appears grey and unclean.
review: seminyak long merges legian kuta head towards airport wide good wave surf body board watch rip tidescurrents follow flag safe swim quite coarse point broken coral shell wear water shoe go swimmingthe local seller approach offer crafts simple thankyou leave peace hard sale chat dog often search shade lounger approach people one grievance river town run straight ocean appear grey unclean

Content: Bali beaches are not clean but they are raked and cleaned regularly. In peak season they are done more frequently, when I went in June they were a lot cleaner.Hawkers are a nuisance but you get used to it, it is their income and means of living.Theives and pick pockets are rife so watch what you carry with you.It was a good time of year to walk along the beach as it was so much quieter with a lot less tourists than in the month of June. In June it was so packed it was uncomfortable.
review: bali beach clean rake clean regularly peak season do frequently go june lot cleanerhawkers nuisance used income mean livingtheives pick pocket rife watch carry youit good time year walk along much quieter lot less tourist month june june pack uncomfortable

Content: great water but watch the waves as they can be very roughnice to walk along in morning and eveningwater is clean and warm
review: great water watch wave roughnice walk along morning eveningwater clean warm

Content: Many cafe/restaurant with sand floor along the beach with many choice off local/Italian/western.Clean beach best place to enjoying sunset or surfing..
review: many caferestaurant sand floor along many choice localitalianwesternclean best place enjoy sunset surfing

Content: The beach often has big waves and is rough, so its not great for swimming. It also has not got the best waves for surfing either, but every now and then the banks are ok. The beach club is very nice to hang out at and the vibe for tanning and having some drinks is pretty cool to. Dark sand and just not up there with many other beaches. More of a party and pic nic spot.
review: often big wave rough great swimming get best wave surf either every now bank ok club nice hang vibe tan drink pretty cool dark sand many beach party pic nic spot

Content: We were staying close so hot this beach several times. Nice sand, plenty of chairs and a great sunset. The guys that rented our chairs also had cheap beer, bonus. The water itself was nothing spectacular, big waves so no real swimming just wading. Surfing if your into it.lots of restaurants along the beach too.
review: stay close hot several time nice sand plenty chair great sunset guy rent chair cheap beer bonus water nothing spectacular big wave real swim wad surf itlots restaurant along

Content: Nearest to the hotel so I went there.. Relaxing water and laid back feeling.. Not many shopping areas along the beach, have to go to the Seminyak street to do it
review: near hotel go relaxing water lay back feel many shop area along go seminyak street

Content: When you live in Australia the beaches of Bali don't really compare to what we have at home. Seminyak's great for beach bars to watch the sunset but it's not the crystal clear water haven that can be found on many neighbouring islands.
review: live australia beach bali dont really compare home seminyaks great bar watch sunset crystal clear water haven find many neighbouring island

Content: Nice and relaxing beach. Next to La Lucciola, Potato Head and other local and international cafes. Night life is lively with many people around.
review: nice relax next la lucciola potato head local international cafe night life lively many people around

Content: Seminyak beach, is not very good for swimming due to the large waves rolling in, however great for surfing, and the sand is course and brown.
review: seminyak good swimming due large wave roll great surf sand course brown

Content: This is a typical tourist hot spot beach in Bali.  Hire a longe and watch the world go by, or more likely come to you to purchase everything you may need on the beach, hats, food drinks and even a kite! The waves can be pretty big so take care and don't forget the sunscreen.  Beachside restaurants are many and vary in style and price.
review: typical tourist hot spot bali hire longe watch world go likely come purchase everything may need hat food drink even kite wave pretty big take care dont forget sunscreen beachside restaurant many vary style price

Content: So much rubbish on the beach, even though people trying to clean it up, but it was a no win situation.
review: much rubbish even though people try clean win situation

Content: Seminyak beach is quite beautiful and differs from Kuta in that is is cleaner and less crowded.  We walked down to Legian for our usual brunch and drink and enjoyed the peacefulness.  There are some great hotels that open up to the beach and generally you can go in to the cafes.  If in doubt, don't be put off by the security guard and ask them if you can go  in.  If you are approached by a hawker, simply say no thanks and keep walking, and they will not pursue you (as a rule). The beach at night is misty with the waves gently crashing on the beach, and I recommend you find a great restaurant that opens up to the beach for a beautiful evening of fine dining. If it is with someone you love, then all the better.
review: seminyak quite beautiful differs kuta clean less crowded walk legian usual brunch drink enjoy peacefulness great hotel open generally go cafes doubt dont put security guard ask go approach hawker simply say thanks keep walking will pursue rule night misty wave gently crash recommend find great restaurant open beautiful even fine din someone love well

Content: No better place to walk and watch the sunset.Try  Walking  from La Lucciola towards Kuta for an hour around 4pm, turn around and head back to La Luche for a refreshing Bintang and Mango Daquari and watch the sunset. What cold be nicer, oh yes, a refill
review: well place walk watch sunsettry walk la lucciola towards kuta hour around 4pm turn around head back la luche refresh bintang mango daquari watch sunset cold nicer oh yes refill

Content: Surf beach. Little bit dirty. Nothing special and wasn't worth making a special trip for. If you stayed next door to the beach u might visit
review: surf little bit dirty nothing special wasnt worth make special trip stay next door u might visit

Content: Good walking sand, warm waters.  Sunsets are great.  Watching sandlife during rising tides shows various 'creatures' and their creative life patterns on the beach.
review: good walking sand warm water sunsets great watch sandlife rise tide show various creature creative life pattern

Content: I loved this beach. I was travelling solo for a bit near the end of my trip and would come here everyday for about 2 hours. Yeah you get bothered a bit, but just be assertive with your "nos" and they'll leave you alone. The water was pretty wavey when I was there, loads of people were about with their surfboards/ paddle boards. You can rent a beach lounger for about 50,000 if you haggle - otherwise you'll be given a flat rate of 100,000. Great views, soft sand, warm sea. What more do you need?
review: love travel solo bit near end trip come everyday 2 hour yeah bother bit assertive no theyll leave alone water pretty wavey load people surfboard paddle board rent lounger 50000 haggle youll give flat rate 100000 great view soft sand warm sea need

Content: The beach is a short walk from Seminkak Square and shopping district. There are umbrellas and lounges to hire and a number of hawkers coming around offering their wares for sale. There are a restaurants and coffee shops near by and a wash down arear to wash of the sand, quite beach good for the little ones.
review: short walk seminkak square shop district umbrella lounge hire number hawker come around offer ware sale restaurant coffee shop near wash arear wash sand quite good little one

Content: We visited in the first day we arrived to Bali and it is dark sand beach with good waves for surfers. But in Bali you have much nicer white sand beaches (Nusa Dua, ...)
review: visit first day arrive bali dark sand good wave surfer bali much nicer white sand beach nusa dua

Content: Gorgeous sunset on bean bags at beach bars. .. lovely lighting and chilled music. Worth a trip down in the evening for nice pics. Family friendly also with vendors selling nick nacs.
review: gorgeous sunset bean bag bar lovely light chill music worth trip even nice pic family friendly vendor sell nick nac

Content: By far the most polluted beach I have ever seen.  Definitely not good for swimming.  The shopping and restaurants are awesome but stay in your pool
review: far pollute see definitely good swimming shopping restaurants awesome stay pool

Content: This beach could be great with a little care and attention. There are several beach bars at night where you can enjoy live music, however some of the acts compete to be heard and if sitting in one bar the sound of that bars entertainers can be drowned out by the musicians of the bar next door. Also the beach could do with a bit of a tidy up. Beds charged at 100,000 IDR for two which you can try to negotiate as it works out to be abt £8.00 and you can get a meal for two for that price.
review: great little care attention several bar night enjoy live music act compete heard sit one bar sound bar entertainer drown musician bar next door bit tidy bed charge 100000 idr two try negotiate work abt 800 meal two price

Content: From morning till sunset and beyond, there is always something going on! Great private beach clubs, or just with a towel and sunscreen, there is no bad way to go!
review: morning till sunset beyond always something go great private club towel sunscreen bad way go

Content: The beach is not for swimming just walk along the beach, dog walking or just pick a spot to sit and watch the sunset!
review: swim walk along dog walk pick spot sit watch sunset

Content: It's a great place to watch sunset and they have plenty of bar and restaurants to chill and have drinks. Music and live band performance make your evening feeling more romantic.
review: great place watch sunset plenty bar restaurant chill drink music live band performance make even feeling romantic

Content: There are some nice hotels / beach clubs set back from the sea front and the beach is large but lacks the intimacy of beaches in other parts of indonesia, such as in the Gili Islands
review: nice hotel club set back sea front large lack intimacy beach part indonesia gili island

Content: It’s a beautiful beach with some great food options around it. Potato beach house club, woo bar, sky garden. Upscale boutiques and restaurants. Semniyak beach is good for relaxing, swimming and enjoy good night life
review: beautiful great food option around potato house club woo bar sky garden upscale boutiques restaurant semniyak good relax swim enjoy good night life

Content: I only gave three stars to the sea swimming in Seminyak beach as the waves are very powerful and the currents are extremely strong. They have flags to mark the "safe" swimming areas although there's no life guard in sight, and given the ferocity of the sea currents, you get easily dragged out to the unsafe areas. I'd suggest, no swimming at all or keep at the shallow area- and if you still want to go deeper anyway, be VERY careful, unless you are at very good swimmer.
review: give three star sea swim seminyak wave powerful current extremely strong flag mark safe swim area although there life guard sight give ferocity sea current easily drag unsafe area id suggest swim keep shallow area still want go deep anyway careful unless good swimmer

Content: Had higher expectation of the beach but the waters edge was covered in plastic rubbish making it uncertain of what we were walking on and definitely did not make a swim inviting - beach in desperate need of a cleanup
review: high expectation water edge cover plastic rubbish make uncertain walk definitely make swim invite desperate need cleanup

Content: Nothing more than a beautiful sunset at Seminyak beach! Arrive at 5.30pm latest and watch a clear view of the sun setting. Extremely vibrant vibe here along the beach with beach clubs and restaurants turning up the music. Expect a lot of people and patience to snap photos with nobody in it 😅
review: nothing beautiful sunset seminyak arrive 530pm late watch clear view sun set extremely vibrant vibe along clubs restaurant turn music expect lot people patience snap photo nobody

Content: Very Clean beach with good sand and less number of tourists. Nice place to spend and enjoy a day.Near to bog and famour reaorts and villas.
review: clean good sand less number tourist nice place spend enjoy daynear bog famour reaorts villa

Content: okay, but as an Aussie not outstanding, not really my kind of beach, villa pool was better, cleaner and more relaxing
review: okay aussie outstanding really kind villa pool well cleaner relax

Content: Pretty beach but as Bali is it’s not an empty and relaxing beach. Nice place to catch the sunset. Not really family friendly
review: pretty bali empty relax nice place catch sunset really family friendly

Content: Great beach to visit to sun yourself - people watch - have a Bintang - even do a spot of shopping ! Not far from Seiryu Villas so we walked down each day !
review: great visit sun people watch bintang even spot shop far seiryu villa walk day

Content: Although this beach is nicer than the beach in Kuta which has litter everywhere, it's hardly clean and I definitely wouldn't describe it as a beautiful beach with white sand as it is often advertised. The water is quite shallow and the beach is wider than many. I wouldn't stay in Seminyak if I was after a beach holiday, but it's ok for a day maybe. Uluwatu is a better place to stay if you want a nice beach holiday.
review: although nice kuta litter everywhere hardly clean definitely wouldnt describe beautiful white sand often advertised water quite shallow wider many wouldnt stay seminyak holiday ok day maybe uluwatu good place stay want nice holiday

Content: The beach was relaxing with it's wide sand and good surf. Great that you can walk along the beach for miles and also call in to visit places all along the way.
review: relax wide sand good surf great walk along mile call visit place along way

Content: Dirty beach.. not worth the traveling experience. It seems to be actually cleaner down in Legian and Kuta.. Rubish all through the sand..
review: dirty worth travel experience seem actually clean legian kuta rubish sand

Content: I have been to Bali a few times and this is the bets that I have seen Seminyak Beach.  It was mostly clean and overall a nice experience.  Love the bars by the beach, I reccomend Ku De Ta.  The beach sellers can be a bit pushy and the banana lounge prices can have a big range in price so shop around and bargain with them.  No toilets unless  you go to a bar.
review: bali time bet see seminyak mostly clean overall nice experience love bar reccomend ku de ta seller bite pushy banana lounge price big range price shop around bargain toilet unless go bar

Content: Big waves so you need to be careful when going out. Water is not crystal clear however is clean enough for an enjoyable visit. Thanks for reading , Shaniece .
review: big wave need careful go water crystal clear clean enough enjoyable visit thanks read shaniece

Content: This is a mustTo wander down onto the beach at seminyak grab a spot at any one of a number of different bars on the beach listen to music add a cold beer and some quality snacks and you are in business one of life's wonderful multi cultural experiencesRecommend as a rite of passage
review: mustto wander onto seminyak grab spot one number different bar listen music add cold beer quality snack business one life wonderful multi cultural experiencesrecommend rite passage

Content: This beach is more for those wanting a quieter experience in Bali. A few music bars compete with acoustic sets along the beach from 5:00pm - 11:00pm but then everything winds down. It’s a shame if your night is just starting.
review: want quieter experience bali music bar compete acoustic set along 500pm 1100pm everything wind shame night start

Content: Visited this beach during sunset. Nice beach to spend some time in the evening. There is live music, it wasn’t much crowed.
review: visit sunset nice spend time even live music wasnt much crowed

Content: Take earplugs for the loud music in the open bars. The Balinese have no idea when it comes to volume. Volume means quality to them, so be warned. . .
review: take earplug loud music open bar balinese idea come volume volume mean quality warn

Content: We stayed near the Double six beach, the beach is pretty clean compared to Kuta. The best is when you swim at the indian ocean while watching the sunset. And of course coconut water.
review: stay near double six pretty clean compare kuta best swim indian ocean watch sunset course coconut water

Content: Great beach day and night.  Take a walk grab a drink and chat to the locals at one of the many beach bar set ups all the way to Kuta.  The restaurants and vendors at night are awesome.  Let the kids buy a night lantern and let it go over the beach for a great memory.  Very safe and a lot of fun,
review: great day night take walk grab drink chat locals one many bar set ups way kuta restaurant vendor night awesome let kid buy night lantern let go great memory safe lot fun

Content: This beach is very nice to lounge around or if you're into surfing. The water is kind of rough but the beach is very pretty and relaxing.

Content: This is a great beach for adults, but it was a little crowded for us to take the kids, as we had some difficulty to keep an eye on them. You can buy delicious fruits and drinks from people on the beach, which is great way to cool off in the heat.

Content: We went there last week as soon as we landed in Bali.The beach is really relaxing and clean, perfect for a beach run or beach walk. Drink prices around the beach are quite reasonable with beer costing around 25000rp which is around 2 dollars. If you are a keen surfer, they also offer surf lessons and beach looks perfect for surfing.
review: go last week soon land balithe really relax clean perfect run walk drink price around quite reasonable beer cost around 25000rp around 2 dollar keen surfer offer surf lesson look perfect surf

Content: When I stay at one of the budget hotels in the area of Seminyak, the next morning I decided to wake up early to enjoy the sunrise on Seminyak Beach.It only takes about 5 minutes to walk from the hotel to the beach.You can enjoy the morning air of Seminyak area.And alsomany people who ran or cycled in the morning.Nice scenery in the morning!
review: stay one budget hotel area seminyak next morning decide wake early enjoy sunrise seminyak beachit take 5 minute walk hotel beachyou enjoy morning air seminyak areaand alsomany people run cycled morningnice scenery morning

Content: We stayed for 2 weeks 12 minutes walk away from the beach at Kudeta Beach Club. Each time we came out on the beach it did not cease to amaze. We walked in the shallows most mornings and evenings and it was clean....so much cleaner than the very public beach of Kuta (Legian) which we did once at the end of our stay. In Seminyak there seem to be more expatriates who live in the area and try to keep this beach clean. One would see them walking along picking up bits of rubbish (not that there ever was that much to pick up). I enjoyed the beach at low and high tide and anywhere in between. Also the beach sellers (which we met near sunset) are a friendly bunch.

Content: Unfortunately beach is full of much litter and the odd syringe. Its a  shame because Seminyak is a quieter spot than Kuta but still suffers from the same issues. More upmarket 5 Star hotels along this stretch and generally a higher concentration of European tourists visit here.
review: unfortunately full much litter odd syringe shame seminyak quieter spot kuta still suffer issue upmarket 5 star hotel along stretch generally high concentration european tourist visit

Content: My Villa was a 5 minute walk from Seminyak Beach and I enjoyed jogging early in the morning during sunrise...when the temperature was perfect and beach wasn't crowded. Very clean beach

Content: The beaches are long and sandy.  Large breaks to shore and easy to wade but not swimming for beginners.  Body surfer would love these shorebreaks and surfers the outside breaks.

Content: Beach is clean, good for an evening stroll. Not many bars around, so it is peaceful. Waves are strong. Some services that offer surfing classes.

Content: Come to Seminyak beach for a sunset.  Get here before 5pm and choose one of the many beach bars to plonk yourself down on one of the colorful beanbags, order some tapas and a Bintang and listen to trendy music while the sun goes down.  Bali sunsets never fail to disappoint.

Content: A beautiful stretch of beach, offering an abundance of bars along the way, meaning you can stop anywhere to enjoy an ice cold Bintang whilst watching the amazing show that is a Bali sunset. Our favorite thing to do in Bali is wander down here, grab a bean bag and a drink and take in the spectacular show that never fails to disappoint.

Content: Great to have dinner on the beach and watch the sunset. Bars and restaurants usually close around 11pm on the beach.

Content: Seminyak Beach is a very nice beach in Bali. Great to walk along - you can walk down to Kuta and for stunning sunsets since it is on the West side of the island. Housing many numerous hotels, restaurants and bars, Seminyak is somewhat more sophisticated than its sister Kuta. It has a decent stretch of whitish sand, and the water is okay. Currents could also be strong so be careful when you swim in here and respect all instructions from lifeguards and the hotel staff. Cool beach to hang out on and watch the surfers do  their thing.

Content: The beach is very nice, a good place for sun rise and sun set. Watching sun set with a cup of drink in the nervy restaurant maybe one of your best choices in this spot

Lots of people offering you to buy different accessories/paintings/toys. This beach definitely needs a clean up! Will not revisit and would not recommend to others.

Content: Great beach day and night .Really good experience to walk along before sunset and find a good spot to sit and have a drink or two whilst looking at the  sun going down .Everyone goes down to the beach on a Sunday night to see the sunset , all the locals aswell as tourists and in the Indonesian school holidays it is jammed pack .Make sure you organize a good meeting spot if meeting up with friends as wifi and telephone reception is sometimes impossible to receive on the beach at busy times .Enjoy the beach its fabulous

Content: I have travelled for many years and can honestly say l have never seen so much rubbish on a beach. even when you enter the water you are walking in floating plastic and any other form of garbage. The locals are only interested in selling you over priced drinks, or renting you a board for 4 times the price you would pay 5 mins walk away to a side street shop. They are not interested in your comfort if you don't want to lie on the dirty beaches of kuta ,legion or Seminyak you can rent an over priced sun bed.

Content: We from West Australia go up here and always ask why don't they clean the beach? the views are breathtaking and people are nice just needs a government to get in with the right equipment and clean the beach every day and not dump rubbish in the ocean. Content: We visited this beach a number of times during our stay in Bali. During the day the beach is covered with lounge chairs and umbrellas to hire (we were quoted $20 for an hour) as well as people selling just about everything. In the evening, the lounges are mostly away, the bars open up and the people flock to see the sunset. The beach is wide and the water is cool and refreshing. It is relatively clean and there is plenty of space for everyone.

Content: You can't leave Bali without coming here! The atmosphere is so amazing, fun friendly faces, so much to see and do, restaurants, bars! Double Six Beach is the place to be!
review: cant leave bali without come atmosphere amaze fun friendly face much see restaurant bar double six place

Content: The water is lovely and warm and the photos posted show a beach paradise with gorgeous sunsets.  There is no question that Bali does have places like this but the shoreline from Kuta all the way up to Canggu has a terrible rubbish problem which comes off the streets and out via the streams.  I do not want to bag Bali as we have had a lovely time and the locals are amazing but do not come to Bali thinking it is pristine clean. I am not joking when I say you should make sure you have had your tetanus and Hep A shots if you plan on surfing or playing around the beach.  Bali is not unique, and this problem can be found all around SE Asia but it does not make it right.  If you are into surfing be prepared for the busy spots at peak holiday times.
review: water lovely warm photo post show paradise gorgeous sunset question bali place shoreline kuta way canggu terrible rubbish problem come street via stream want bag bali lovely time local amaze come bali think pristine clean joke say make sure tetanus hep shot plan surf play around bali unique problem find around se asia make right surfing prepared busy spot peak holiday time

Content: If you visit Seminyak, you MUST catch at least one sunset on the beach! Be sure to arrive about 30 minutes-1 hour before sunset as it can get crowded and things happen quite quickly. I sat near the Potato Head Beach Club along the shore and watched as the sun quickly sank behind the clouds. The colours were indescribable and the view was breathtaking! So amazing! The lucky people who live and work there get a treat like that everyday. I went during low-season so it wasn't too crowded. I highly recommend Seminyak Beach if you're in Bali!
review: visit seminyak must catch least one sunset sure arrive 30 minutes1 hour sunset crowd thing happen quite quickly sit near potato head club along shore watched sun quickly sink behind cloud colour indescribable view breathtaking amazing lucky people live work treat everyday go lowseason wasnt crowd highly recommend seminyak youre bali

Content: I'm not sure how this beach only gets four stars! Sure it's not an Australian beach but it's beautiful in its own right. A great way to walk from one location to another, always something to look at from the peanut seller, to the people hawking their wares (almost always politely), the beachside bars and restaurants, kids and families enjoying the water, day beds to settle in for the long haul of a tough day at the beach, people fishing and completely glorious sunsets.

Content: The further away you go from Kuta Beach towards Seminyak, the beach becomes less crowded and that's one of the things I like about Seminyak Beach.There are a few bars, restaurants, and beach resorts along the beach and also a warung (food stall) along the beach. Warung Cantina and Mosaic Beachclub are located on the northwestern end of the beach. Potato Head beachclub is located more towards the Kuta side of the beach. Closer to Kuta the beach can sometimes stink of sewerage, and that's one of the reason I avoided the Kuta side of the beach. The further northwest you go, the beach is less crowded and more nicer. A good place to see the sunset too. Very beautiful.You can also hire pool chairs and umbrellas from the locals for a cheap price and enjoy the view and the breeze.
review: away go kuta towards seminyak becomes less crowded thats one thing seminyak beachthere bar restaurant resort along warung food stall along warung cantina mosaic beachclub locate northwestern end potato head beachclub locate towards kuta side closer kuta sometimes stink sewerage thats one reason avoid kuta side northwest go less crowded nicer good place see sunset beautifulyou hire pool chair umbrellas local cheap price enjoy view breeze

There's a lot of nice little bars and restaurants where you can lounge around in a bean bag or have a nice lunch with an ocean view. It has the perfect mix of laid-back and luxurious.

Content: I had been told the beaches in Seminyak were stunning so I tagged a few days here onto the end of my trip.  I was slightly disappointed (and shocked) at how dirty they were though. I walked along the beach for an hour or so collecting shells before finding a beach bar to sit and watch the sunset.  In that time I saw a lot of accompanied and unaccompanied dogs ..... and with dogs comes s**t.  I saw more of it on the beach than I've seen on any other beach anywhere.  Not impressed.  In addition to the doggie issue, there were used nappies and general litter scattered all over the place.  There's no excuse for this and I just kept walking until I found the clean stretch I decided to settle at for the sunset.  Needless to say I was very careful where I stepped on my walk back towards town....

Which is both good and bad in its own ways.
review: someone chennai wasnt something write home pretty small short walk sea become dirty didnt seem place offshore activity place bali ok relax sit sand quite frankly find nothing interest good bad way

Content: Seminyak Beach has many entry points.  We entered from the Polis Post in Seminyak (you can enter through Ku De Ta too) or one of the villas or hotels facing the beach.  Compared to Kuta Beach, this beach is relatively free of rubbish, water sports touts and people.  It begins to get crowded with people when you are walking on the beach approaching where Ku De Ta Restaurant is.The water sports costs are more expensive too.  In Kuta, you pay 50,000 rupiah per person (after bargaining) for 2 hours of the surf board; but in Seminyak it is 80,000 rupiah per person for 2 hours.   The beach vendors on the beach served better food though.  We did not feel like eating on the beach so we bought some satay (meat on skewers), fried banana pancakes and meatball soup.  The food only cost us 40,000!  The banana pancakes are 2,000 rupiahs each and the meat satay only 1,000 each! Unbelievably true.
review: seminyak many entry point enter polis post seminyak enter ku de ta one villa hotel face compare kuta relatively free rubbish water sport tout people begin crowded people walk approach ku de ta restaurant isthe water sport cost expensive kuta pay 50000 rupiah per person bargain 2 hour surf board seminyak 80000 rupiah per person 2 hour vendor serve well food though feel eat buy satay meat skewer fry banana pancake meatball soup food cost u 40000 banana pancake 2000 rupiah meat satay 1000 unbelievably true

Content: I visited the place with our little one.Big beach with lots of good surf. Days of wave did alternate so easy wave days were good for the little ones to paddle and stay safe.Disappointed though with the cleanness of the beach. Rubbish floating around the waters edge.Also  certain parts smelt so a sewage outlet may have been near by.The beaches volcanic residue means bathing suits get ruined so only wear dark coloured ones if you plan to do beach sand castle building. It would have been nice to have more beach restaurants as there were only big ones attached to hotels. The ones that were there had a high security manned setup, so not sure if the Bali bombing in Dec 2004 (?) stopped all all the smaller restaurants doing business. Would still visit the beach but keep it cleaner please.

Content: Went to the beach which gets crowded around sunset.  The waves were huge, about eight to ten feet high.  The tide was going out and it was amazing how strong and long the tidal suction lasted...atleast twenty seconds.  The sand is light brown and there are plenty of beach chairs you can rent.
review: go get crowd around sunset wave huge eight ten foot high tide go amaze strong long tidal suction lastedatleast twenty second sand light brown plenty chair rent

Content: Recently stayed at Double-Six Hotel and was able to see the daily early morning cleaning of the beach by tractor. Great beach for walking, scenic, lots of activity and some great beach restaurants and bars with bean bags to relax in and enjoy the music in the evenings.
review: recently stay doublesix hotel able see daily early morning cleaning tractor great walk scenic lot activity great restaurant bar bean bag relax enjoy music evening

Content: If you want a beach holiday dont go here the beaches are disgusting litter everywhere. People say they try to clear it up but im sorry if you want tourists to come here you need to try harder. It is not good for an island the rely on tourism. Please tell me why i would want to pay to sit on your sunbeds surrounded by rubbish get a rake and a bin bag and clear it up PLEASE. Its such a shame as the rest of the island is beautiful. Go to Sanur sunbeds half the price and no rubbish.
review: want holiday dont go beach disgust litter everywhere people say try clear im sorry want tourist come need try hard good island rely tourism please tell want pay sit sunbeds surround rubbish rake bin bag clear please shame rest island beautiful go sanur sunbeds half price rubbish

Content: Beautiful beach with huge waves. We loved walking along this beach everyday during our trip.When the tide gets low the sand has a reflective glow and it is quite an amazing sight to behold. The sunsets were beautiful too. Most importantly there aren't any annoyingly persistent touts and vendors like what I've experienced in Kuta before.
review: beautiful huge wave love walk along everyday tripwhen tide get low sand reflective glow quite amazing sight behold sunset beautiful importantly arent annoyingly persistent tout vendor ive experience kuta

Content: visited 6 or 7 of the beachside bars for relaxing sunset drinks, it was great way to spend several afternoons and amazingly the music , something as a couple in our 40's could listen too.
review: visit 6 7 beachside bar relax sunset drink great way spend several afternoon amazingly music something couple 40 listen

Content: Out of Kuta, Legian and Seminyak; Seminyak is the one with access to high-end beach clubs and hotels. However, Legian is better situated, waves are both for surfing and playing in water. There are more beach side warrungs and more sunbeds. Seminyak isn't bad either as long as you are chilling at one of the beach clubs.
review: kuta legian seminyak seminyak one access highend club hotel legian well situate wave surf play water side warrungs sunbeds seminyak isnt bad either long chill one club

Content: Loved it. Absolutely... little to no waves, I’m happy with the small restaurant there, great service and very friendly
review: love absolutely little wave im happy small restaurant great service friendly

Content: If you want to walk forever this is the perfect beach to do so, even if there is lots of people this beach is huge and lots of room to share, when the tide is low, the sand is perfect for jogging and speed walking, locals play soccer on th beach and it is a very oriented activity beach, standup paddle, surfing, boogieboard etc...The sand is not white but clean and pebble free, no need for shoes on the beach or in the water. It is clean in general compare to KUTA and LEGIAN but still some garbages in the water, they try to maintained it clean with workers in the morninsg which is nice to see. Lots of little paying spots to park your body and lay in the sun all day with shades and umbrellas. from having travel all over bali, this beach has it all, little restaurants to fancy Hollywood type bar and lounges to hotel and epxensive villa. really appreciated the time spend there and did not wanted to go at first. Amazing sunset and accessible to all.
review: want walk forever perfect even lots people huge lot room share tide low sand perfect jog speed walking local play soccer th orient activity standup paddle surf boogieboard etcthe sand white clean pebble free need shoe water clean general compare kuta legian still garbages water try maintain clean worker morninsg nice see lots little pay spot park body lay sun day shade umbrellas travel bali little restaurant fancy hollywood type bar lounge hotel epxensive villa really appreciated time spend want go first amazing sunset accessible

Content: Absolutely  filthy with litterMouldy looking beanbags and piles of rubbish everywhere.Walked along to get a sense of the place but never even bothered going back
review: absolutely filthy littermouldy look beanbag pile rubbish everywherewalked along sense place never even bother go back

Content: Watched a live band and the sun set one night here and it was such a great experience. The beach gets insanely packed at night with everyone coming to watch. There are tonnes of bean bags and cushions in front of the beach bars and cafe's and you can order drinks and food while you're there.
review: watch live band sun set one night great experience get insanely packed night everyone come watch tonne bean bag cushion front bar cafes order drink food youre

Content: I love the atmosphere of Seminyak, not so busy as Kuta but with plenty of scope for all things esecially the beachside eateries
review: love atmosphere seminyak busy kuta plenty scope thing esecially beachside eatery

Content: You can get great food ,and have a drink, while sitting on a beanbag and watching the sun go down, Very relaxing way to start your evening.
review: great food drink sit beanbag watch sun go relaxing way start evening

Content: I would probably rate this as good but TA doesn't have that rating so...it's not so bad but I'm spoilt with the white sand and clean beaches of Australia.This is a mixture of black volcanic and white sand beach so gives the impression of not being as clean as it could be but the beach is very long and very wide and friendly enough for your kids to paddle in.
review: probably rate good ta doesnt rating soits bad im spoilt white sand clean beach australiathis mixture black volcanic white sand give impression clean long wide friendly enough kid paddle

Content: As far as beaches go, this has got to be the worst beach l have ever seen. I was her a year previous and returned to see if it had been cleaned since, it had not.It had raw sewage coming down a river which continues to flow down the river a year later. There were no white horses in the sea but brown horses of sewage. Coming to Bali for this beach would be a big mistake.
review: far beach go get worst l see year previous return see clean notit raw sewage come river continue flow river year later white horse sea brown horse sewage come bali big mistake

Content: relaxing and just beautiful at sunset, the locals we hospitable and entertaining also scored some good bargains from local vendors
review: relax beautiful sunset local hospitable entertaining score good bargain local vendor

Content: Unfortunately it's extremely polluted in and out of the water though there are huge efforts to clean the place up. I wouldn't swim here at this time of year, the rains churn up the surf and leave junk everywhere.
review: unfortunately extremely polluted water though huge effort clean place wouldnt swim time year rain churn surf leave junk everywhere

Content: Don't get stressed by people selling things, they are just trying to make a living, massages are good.  Enjoy the buzz and people watching. Negotiate hard, but in the end, dont worry about it. Have fun. La Plancha is esp[ecially good in the evenings.  Obey the lifeguards / signs - the surf can be dangerous. Our neighbour died (drowned) off The Legion hotel beach
review: dont stress people sell thing try make living massage good enjoy buzz people watch negotiate hard end dont worry fun la plancha especially good evening obey lifeguard sign surf dangerous neighbour die drowned legion hotel

Content: Definitely go to the beach for Sunset Drinks. The few 'Bean Bag' Beach clubs are great and the food is surprisingly good (go 'right' along from The Cocoon resort) . The sunset is amazing and the new Railler Bintang will please most people (new Lemon flavoured beer = Shandy in a bottle)
review: definitely go sunset drink bean bag club great food surprisingly good go right along cocoon resort sunset amazing new railler bintang will please people new lemon flavour beer shandy bottle

Content: Lovely beach, interesting waves, loads of food, it's like the perfect set up, but the open sewers running onto and across the beach, which people ignore and simply walk through, kind of grosses me out. It's like this on other beaches along this southern stretch of coast too so it's just one of those things. Unless you want to walk for miles along the beach you may not even notice it. I noticed it a lot! The touts are there but they are not aggressive or persistent. Mainly just selling sarongs and paintings and sometimes quite odd things. But they don't pressure or annoy, they are just there.  Unlike the JetSki and paragliding touts in Patong who block your path and follow you and won't leave you alone!
review: lovely interest wave load food perfect set open sewer run onto across people ignore simply walk kind gross beach along southern stretch coast one thing unless want walk mile along may even notice notice lot tout aggressive persistent mainly sell sarong painting sometimes quite odd thing dont pressure annoy unlike jetski paragliding tout patong block path follow wont leave alone

review: get early avoid sun find desert bloke go fitness regime

Content: The beach in Seminiak is not everywhere recommended for bathing. While visiting and walking along the beach I realized that in some places where the water is really dirty and I am not so sure that is not coming from sewages. Plus the huge waves are the delight of surfers not swimmers. If you visit with a small child make sure it stays far from the water due to waves and fast curents
review: seminiak everywhere recommend bath visit walk along realize place water really dirty sure come sewage plus huge wave delight surfer swimmer visit small child make sure stay far water due wave fast curents

Content: We went to the beach around Ku De Ta (enter from KuDeTa passage), recommended to go in the morning around 9 if you bring young kids or baby as the wave can be quite rough in the afternoon and the heat can be too much for them. You can rent beach chairs (2 chairs+1 umbrella) at IDR 100.000 for 3 hours and have sips of fresh coconuts (idr 30.000).I would say the beach is clean enough, it's not that you'd get tons of rubbish on ur foot as some reviews saying it's a dirty beach.. ;)

I find around May/June that I can't walk along the beach because of high tides that make the sand very steep and soft

It really is the perfect place just to kick back and have a few drinks.

Content: Apparently December is the Seminyak Beach, Trash Expo. An annual phenomenon where the currents bring in all our rubbish to this beach. Rubbish we humans failed at handling correctly . See the pictures... This place could be paradise, if we humans every cleaned up our act... but in Seminyak beach, I saw hell... Rather go to Nusa Dua beach, but please. I beg you, don't destroy this place too... Throw  your litter in the trash, not in the gutters and streets... Stop killing this beautiful country...

Content: I first went to Seminyak Beach last year when my wife and I attended a wedding. I could only shoot from the hotel grounds because of lack of time. This time I did some internet research to find out more about this beach, which is just slightly north of Legian and Kuta. I discovered beautiful shots of people having a grand time under giant umbrellas while lying down on giant beanbags. I was determined to shoot the sunset there. As I was staying at The Magani Hotel in Legian and was carrying a heavy camera bag, I took a taxi to Seminyak Beach. The driver dropped me off near Double 6 Seminyak Hotel. From there I just walked to the beach. Instead of writing about what I saw, just take a look at some of the images I shot. You'd wish you were there.
review: first go seminyak last year wife attend wed shoot hotel ground lack time time internet research find slightly north legian kuta discover beautiful shot people grand time giant umbrella lie giant beanbag determine shoot sunset stay magani hotel legian carry heavy camera bag take taxi seminyak driver drop near double 6 seminyak hotel walk instead write saw take look image shoot youd wish

Content: The beach was really clean even with the past storms that had happened.  They had cleaned it up nicely!  The sand was nice between my toes and the Beach was really happening.  There are a lot of lovely restaurants around this area and an easy walk from my hotel.

I wouldn't swim in the surf... local streams drain into it! Great for early walks to get appetite up to indulge a breakfast, or wonderful sunset viewing as you sip your cocktails! ..

Content: Went to this particular stretch of the beach and I actually find Seminyak beach much better than Kuta's beach which I had visited years ago. Seminyak beach wasn't as dirty as I imagined from the reviews, I didn't really see rubbish in the sea or dead fishes washed ashore (as seen at Kuta)?!? Waves were huge in the evening so it's definitely not for swimming, but the sunset was beautiful! There were no hawkers trying to sell us stuff too, as compared to Kuta's constant stream of persistent hawkers.
