Content: Magnificent waves, ideal for surfing, but be a bit careful with the kids, the sea can get pretty rough. Plenty of good beachside bars and we were surprised how clean the beach was in June.
review: magnificent wave ideal surf bit careful kid sea pretty rough plenty good beachside bar surprise clean june

Content: We had dinner at La Plancha a great little restaurant by the beach close to the colourful umbrellas, kites and beanbags. Great food and excellent service. Ours was a large group and they accommodated us efficiently.
review: dinner la plancha great little restaurant close colourful umbrellas kite beanbags great food excellent service large group accommodate u efficiently

Content: Beautiful beach with the big waves and gold sand. Waves are really very big and it is nice to observe them. People are surfing all the time and have a great fun doing it.It is also possible to have massage on the beach and drink fresh coconut.
review: beautiful big wave gold sand wave really big nice observe people surf time great fun itit possible massage drink fresh coconut

Content: I wanted to love this beach, I almost always choose the ocean over a swimming pool. Our hotel was directly in front of it, but I opted for the hotel pool 100% of the time for swimming & relaxing. I loved watching the surfing and everyone enjoying the water, but there was so much plastic and garbage on the beach it was unfortunate and made me not want to spend much timethere. It was certainly pretty from afar & very popular with locals and tourists alike.
review: want love almost always choose ocean swim pool hotel directly front opted hotel pool 100 time swim relax love watch surf everyone enjoy water much plastic garbage unfortunate make want spend much timethere certainly pretty afar popular local tourist alike

Content: we stayed at the katamama hotel, watch sunset from this beach everyday. the most gorgeous sunset in kuta
review: stayed katamama hotel watch sunset everyday gorgeous sunset kuta

Content: Love to watch the sunset there!!! Indeed beautiful!!! And also can watch big waves!!! CAn go for surf!!!
review: love watch sunset indeed beautiful watch big wave go surf

Content: Beautiful sunset and view. an easy stroll from the Dusun Villa, approx 500m leisurely walk. Then stop at Mexicolla for a quick drink and eat
review: beautiful sunset view easy stroll dusun villa approx 500m leisurely walk stop mexicolla quick drink eat

Content: clean, clear water. great sunsets. great surf for swimming and body surfing.  great to walk along.  easy access to all Seminyak activities, restaurants and resorts
review: clean clear water great sunset great surf swim body surf great walk along easy access seminyak activity restaurant resort

Content: Seminyak beach is beautiful, amazing for surfing (not that I even attempted to) but to hear the waves crashing while lying on the sun bed is so relaxing.It's not the best beach to visit along this coast line but still, if staying in Seminyak, it's certainly worth a visit
review: seminyak beautiful amazing surf even attempt hear wave crash lie sun bed relaxingits best visit along coast line still stay seminyak certainly worth visit

Content: Beach is Superb for Sunset View It has very nice Beach Facing  Eating Points where you can Enjoy GRILLED FOOD , BEER , DRINKS.You Can simply walk from This Beach Upto Kuta Beach , with great view and low sea tides.... Must Must Visit
review: superb sunset view nice face eat point enjoy grill food beer drinksyou simply walk upto kuta great view low sea tide must must visit

Content: Great place to finish the day.Plenty of entertainment and characters. Sunsets are postcard quality.Plenty of options from blankets to bean bags or day beds to relax on  with drinks and friends.
review: great place finish dayplenty entertainment character sunsets postcard qualityplenty option blanket bean bag day bed relax drink friend

Content: We spent an amazing couple of days enjoying Kuta Beach, Seminyak. The sand isn't powder white because of the volcanic sand and it could do with a beach clean but the waves totally make up for it. Our young daughters really enjoyed jumping in, over and "surfing" the waves back to shore.The beach sellers also have everything you could want from Sarongs to beer and arwn't too pushy.
review: spent amaze couple day enjoy kuta seminyak sand isnt powder white volcanic sand clean wave totally make young daughter really enjoy jump surf wave back shorethe seller everything want sarong beer arwnt pushy

Content: A beach, smelly and the water was not really good to swim in. There are sections which are pristine (outside hotels) but some of it includes a sewerage run-off so be careful.
review: smelly water really good swim section pristine outside hotel include sewerage runoff careful

Content: A MUST IN BALI!Beautiful sunsets, clean beach and awesome vibe, with great bars and restaurants on the beach front. Another thing the waves is also nice. Good timing to come here around 5 pm. Bring along your mat and swimwears. Love this beach!
review: must balibeautiful sunset clean awesome vibe great bar restaurant front another thing wave nice good timing come around 5 pm bring along mat swimwear love

Content: We stayed at The Oberoi ... which is right at the Seminyak beach... clean, nice beach... watching sunset was so beautiful and serene! Kude ta and The Potato Head are the highlights on the beach!!
review: stay oberoi right seminyak clean nice watch sunset beautiful serene kude ta potato head highlight

Content: Seminyak beach must be one of the worst beaches we've been on. It's filthy with rubbish everywhere. We walked all the way from chez gado gado restaurant to Potato head club and the whole stretch was dirty. Also, as you'd expect, it has heaps of locals trying to sell you things and although we understand they are trying to make a living, saying "no, thank you" every couple of minutes gets somehow tiring after a while...the dark volcanic sand doesn't help the situation and makes the beach look even dirtier. Water looks muddy and just like the beach is full of rubbish.
review: seminyak must one bad beach weve filthy rubbish everywhere walk way chez gado gado restaurant potato head club whole stretch dirty youd expect heap local try sell thing although understand try make living say thank every couple minute get somehow tire whilethe dark volcanic sand doesnt help situation make look even dirty water look muddy full rubbish

Content: I was there with my friends it a nice and fairly clean beach the best part is there is walking lane on the side and many beach shacks for all kind of food and drinks
review: friend nice fairly clean best part walk lane side many shack kind food drink

Content: dissapointed with this. Overcrowded noisy and not value for money or particularly nice. Save your money for other places
review: dissapointed overcrowd noisy value money particularly nice save money place

Content: i call this So-So Beach, because for me its already to crowded and it's make the sea water become dirty, but the view was Amazing when we chill and 'sunset-ing'
review: call soso already crowd make sea water become dirty view amaze chill sunseting

Content: Perhaps ignorance and lack of research on our part, but the beach itself is dirty, covered with dog's mess and has extremely strong currents. So if you're looking for a romantic stroll and dip in the Ocean, prepare to be disappointed!
review: perhaps ignorance lack research part dirty cover dog mess extremely strong current youre look romantic stroll dip ocean prepare disappoint

Content: Like with the whole beach stretch in the area, it is now filled with "bean bag bars" and beach hawkers. While it is a bit cleaner than the stretch toward Kuta, a beach is a beach. Great spot to relax and watch the sunset if you are in the area.
review: whole stretch area now fill bean bag bar hawker bite clean stretch toward kuta great spot relax watch sunset area

Content: Well we found it to be very dirty  the sand after walking a short distance leaves a blackish residue on your feet, so for us walking along the pathways beside the beach was fine. We found much the same conditions at other beaches, however one very positive note, the sunsets are spectacular.  For the rest of our flexible holiday we headed inland, maybe no ocean but jungle is something else. Additionally where we live in Australia we are right on the beach so perhaps a little spoilt!
review: well find dirty sand walk short distance leave blackish residue foot u walk along pathway beside fine find much condition beach one positive note sunset spectacular rest flexible holiday head inland maybe ocean jungle something additionally live australia right perhaps little spoilt

Content: This was the only beach i could surf at the waves were perfect. Def would go back. There was some annoying people trying to sell stuff non stop though.
review: surf wave perfect def go back annoy people try sell stuff non stop though

Content: Great sand beach: take surflessons, buy fresh coconut drink, surfboards for rent.Relax ia only thing you have to do.
review: great sand take surflessons buy fresh coconut drink surfboard rentrelax ia thing

Content: However the street hawkers on the beach do spoil it a bit .... Beer ? Chair? Jewellery? Sunglasses? Rings ? etc
review: street hawker spoil bit beer chair jewellery sunglasses ring etc

Content: This is a lovely beach with plenty of access to eateries and local bars. When we were here yesterday there was some excellent surf breaks. Lower key than Kuta but still approaching a highly commercial area.
review: lovely plenty access eatery local bar yesterday excellent surf break low key kuta still approach highly commercial area

Content: This a beach for walking and enjoying the fresh air. Large waves are noisy so not for swimming. Beach bars are good.
review: walk enjoy fresh air large wave noisy swim bar good

Content: Acces is easy via the parking lot as there s little access to beaches from Seminyak.Filled up with beachclubs charging high end rupiahs.we strolled further and end up in  The Rose Social which has our fav Frose & Sangria.
review: acces easy via park lot s little access beach seminyakfilled beachclubs charge high end rupiahswe stroll end rise social fav frose sangria

Content: On my first visit to Bali I went to seminyak beach and was disappointed due to the fact that it was totally unappealing there were huge King tides and it was unsuitable for swimming and relaxing .I expected the beach to be better and the waves smaller on my second visit however exactly the same .Seminyak has a good vibe and is a great area but the beach lets it down
review: first visit bali go seminyak disappointed due fact totally unappealing huge king tide unsuitable swim relaxing expect well wave small second visit exactly seminyak good vibe great area let

Content: Nice, crowded beach with lot of shacks. You can also do surfing here. Certainly not a quite beach if thats what you are looking for. Good beach for night walk as you can see the city lights that time.
review: nice crowd lot shack surf certainly quite thats look good night walk see city light time

Content: Awesome, affordable. You will soon get over the hawkers. Kick back, fall on a bean bag, apply some sunscreen, get yourself a lemon beer, laugh and talk and eat and drink and watch the sunset. You will only be slightly poorer but also a hell of a lot richer. Trust me.
review: awesome affordable will soon hawker kick back fall bean bag apply sunscreen lemon beer laugh talk eat drink watch sunset will slightly poorer hell lot rich trust

Content: Last time we were in Seminyak was in 2008 and what a difference ten years make! Could not believe the amount of rubbish on the beach and also what was coming in on the tide! Go for a surf or swim here? No way! Stop consuming people and take care of your rubbish!
review: last time seminyak 2008 difference ten year make believe amount rubbish come tide go surf swim way stop consuming people take care rubbish

Content: Beautiful position and setting, We go there every time we are in Bali and have not been disappointed yet.An oldie but a goodie!
review: beautiful position set go every time bali disappoint

Content: The sun beds and umbrellas where a great touch on the beach but the rubish that had washed up onto the shore was not. Not the whole length of Seminyak beach was like this so take the time to walk along the beach to find the perfect spot. My son hired a boggy board from a local on the beach which he really injoyed.
review: sun bed umbrellas great touch rubish wash onto shore whole length seminyak take time walk along find perfect spot son hire boggy board local really injoyed

Content: The sunset is amazing, not as many people hasseling you to buy things although ive been three times this year and Seminyak is getting busier and more expensive. Kids playing as the sun goes down is the best part of our trips here, then live music on the beach at night.
review: sunset amaze many people hasseling buy thing although ive three time year seminyak get busier expensive kid play sun go best part trip live music night

Content: Never seen anything like this. Rubbish everywhere. I was informed that it is like this, every year at this time (February). People on the beach selling things very pushy, don't like taking no for an answer. One in particular was extremely rude. Water was a great temperature, although when you get out you have plastic bags stuck to you.The beach was that disgusting that I took photo's of it. The locals do there best to get it cleaned up every morning before the tourists get down there, to no avail.
review: never see anything rubbish everywhere inform every year time february people sell thing pushy dont take answer one particular extremely rude water great temperature although plastic bag stick youthe disgusting take photo local best clean every morning tourist avail

Content: I think this beach ia better than kuta beach (if you are staying near the city). You can rent chairs for IDR30k-IDR50k. But you cannot have a relaxing sunbath because there are alot of people offering stuff to you. Manicure, pedicure, tattoo, etc.
review: think ia well kuta stay near city rent chair idr30kidr50k relax sunbath alot people offer stuff manicure pedicure tattoo etc

Content: I found this beach as average and disappointing. Quite clean, without any shade to hide apart the overpriced umbrellas and deckchair for rent (IDR 250.000 per day).The sea is clean but great waves are good for surfers not for swimming. Also too low tide makes water shallow for swimming, jgood just to sit and let the water pass around you. You are also heavily bothered by hawkers. However the beach is nice for endless strolling around. But sunset is spectacular many tourist and locals gather here to watch it. If do not want to sit on the beach you can laze in the bar, sipping beer and admire the sunset.
review: find average disappointing quite clean without shade hide apart overprice umbrellas deckchair rent idr 250000 per daythe sea clean great wave good surfer swim low tide make water shallow swimming jgood sit let water pass around heavily bother hawker nice endless stroll around sunset spectacular many tourist local gather watch want sit laze bar sip beer admire sunset

Content: Pleasant beach for a walk . Cleaner than we were expecting. Over-all  worth a visit but unless you like big crowds on bean bags and constant interruption by touts, you will probably only visit once.Cafes and bars dearer that in town and not as good. We went once for a daytime walk , and once for a sunset. After that , we had no reason to return.Its a personal choice.
review: pleasant walk cleaner expect overall worth visit unless big crowd bean bag constant interruption tout will probably visit oncecafes bar dearer town good go daytime walk sunset reason returnits personal choice

Content: Nice beach to learn how to surf.Its a natural black sand or volcanic sand beach.Problem is,there is just so much rubbish all over the beach.It really spoils the feel and natural beauty of the shoreline .You can rent a surfboard for 50k for 1 hour .more expensive than eco beach where you can get it for 2 hours.Rent sun-beds  for 100k an hour.Loads of bars on the beach to have a cocktail or beer.Kids loved it there.The local ladies sell their chicken skewers on the street.you have to try them.delicious!
review: nice learn surfits natural black sand volcanic sand beachproblem isthere much rubbish beachit really spoil feel natural beauty shoreline rent surfboard 50k 1 hour expensive eco 2 hoursrent sunbeds 100k hourloads bar cocktail beerkids love therethe local lady sell chicken skewer streetyou try themdelicious

Content: The locals advised that Seminyak beach is a great place to catch the Bali sunset as compared to Kuta beach (if you have kids). It's just far less crowded and rowdy in Seminyak as compared to in Kuta. We went to Potato Head without reservations and couldn't get a table in time for the sunset so we gave that a miss and went to the beach instead.
review: local advise seminyak great place catch bali sunset compare kuta kid far less crowded rowdy seminyak compare kuta go potato head without reservation couldnt table time sunset give miss go instead

Content: Truly beautiful beach, which is alot quieter than legian and kuta. Great just to hangout on the beach or walk up and down taking in all the awesome of Bali.
review: truly beautiful alot quieter legian kuta great hangout walk take awesome bali

Content: Was great to have locals looking after tourists bringing out drinks making sure your enjoying yourselves.
review: great local look tourist bring drink make sure enjoy

Content: The sea was too choppy to go in, and there were pesky peddlers bugging you to buy something. Most people were in the pool in nearby resorts.
review: sea choppy go pesky peddler bug buy something people pool nearby resort

Content: The Karma beach was beautiful, we paid AUD $50.00 for the $20.00 entrance fee & AUD $30.00 towards meals.
review: karma beautiful pay aud 5000 2000 entrance fee aud 3000 towards meal

Content: The beach is very popular and a great place to watch the sunset. Lots of surfing going on and you must stay within the flags to avoid the rip currents but it is very safe and plenty of food and drinking available all along the beach
review: popular great place watch sunset lot surf go must stay within flag avoid rip current safe plenty food drinking available along

Content: We were so disappointed and quite disgusted. The beach along Kuta, Legion and Seminyak was dirty and full of rubbish. We spent 10 days in Bali and did not swim in the beach once, thankfully the places we stayed at had great swimming pools. For such a popular tourist spot, something needs to be done about this problem. Maybe starting with educating people about rubbish disposal.
review: disappointed quite disgust along kuta legion seminyak dirty full rubbish spend 10 day bali swim thankfully place stay great swimming pool popular tourist spot something need do problem maybe start educate people rubbish disposal

Content: A nice beach a little removed from the more crowded ones.  Loved all of the little "bars" in the area.  Though you need to pay to use the beach chairs, it was a lot of fun to sit and watch the waves crash while enjoying a cold one or two.
review: nice little remove crowded one love little bars area though need pay use chair lot fun sit watch wave crash enjoy cold one two

Content: Seminyak is nice, but it is equally as busy.I am glad we stayed in this part of town as it seemed like a great bargain, but when we come back, we may go someplace more quiet and relaxing like Sanur.
review: seminyak nice equally busyi glad stay part town seem great bargain come back may go someplace quiet relaxing sanur

Content: Wide and clean beach along Seminyak. It offers miles of walking and many opportunities for waves to learn surfing. If you go for a walk try to avoid the little “rivers” that flow into the see. The smell reveals that this is not fresh water.Unfortunately this is not the white dream beach with a backdrop of palm trees that you imagine when you dream of Bali.
review: wide clean along seminyak offer mile walk many opportunity wave learn surf go walk try avoid little river flow see smell reveals fresh waterunfortunately white dream backdrop palm tree imagine dream bali

Content: a very nice beach to wear sunbathing, and a very nice atmosphere for a vacation😊maybe next year I will come back here again, because I am comfortable to be here
review: nice wear sunbathe nice atmosphere vacationmaybe next year will come back comfortable

Content: Nice big beaches, first look awesome but rubbish everywhere on beach, storm water from streets run straight in
review: nice big beach first look awesome rubbish everywhere storm water street run straight

Content: Love sunsets at Seminyak.Hundreds of people of all ages quietly enjoying the views over the water on this extensive beach - no hassles from traders, just peaceful enjoyment of this beautiful place. Simple pleasures. And free!
review: love sunset seminyakhundreds people age quietly enjoy view water extensive hassle trader peaceful enjoyment beautiful place simple pleasure free

Content: The beach in Seminyak is amazing especially for Surfers, but not that good for swimmers since it's always high tide. The entrance is free but if you want to sit on a bed you will have to pay around 100K Rupiah per bed if you have good negotiable skills since they can ask for more.
review: seminyak amaze especially surfer good swimmer always high tide entrance free want sit bed will pay around 100k rupiah per bed good negotiable skill ask

Content: Dirty beach unfit for swimming ....fit only for a walk....pity....with so may world class hotels on the beach.
review: dirty unfit swimming fit walkpitywith may world class hotel

Content: Okay to maybe spend an hour or so sipping a beer at this beach. It is not very clean and very crowded generally. It is a regular beach with no real beauty as such to enjoy. When it comes to Bali, there are far many, many more beaches that are much better.
review: okay maybe spend hour sip beer clean crowd generally regular real beauty enjoy come bali far many many beach much well

Content: Very busy huge waves so very good for surfers but no good for those who want to chill out and have a swim. Sand is black. Beach very busy with poor quality restaurants selling overpriced food and drinks. I wouldn't go back to this beach - much nicer ones only a short moped journey away.
review: busy huge wave good surfer good want chill swim sand black busy poor quality restaurant sell overprice food drink wouldnt go back much nicer one short mop journey away

Content: We really love the beach and the ambience surrounded there, the weather at that time was really nice and there're lots of boutique nearby which offer lots of good stuff with good price.
review: really love ambience surround weather time really nice therere lots boutique nearby offer lot good stuff good price

Content: Cleaning machines scour the beach when the tide is in, leaving the most disgusting detritus when the tide goes out.
review: clean machine scour tide leave disgust detritus tide go

Content: Great beach to visit, lively atmosphere, kids parents, lovers, runners, walkers, kites, playing dogs, you name it! Probably the best people watching beach I have visited bar Copacabana. And the sunsets are the best part for me!
review: great visit lively atmosphere kid parent lover runner walker kite play dog name probably best people watch visited bar copacabana sunset best part

Content: Prices are a little more expensive for beach chairs but you pay for cleanliness and less of a crowd. Surf is great if 5ft swell or better from low to mid tide with long running lefts and rights. Great for sunset surf with kudeta playing chill out house music in the background.
review: price little expensive chair pay cleanliness less crowd surf great 5ft swell well low mid tide long run lefts right great sunset surf kudeta play chill house music background

Content: love this part of the beach in Bali has so much to offer in the way of café/bars music all day and people watching a great place to spend the day swimming, surfing or just hanging out
review: love part bali much offer way cafébars music day people watch great place spend day swim surf hanging

Content: Seminyak beach is always my fav because the flat sand and beautiful waves.  Not as many local sellers wander around as in Kuta.
review: seminyak always fav flat sand beautiful wave many local seller wander around kuta

Content: It is a walking distance from the villa I stayed.  Clean, soft sands, long coast that you can enjoy walking along with sunshine.  The waves is unpredictable.  In one day it was great tides and 2 days later it got a red flag up.  Luckily I was guided by a local security, he strongly advised me that never go to the water when red flag up.  Though I saw a number of tourists and surfers ignore the flag's warning.Hope you luck to have a good and save wave to enjoy ;)
review: walk distance villa stay clean soft sand long coast enjoy walk along sunshine wave unpredictable one day great tide 2 day later get red flag luckily guide local security strongly advise never go water red flag though saw number tourist surfer ignore flag warninghope luck good save wave enjoy

Content: It's fun to spend time here. The waves are awesome for sea sports or just play. The sand and water are crystal clear.
review: fun spend time wave awesome sea sport play sand water crystal clear

Content: Seminyak beach is beautiful and the views, especially at sunset, are delightful. However, it’s best just to admire the views rather than venture into the water, as the sea is littered with rubbish/garbage, which is a massive disappointment!
review: seminyak beautiful view especially sunset delightful best admire view rather venture water sea litter rubbishgarbage massive disappointment

Content: Lovely sunbeds and very cheap for whole day and get a parasol too, lovely cold beer and coconut milk ice cold, loved the locals selling their wares along the beach made some lovely friends especially Wayana and Ellie sea is bit rough but still went in.
review: lovely sunbeds cheap whole day parasol lovely cold beer coconut milk ice cold loved local sell ware along make lovely friend especially wayana ellie sea bit rough still go

Content: I live in a beautiful location in North Eastern NSW where we have beautiful beaches.  I didn't go to Seminyak for the beaches.  Nice to walk along and sunset dinner or drinks though.
review: live beautiful location north eastern nsw beautiful beach didnt go seminyak beach nice walk along sunset dinner drink though

Content: Lots of people and sooooo many sales people wanting to sell you bracelets, massage, etc. The beach chairs are pretty expensive compared to other beaches on the island.
review: lot people sooooo many sale people want sell bracelet massage etc chair pretty expensive compare beach island

Content: I saw the pictures and reviews for this beach which in reality is nothing like this, it’s and average beach and if you will get lucky you will be able to swim, i was unlucky, good for surfers.
review: saw picture review reality nothing average will lucky will able swim unlucky good surfer

Content: Lovely beach. Clean sand. Quiet and peaceful. You will not be harassed to buy things or have massages etc like Kuta. It is quite calm. The water is not calm and can get rough. Be careful if you are not a strong swimmer or have small children. Some sections are patrolled by the lifeguard.
review: lovely clean sand quiet peaceful will harass buy thing massage etc kuta quite calm water calm rough careful strong swimmer small child section patrol lifeguard

Content: I was disappointed with the beach for swimming- bit rough strong under currents and rips- looked quite dangerous. Learn to surfers seemed to enjoy it.This aside, wonderful to sit by the beach and watch and listen to the crashing waves. Wonderful night spot to sit out in a beanbag with a quiet drink and live music listening to the surf. One of the best things I did on my trip to Bali. Understand beautiful explored parasols and lanterns- great memory
review: disappointed swim bit rough strong current rip look quite dangerous learn surfer seem enjoy itthis aside wonderful sit watch listen crash wave wonderful night spot sit beanbag quiet drink live music listen surf one best thing trip bali understand beautiful explore parasol lanterns great memory

Content: There's not much going on here. Sand is dark, not the prettiest beach. Head to a beach club or a lovely pool instead!
review: there much go sand dark prettiest head club lovely pool instead

Content: Filthy water the beach is smelly as the sewage water runs stright in to the ocean from the drains running along the street even the hotels toilets come out in the water on seminyak beach...
review: filthy water smelly sewage water run stright ocean drain run along street even hotel toilet come water seminyak

Content: The beach was dirty, with all kinds of bottles, lighters, plastic, etc... on the sand.I didn't have the courage to go into the sea.If you want to enjoy good restaurants, bars, shops, beach clubs, then it's a good alternative, like Potato Head beach club, Ku de Ta, and several other restaurants, bars, shops, massage spas along the main street.
review: dirty kind bottle lighter plastic etc sandi didnt courage go seaif want enjoy good restaurant bar shop clubs good alternative potato head club ku de ta several restaurant bar shop massage spa along main street

Content: We went there in one morning and it was quite. not too many people but some were jsut enjoying the sunshine. the beach itself is more clean then i expected. also you can see some rocks around the sea. we had walks on the beach and we also saw a local man was fishing. ans some were surfing. so i liked this quite morning at Seminyak beach. much better thatn Double six beach at my point of view.
review: go one morning quite many people jsut enjoy sunshine clean expect see rock around sea walk saw local man fishing ans surf like quite morning seminyak much well thatn double six point view

Content: Had a nice time on the beach. Especially loved how they had restaurants/bars right on the beach with lots of comfortable lounge seating. We saw on big bean bag chairs while we watched the sunset and drank beers. They also had a great live band playing on the beach. The only downfall was the beach merchants. My advice would be to not buy or talk to any of them if you don't want anything. If you buy something from one they will all flock to you. Although it was nice to get a foot rub while watching the sunset :)
review: nice time especially love restaurantsbars right lot comfortable lounge seating saw big bean bag chair watch sunset drank beer great live band play downfall merchant advice buy talk dont want anything buy something one will flock although nice foot rub watching sunset

Content: we had sunset dinner at the beach with an amazing view definitely recommend. The food might be a bit expensive but it is well worth it .
review: sunset dinner amaze view definitely recommend food might bite expensive well worth

Content: Its a average beach with lots of pubs/restuarants on it. Beauty of sea is like any other beach. Sandy beach where some time can be spend
review: average lots pubsrestuarants beauty sea sandy time spend

Content: Cannot visit Seminyak without going down to the beach to watch the fantastic sunset andEnjoy food from one of the many venders.  A most enjoyable experience.
review: visit seminyak without go watch fantastic sunset andenjoy food one many vender enjoyable experience

Content: There's just no other sunset like it on earth. The huge red perfectly circular orb, slowly descending into the endless horizon is romantic, breathtaking and truly spectacular. The beach offers plenty of beanbag restaurants to kick back, sip a Bintang and take in this truly awe inspiring spectacle with the ones you love. The redness of the dying light is otherworldly, ethereal and awakens light in even the hardest of hearts.
review: there sunset earth huge red perfectly circular orb slowly descend endless horizon romantic breathtaking truly spectacular offer plenty beanbag restaurant kick back sip bintang take truly awe inspire spectacle one love redness die light otherworldly ethereal awakens light even hard heart

Content: As with all the beaches north of Kuta,forget about golden sands,forget about clean beaches forget about clean swimming.Unless you are staying at a top hotel,the condition of the beach is totally reliant on the previous high tide.The beach will either be spotlessly clean or littered with so much rubbish you would be inclined to think you are wallowing in a rubbish tip.And the ocean at times is not fit for swimming with oil slicks polluting the water and the sand.Given all that negativity,to walk in the sort of serenity that a sunset beach provides is more than relaxing and the sunsets can be awesome.
review: beach north kutaforget golden sandsforget clean beach forget clean swimmingunless stay top hotelthe condition totally reliant previous high tidethe will either spotlessly clean litter much rubbish incline think wallow rubbish tipand ocean time fit swimming oil slick pollute water sandgiven negativityto walk sort serenity sunset provide relaxing sunset awesome

Content: There were a lot of trash on the beach. Might have been because of the rain season? There were also a red flag up so we didn't try to swim.
review: lot trash might rain season red flag didnt try swim

Content: nice beach which was short walk from our villa, i saw that you can rent chairs or cabanas and buy drink, the waves are quite big and we prefared the beach club
review: nice short walk villa saw rent chair cabanas buy drink wave quite big prefared club

Content: We like to walk along the beach & paddle and this more than satisfied us.....places to stop for a drink...large waves so not for swimming but a few people surfing!
review: walk along paddle satisfied usplaces stop drinklarge wave swim people surf

Content: Most stylish and upscale beach resort! We enjoyed the vies and the water! We will come back for sure!
review: stylish upscale resort enjoy vies water will come back sure

Content: Please be careful at this beach, we saw two people being rescued.Great surf, both watching and partaking in surfing. There were two rivers of raw sewage running into the ocean up the beach - the absolutely stink.
review: please careful saw two people rescuedgreat surf watch partake surf two river raw sewage run ocean absolutely stink

Content: unfortunately at the time of year that we went, the beach was full of rubbish up and down the shoreline.  Im not sure if that is all year through but it was very dissapointing
review: unfortunately time year go full rubbish shoreline im sure year dissapointing

Content: Pity the beach is  not clean with a lot of Rubbish some no doubt caused by the storm but there appears that'd the locals make no effort to tidy it up !!
review: pity clean lot rubbish doubt cause storm appear thatd local make effort tidy

Content: Staying in Seminyak this trip our hotel had regular shuttles to Seminyak Square and beach. I was surprised to see that it was quite cllean there and so revisited a number of times. Sunsets were lovely.
review: stay seminyak trip hotel regular shuttle seminyak square surprise see quite cllean revisit number time sunset lovely

Content: I love beaches around Bali. It gave me the feeling that I'm free or happy I should say. Wi be back to this place. I took the entrance at KuDeTa. Just walking distance from Amadea hotel which I had stayed
review: love beach around bali give feel im free happy say wi back place take entrance kudeta walk distance amadea hotel stay

Content: Lovely, kids loved the day. Tide is really strong, so hold onto the children. Downside, beach chairs can be very expensive, so best to bargain and or take lots of towels. Could not find anywhere to wash feet once off the beach. Also, quite hard to get hold of a licensed taxi (bluebird). Recommend, but be prepared if with children
review: lovely kid love day tide really strong hold onto child downside chair expensive best bargain take lot towel find anywhere wash foot quite hard hold license taxi bluebird recommend prepare child

Content: This beach reminded me a little bit of my home country of Wales UkCloudy skies , dark (almost dirty looking) sand , and the sea didn't look inviting either!The bars with their bean bags and umbrellas were pretty and would have liked to have been there on a dry sunnier day and even for sunset as then this would have been better.Was expecting whiter sands in Bali but not this one. Such a shame , maybe next time it will look better

Content: Seminyak beach is one of the most popular beaches in Bali. I loved the sunset there!! The nice atmosphere and the local food is good.

Content: The beaches of Seminyak are simply divine! You see Nature's masterpiece everywhere you turn. Will definitely be back!

Content: This beach is beautiful and has lots of great waves if you're into surfing. Also great if you're a first time surfer they have tons of affordable surfing lessons and the waves are great but not so intense that it's a hard place to learn. There are great little beachfront restaurants and bars, and it's pretty easy to get a lounge chair if you go early enough. Negotiate for it and don't pay more than 50-100K rupiah for 2-3 hours. Sadly, there is a lot of trash on this beach. So walking along the water is not a great experience because you're dodging washed up trash and plastic bags.
review: beautiful lot great wave youre surf great youre first time surfer ton affordable surf lesson wave great intense hard place learn great little beachfront restaurant bar pretty easy lounge chair go early enough negotiate dont pay 50100k rupiah 23 hour sadly lot trash walking along water great experience youre dodge wash trash plastic bag

Quite a few beachfront luxury hotels with sea view etc. Waves are ok if you want to swim. We are not surfers so can't say anything about surfing conditions. Worth going to Echo point beach for cleaner sand and nice views

Content: There is garbage and filth everywhere. Also, rivers with raw sewage run right through the beach. I ran here twice or maybe 3 times, and it was just disgusting. If you run far enough to the east, you will eventually get to a nicer color sand. However, near our hotel, this was just nasty.
review: garbage filth everywhere river raw sewage run right ran twice maybe 3 time disgust run far enough east will eventually nicer color sand near hotel nasty

Content: As I've spent my whole life in SE Asia, I can say I have seen many filthy and ugly beaches but Kuta Beach beats them all. I was in Kuta during a stop over and I decided to walk to the beach...OMG...what a sad sight. There were mountains of rubbish and garbage accumulated on the shore at every 20 meters...With a terrible traffic and a heavily polluted road just a few steps away...I was shocked to find out that so many people actually do go to such an ugly place. Weird.
review: ive spent whole life se asia say see many filthy ugly beach kuta beat kuta stop decide walk beachomgwhat sad sight mountain rubbish garbage accumulate shore every 20 meterswith terrible traffic heavily pollute road step awayi shock find many people actually go ugly place weird

Content: Good beach for you to have a surf lesson. Some local guide can teach you how to surf. The wave is not very big but quiet good for surfing. The beach also very nice for you to relax and sun bathing while you enjoy a bottle of beer.
review: good surf lesson local guide teach surf wave big quiet good surfing nice relax sun bath enjoy bottle beer

Content: And you get all sorts of life on Seminyak Beach. It all depends on what you want from a beach as to whether or not it is a good place to go.The problem here is that for every good point, there is an opposite and vice versa. Firstly this is a huge beach. At low tide very wide and it is accessed by a few gaps in the rows of restaurants, cafes and bars which line the coast usually abutting the access roads . You will pay to park, even a motorbike nearby but then it will be relatively safe. The alternative is that you will get free parking in an isolated area and have you bike pinched or complain that there are no facilities.This is an excellent beach for running especially by the water and if you go fast enough you wont be bothered by hawkers. However if you stay still for five minutes they will be all over you. Especially if you show any interest in the sunglasses, watch or Ken Holm wok that they are selling. This is truly an international problem now but they have to earn a living and they generally move on if politely addressed. The problem is that there are so many of them there is always another one to follow. Alternatively, you may just want your hair braiding, sir, or your nails varnishing whilst sitting on a beach. To be honest, you can get pretty much anything you want on Seminyak Beach except probably any peace.The water is warm but a lot of sand suspension as it is shallow. It can also be windy and because of its undisturbed length,windy and disorientating. Look out for the flags for safe swimming. A truly high point is to watch the sunset especially with a cold beer at one of the bars or walking along the sand with your partner. If my memory serves me correctly though. If you have the right partner it doesn't matter where you are.Whilst you are there you may as well go to see it.
review: sort life seminyak depend want whether good place gothe problem every good point opposite vice versa firstly huge low tide wide access gap row restaurant cafes bar line coast usually abut access road will pay park even motorbike nearby will relatively safe alternative will free parking isolated area bike pinch complain facilitiesthis excellent run especially water go fast enough wont bother hawker stay still five minute will especially show interest sunglass watch ken holm wok sell truly international problem now earn live generally move politely addressed problem many always another one follow alternatively may want hair braid sir nail varnish whilst sit honest pretty much anything want seminyak except probably peacethe water warm lot sand suspension shallow windy undisturbed lengthwindy disorientate look flag safe swim truly high point watch sunset especially cold beer one bar walk along sand partner memory serve correctly though right partner doesnt matter arewhilst may well go see

Content: Seminyak beach is this huge beautiful stretch of sand with countless spots to stop for a drink or some food while locals come and offer you all sorts of things for sale. I easily visit this area every single day I'm in Bali, because it's got absolutely everything you need
review: seminyak huge beautiful stretch sand countless spot stop drink food local come offer sort thing sale easily visit area every single day im bali get absolutely everything need

Content: We went all around Bali, the beaches in Seminyak are large and long. Many beach clubs where you can or must rent beds. Water seams fair. The sand has not the loved white colours but a classic brown as you find by us in construction. Nothing is perfekt but sure nice
review: go around bali beach seminyak large long many club must rent bed water seam fair sand love white colour classic brown find u construction nothing perfekt sure nice

Content: Been there, enjoyed the moment, nearly been blown away by the strong wind as we were there during the raining season.  However, found that many of the other tourist do enjoy surfing...

Content: Delicious selections.  Quite busy.  Reasonable prices.  Squid ink calamari pasta yummy, but portion a little mean.
review: delicious selection quite busy reasonable price squid ink calamari pasta yummy portion little mean

Content: Beautiful beach that stretches for miles and becomes very colourful as the sunsets with a hedonistic crowd and beautiful bean bags and umbrellas. The sand is yellow and the waters are a dark blue which can be wavy and rough but still very pleasant and great for surfers. I had three people massaging me on the beach for a few pounds it was amazing!! Lots of beach vendors but they actually had some lovely jewellery and art work and they are not forceful at all. Enjoy very much it’s the life :)
review: beautiful stretch mile becomes colourful sunset hedonistic crowd beautiful bean bag umbrellas sand yellow water dark blue wavy rough still pleasant great surfer three people massage pound amaze lot vendor actually lovely jewellery art work forceful enjoy much life

Content: Reasonably clean. Nice to walk along this beach. When tired, you can stop at any of the cafes lining the beach. Especially like sunsets at La Lucciola Restaurant
review: reasonably clean nice walk along tired stop cafe line especially sunset la lucciola restaurant

Content: This morning i walked on both directions of Seminyak beach and was truly shocked about so much dirt, trash, plastic bags and goblets, thousands of dead fish and dogs left overs etc.Nobody really seems to care that the people here cut of the tree they are sitting on !I have seen many beaches during my extensive travel life but this almost topped it all.If the authorities would take only one dollar from each arriving tourist per day for the purpose of environemental clean up, instead of the stupid airport tax, they could buy as many of the beach cleaning trucks as they need.The only clean parts of the beach were the ones managed by the more caring hotels. And even there, they had to clean it manually which is not so fun for the people that have to do it. There are not trash bins anywhere. I was reading a comment about the rituals on the beach and i actually saw one which was nice to see. But after i returned to that arey, the people had left with tue usual trash piles. Dreadful !They should remind themselves from time to time that tourists have choices and can spend their vacation and their money elsewhere very easily !
review: morning walk direction seminyak truly shocked much dirt trash plastic bag goblet thousand dead fish dog leave over etcnobody really seem care people cut tree sit see many beach extensive travel life almost top allif authority take one dollar arrive tourist per day purpose environemental clean instead stupid airport tax buy many cleaning truck needthe clean part one manage care hotel even clean manually fun people trash bin anywhere read comment ritual actually saw one nice see return arey people leave tue usual trash pile dreadful remind time time tourist choice spend vacation money elsewhere easily

Content: This beach was nice for drinks at night but as far as the water goes it was a bit rough. The waves were small but the undertow was mighty. Also, if you think you are far enough back you are not. Take a look around and see where the chairs are placed and know that the water will come up to and sometimes past them. At night we saw a couple of rows of beanbag chairs and tables being taken into the ocean. It was funny until you realized that the customers not only lost their drinks but possibly their cell phones too.

Content: Of course beaches get dirty, generally the busier they are the more rubbish lazy people leave behind. Admittedly I visited in March which is well out of season but the litter levels were minimal. The water is warm, there can be a strong undertow so pay attention to the warning flags. At the North end of the beach is an area set aside for Hindu ceremonies so avoid that. Further north is the local "gay" beach and if you walk south you will get to Kuta beach. Plenty of surf shacks, drinks stalls, bars and local sales people are available here too.

Content: Beach was clean when we were there.  Sunsets were beautiful, and having dinner on the sand at the local restaurant was pretty awesome.Make sure you negotiate a price to rent the deck chairs. The biggest problem (as with all beaches in Bali) are the vendors that hassle you continuously to buy their products.  Mind you, my wife wasn't complaining while getting a foot massage.

Content: If there's even such a word. Bali is home to a multitude of scenic sunset views and Seminyak isn't shy of holding quite a few records of stunning photographic opportunities. Take a stroll after breakfast or just before dinner when the sun is about to set and I can guarantee you that your life's perspective would change. Clean sandy white beaches, azure blue skies and the deep vast ocean blue are just a couple of things that would rope beach-goers and water sports enthusiasts.

Content: I was surprised that this beach was fairly clean. At first glance I thought OMG it looks like Patong Beach in Phuket Thailand, but boy was I wrong. We enjoyed swimming in the cool refreshing water and getting drinks from the beach bars that litter the beach.

The Seminyak beach had rubbish floating in it which is a bit disconcerting for an Australian but the warm water and beautiful blue skies are bound to draw you in and out past the shoreline mess.

review: best sunset bali many different restaurant good food even watch wk match big screen rent sun bed parasols furthermore rent surfboard surf lesson lovely have everything

Content: Make sure you hit the beach before sunset, they are amazing. We enjoyed watching the waves crashing and the odd surfer too. Beach front bars were very popular at that time of day.
review: make sure hit sunset amaze enjoy watch wave crash odd surfer front bar popular time day

Content: This stretch of beach could be beautiful but it's not. I went back today when it was just off high tide to see if it was any better than when we were there at low tide. But no luck, it is still dirty and polluted. What a shame. The sand when wet resembles mud and sticks like paste to everything (not like most sand, which sticks but will brush off). I know the locals have to make a living but there are so many people trying to sell you things, which is fine when walking through but I imagine it could get a little annoying if you decided to sit in the beach.I saw and heard many people complaining of skin rashes and sores after the beach and swimming in the ocean.Hopefully Bali can get a plan together to reduce the water and beach pollution and increase recycling or people will stop coming and that would be a real shame. It is a beautiful long stretch of beach which needs to be cleaned up.
review: stretch beautiful go back today high tide see well low tide luck still dirty polluted shame sand wet resembles mud stick paste everything sand stick will brush know local make live many people try sell thing fine walk imagine little annoy decide sit beachi saw heard many people complain skin rash sore swim oceanhopefully bali plan together reduce water pollution increase recycle people will stop come real shame beautiful long stretch need clean

Content: La plancha was amazing I had my sister and grand daughter the food and beach experience was unforgettable a must to do especially a special memory with family watching a gorgeous sunset thank you Bali beach
review: la plancha amaze sister grand daughter food experience unforgettable must especially special memory family watch gorgeous sunset thank bali

Content: Book a restaurant overlooking the beach at sunset... beautiful Italian food at La Lucciola - gentleman need a t shirt, no singlets allowed even nice ones...
review: book restaurant overlook sunset beautiful italian food la lucciola gentleman need t shirt singlet allow even nice one

Content: Nice sandy beach, lots to see and lots to do.Many places to sit and have drinks and snacks.In the evening it is nicely lit.
review: nice sandy lot see lots domany place sit drink snacksin even nicely lit

Content: Confession: I only went there for the sunset, so don't know how it looks or how busy it is during daytime. For the sunset, it was not very busy, but there were enough people there not to make it feel deserted. Colorful restaurants with a lot of beanbags are there to enjoy the sunset from. I particularly enjoyed the walk on the beach away from the cafes after it got a bit dark.
review: confession go sunset dont know look busy daytime sunset busy enough people make feel desert colorful restaurant lot beanbag enjoy sunset particularly enjoy walk away cafes get bit dark

Content: If your looking for a place to spent quality time the this is the place for you. Make sure you enter the beach from Potato Head beach club. You can spent hours sitting here with you partner looking at the sunset. Don't forget to bring umbrella if you don't like the rain.
review: look place spend quality time place make sure enter potato head club spent hour sit partner look sunset dont forget bring umbrella dont rain

Content: While the sea bed gently slopes down,  unless one is a very powerful swimmer,  one needs to exercise caution here as the rip currents are very strong here.  Beautiful n clean with many eateries lining the beach.  Prices are reasonable too.. Deck chairs and boogie/surf boards available for rent. Highly recommended!
review: sea bed gently slop unless one powerful swimmer one need exercise caution rip current strong beautiful n clean many eatery line price reasonable deck chair boogiesurf board available rent highly recommend

Content: Beautiful beach :) Perfect for a walk, big and not crowded.When we went there the water came unexpectedly and take away my flip-flops from the sand, which were next to me - under the sun umbrella :DAfter 2 hours we had to walk 5 mins to get into the water. The waves has been so big. It's great for surfers, but watch out, because there were few broken surfboards.The sunset was the most beautiful I have ever seen. If you go there just for sunbathing don't miss it and wait to see it.
review: beautiful perfect walk big crowdedwhen go water come unexpectedly take away flipflops sand next sun umbrella dafter 2 hour walk 5 min water wave big great surfer watch break surfboardsthe sunset beautiful see go sunbathe dont miss wait see

Content: The sand is black and the sea is so wavy! Not suitable if you want to have a swim but definitely good for surfers!
review: sand black sea wavy suitable want swim definitely good surfer

Content: Just came back from a couple of weeks in Seminyak and Canggu.  It was so disappointing to see all of the rubbish on the beach and in the water.  I have been going to Bali since the early 1980s and have been progressively concerned about the over-development along the lower west coast and pollution.   There was actually too much rubbish in the water for my wife and I to swim this time (plastic rubbish and probably worse).  I love the Balinese people but the rubbish and water quality is becoming unacceptable here.  Don't think that I will return.
review: come back couple week seminyak canggu disappointing see rubbish water go bali early 1980s progressively concerned overdevelopment along low west coast pollution actually much rubbish water wife swim time plastic rubbish probably worse love balinese people rubbish water quality become unacceptable dont think will return

Content: My husband is a keen surfer and loved surfing at the beach. I just went to sun bath and relax which was nice. Not many families swimming at beach as waves quite big (is a known surf beach). The locals work very hard to keep the beach clean and I could see them cleaning on a daily basis. Lots of loungers out but you have to pay to use.
review: husband keen surfer love surfing go sun bath relax nice many family swim wave quite big know surf local work hard keep clean see clean daily basis lot lounger pay use

Content: Nice beach but be prepared for dark volcanic ash sand. The surf looks great for beginners through to advanced. Nice at night also when all lit up for a few drinks on the beach.
review: nice prepared dark volcanic ash sand surf look great beginner advance nice night lit drink

Content: This Beach is nice but you will find much better ones in Bali like in Padang Bai. Good is that you will find shops and restaurants around.
review: nice will find much good one bali padang bai good will find shops restaurant around

Content: Very very busy and vibe is great...lots to see and do. Try to stay close to the beach so that you can walk to the beach. Lots of cool bars along the beach.
review: busy vibe greatlots see try stay close walk lot cool bar along

Content: Right beside it's sister beach at legain, Seminyak is the less crowded of the two. However, they are both pretty similar in terms of what they have to offer. Surf and drink vendors line the beach offering surf lessons and board rental. Salesmen of sunglasses and henna artists will also offer their wares and services to you. If you love to surf, the place here is pretty great. However, be warned that they can be quite strong for a beginner surfer, so don't go too far out! In fact, if you are a beginner, it might be better to surf at Legain. Also, there are more surfers in Legain so it would be easier for anyone to spot you if you're in trouble. *In fact I had to be saved by a lifeguard after getting swept out by a riptide!
review: right beside sister legain seminyak less crowd two pretty similar term offer surf drink vendor line offer surf lesson board rental salesman sunglasses henna artist will offer ware service love surf place pretty great warn quite strong beginner surfer dont go far fact beginner might better surf legain surfer legain easy anyone spot youre trouble fact save lifeguard get swept riptide

Content: A nice place to sit at relax but I would not go swimming as between La Lucciola Restaurant and the car park there is a stormwater sewage canal that enters the beach and the sea, how ever if you go down to the beach for the sunset grab a drink and a fresh corn sit on the beach and relax
review: nice place sit relax go swim la lucciola restaurant car park stormwater sewage canal enters sea go sunset grab drink fresh corn sit relax

Content: Stayed 5-7 minute walk from Seminyak beach. Pop in headphones or pretend your asleep to avoid hawkers selling you stuff. Got a nice henna tattoo done there, though :)Good swimming waves and my hubby tried out surfing and had a good time-although try to shop around as my husband felt the surf instructor he had didn't give sufficient attention for the price. Don't accept a beach chair for more than 50,000 IDR for two people the whole day, so make sure to negotiate and don't be afraid to pass up a place or two, cuz most likely the first place you passed up may welcome you back at the price you initially wanted :)All around I think it's a nice beach with a nice sunset and decent vibes. P.S. Try out Sand beach bar & restaurant at night on the beach--decently priced with good live music and is one of the more attentive, service-oriented staff/waiters/waitresses than the other spots nearby.
review: stay 57 minute walk seminyak pop headphone pretend asleep avoid hawker sell stuff get nice henna tattoo do though good swimming wave hubby tried surf good timealthough try shop around husband felt surf instructor didnt give sufficient attention price dont accept chair 50000 idr two people whole day make sure negotiate dont afraid pas place two cuz likely first place pass may welcome back price initially want around think nice nice sunset decent vibe ps try sand bar restaurant night beachdecently price good live music one attentive serviceoriented staffwaiterswaitresses spot nearby

Content: Quiet and clean beach. Not suitable for swimming, but good for meeting sunset and relaxing in one of the restaurants
review: quiet clean suitable swim good meeting sunset relax one restaurant

Content: If you can learn to say no to the people selling you things while you lay on your subbed you paid $10 for with umbrella for the whole day you will love the beach in seminyak. Restaurants near buy who will deliver to your  day bed ! In all t yhe photos o had seen thought it would be a dirty beach but was lovely even the water was amazing.
review: learn say people sell thing lay sub pay 10 umbrella whole day will love seminyak restaurant near buy will deliver day bed t yhe photo o see thought dirty lovely even water amaze

Content: Seminyak beach is wide and the sand is firm, perfect to walk on. Both the beach and the water is clean. However, it is quite big waves, great for surfers but not great for kids.
review: seminyak wide sand firm perfect walk water clean quite big wave great surfer great kid

Content: Its less crowded here and the beach is beautiful. Lots of small and large eateries, including spanish tapas and drinks.Make sure you bring lots of water, hat and lotion.
review: less crowd beautiful lot small large eatery include spanish tapa drinksmake sure bring lot water hat lotion

Content: Love this beach great surf, great people, great food. If you just want to sit & watch the world go by this is the place then top it off with an awesome sunset, you just won’t go wrong!
review: love great surf great people great food want sit watch world go place top awesome sunset wont go wrong

Content: A public beach on the Indian Ocean. Very soft grey sand. You can rent chairs and umbrellas. It is pretty wide.
review: public indian ocean soft grey sand rent chair umbrellas pretty wide

Content: Nice and clean beach with good restaurants and bars.Not recommended for swimming due to strong waves. Great for surfing and sunbathing.
review: nice clean good restaurant barsnot recommend swimming due strong wave great surf sunbathing

Content: Excellent for viewing Sunset, nice darkish Sand which is comfortable for walking miles. Waves are strong so can't swim. Not crowded and no street vendors to hassle. A very relaxing place, plenty of sunbeds available.
review: excellent view sunset nice darkish sand comfortable walk mile wave strong cant swim crowd street vendor hassle relax place plenty sunbeds available

Content: long and vast beach, good for jogging. garbage gets cleaned every morning. some locals sell coconuts (yumm). in the evening many peopel at the beach watching the sunset and kids playing in the waves. Great fun.
review: long vast good jogging garbage get clean every morning local sell coconut yumm even many peopel watch sunset kid play wave great fun

Content: There is nothing better than a sunset on Seminyak Beach - we had to do it several times.  Do yourself a favour.
review: nothing well sunset seminyak several time favour

Content: I realise it is the wet season but the amout of rubbish on the beach is disgusting. The quality of the water was terrible to say the least
review: realise wet season amout rubbish disgust quality water terrible say least

Content: The beach was pretty to look at, the water was nice and warm, but some areas quite polluted.  The beach in front of Kudeta smelled a little of sewage runoff.
review: pretty look water nice warm area quite pollute front kudeta smell little sewage runoff

Content: Very clean beach that is well maintained, lots of entertainment options at night. Very busy but yet cozy, great place to relax.
review: clean well maintain lot entertainment option night busy yet cozy great place relax

Content: A nice beach with a lot of bean-bag bars. We went here one night to see the sunset. Truly amazing. A must-do when in Semniak. Not sure how the beach is during daytime. Not the cleanest beach in Bali.
review: nice lot beanbag bar go one night see sunset truly amazing mustdo semniak sure daytime cleanest bali

Content: The beach was great but you do get bombarded by hawkers a bit - eventually they left us alone until the next batch arrived an hour later!
review: great bombard hawker bite eventually left u alone next batch arrive hour later

Content: Absolutely gorgeous during sunset. Just be there at least half an hour before so you’ve ample time to take photos of the sun setting plus do some shopping from the peddlers at the beach - some lovely necklaces and bracelets.
review: absolutely gorgeous sunset least half hour youve ample time take photo sun set plus shop peddler lovely necklace bracelet

Content: Relaxing. A real holiday feel, especially at sunset when you are able to choose amongst the many restaurants along the beach, find a bean bag to relax on, eat drink and listen to live music. I prefer swimming in the beaches not so populated, which there are plenty of. Seminyak is great for good food and shopping also. It does need to be careful not to become to pricey as this may deter a lot of travellers. Ubud for day spas is an absolute must!
review: relax real holiday feel especially sunset able choose amongst many restaurant along find bean bag relax eat drink listen live music prefer swim beach populate plenty seminyak great good food shop need careful become pricey may deter lot traveller ubud day spas absolute must

Content: Very clean beach in a lovely scenic setting, no selelrs on the beach which was a great bonus, sunset is amazing
review: clean lovely scenic set selelrs great bonus sunset amazing

Content: Was glorious water down by la Plancha. Further North the waste water pours down in rivers from the town and I'm sure is highly polluted. The further north you go the worse it smells.
review: glorious water la plancha north waste water pour river town im sure highly polluted north go bad smell

Content: Great place to chill out and have a beer on the beach, Seminyak is renowned for the finer things in Bali, though people say it's expensive that's only by Bali standards, you can expect to pay Australian prices at the restaurants.
review: great place chill beer seminyak renowned fine thing bali though people say expensive thats bali standard expect pay australian price restaurant

Content: I suppose we were naive in assuming all beaches on Bali would be like a scene from South Pacific.Seminyak beach has rather dark sand, suffers from some rubbish and a constant tide, not of sea but of touts trying to sell stuff doggedly but unenthusiastically.Umbrellas and sunbeds cost about £7 each but are more comfortable than trying to lay on a towel in a high wind.The sea has a lot of suspended sand as the shoreline is very shallow.Its always good to be by the sea, however, even when its impossible to find peace.One of the tourists on the sunbed next to me (which the attendant had already sold to three others before her) was having a massage from two locals plus another one trying to sell her a hat at the same time!If you are in Seminyak and like a beach there isn't much choice but you might be a little disapointed
review: suppose naive assume beach bali scene south pacificseminyak rather dark sand suffers rubbish constant tide sea tout try sell stuff doggedly unenthusiasticallyumbrellas sunbeds cost 7 comfortable try lay towel high windthe sea lot suspend sand shoreline shallowits always good sea even impossible find peaceone tourist sunbed next attendant already sell three others massage two local plus another one try sell hat timeif seminyak isnt much choice might little disapointed

Content: Another nice beach in Bali. Not as crowd as Kuta, yet not quiet as Petitenget. I prefer this place than Kuta since it offers something "different". Enjoy morning or night falls here and feel the atmosphere.
review: another nice bali crowd kuta yet quiet petitenget prefer place kuta offer something different enjoy morning night fall feel atmosphere

Content: We visited this beach twice and, while it was good for sunbathing, the waves were very strong so we were not able to swim. It was great for surfers !
review: visit twice good sunbathe wave strong able swim great surfer

Content: If you would like to enjoy a perfect sunset on a budget, I suggest Seminyak Beach over Kuta or Jimbaran as you don't need to spend a lot to enjoy yourselves.There are lots of bars selling cheap beers on the beach. The best thing is that they even have bean bags!
review: enjoy perfect sunset budget suggest seminyak kuta jimbaran dont need spend lot enjoy yourselvesthere lots bar sell cheap beer best thing even bean bag

Content: You have to try la Plancha's Friday evening sundowners on the beanbags! Best time for swimming, depending on tides, is early in the morning.  Be aware that the Balinese surf lifesavers have limited skills and resources.  Swim where you are in control, and between the red and yellow flags.
review: try la planchas friday even sundowner beanbags best time swim depend tide early morning aware balinese surf lifesaver limit skill resource swim control red yellow flag

Content: Its one of the finest stretch of beaches you see. A long picturesque beach with sufficient space for everyone to unwind. Its not crowded either. With lovely resorts in the background adding to its charm. The undercurrent is strong, so not for swimmers. Maintenance however could be better and some garbage can be seen around. Still its a piece of sheer beauty.
review: one fine stretch beach see long picturesque sufficient space everyone unwind crowd either lovely resort background add charm undercurrent strong swimmer maintenance good garbage see around still piece sheer beauty

Content: Not the best beach I have been but it is a patrolled beach with lifesavers, lots of bars and restaurants, the usual touts selling their wares, massages etc. go just before sunset for spectacular sunset photos.
review: best patrol lifesaver lot bar restaurant usual tout sell ware massage etc go sunset spectacular sunset photo

Content: Wow what an amazing huge beach which goes on forever. You'll certainly not feel overcrowded on this beach! Great for surfing to & lots of bars & restaurants nearby. It was a shame to see lots of plastic lying around on it but there was people there every day trying to pick it up, such a shame our world has let this happen, well done for trying to keep on top of it.
review: wow amaze huge go forever youll certainly feel overcrowded great surf lots bar restaurant nearby shame see lots plastic lie around people every day try pick shame world let happen well do try keep top

Content: Popular with swimmers and surfers during the day at night you can eat at many small restaurants on the sand and watch the sunset
review: popular swimmer surfer day night eat many small restaurant sand watch sunset

Content: The beach is wide and reasonably clean the sunsets are fantastic. You can walk several kms to centro shops or just wander but do it early before too hot..
review: wide reasonably clean sunset fantastic walk several km centro shop wander early hot

Content: Very good beach, close to hotel and shopping. Restaurants and bars on beach either sitting in restaurant or on the beach with umbrella and beach chairs or bean bags.
review: good close hotel shopping restaurant bar either sit restaurant umbrella chair bean bag

Content: I can't believe how much crap there is on this beach - mostly plastics. Sometimes you'd see people scraping it up, but not enough to make much of a difference. Having stayed in Sanur a couple of times previously, where the beaches are pretty immaculate, this came as a nasty shock. Also, not good for swimming as the currents are strong. Good for surfers though - nice breaks.
review: cant believe much crap mostly plastic sometimes youd see people scrap enough make much difference stay sanur couple time previously beach pretty immaculate come nasty shock good swimming current strong good surfer though nice break

Content: Although friends had warned me about this beach..I wasn't prepared for how much rubbish was in the water/being washed ashore. It was pretty disturbing. I won't be back for swimming, except to help on beach clean up days.
review: although friend warn beachi wasnt prepare much rubbish waterbeing wash ashore pretty disturb wont back swim except help clean day

Content: This is a huge beach with a great selection of bars and surf board rentals. The waves are great for surfers or those who just wish to chill out. Sun beds and parasols can be rented cheaply. Sarong and souvenir sellers are a little tiresome. Pollution is a massive problem, especially during the rainy season. There is a sign that says it is a 'natural phenomenon', which is a complete lie. The rubbish is because of inadequate trash collection infrastructure and poor education and awareness about littering. Hopefully the situation will improve given recent campaigns on the island.
review: huge great selection bar surf board rental wave great surfer wish chill sun bed parasol rent cheaply sarong souvenir seller little tiresome pollution massive problem especially rainy season sign say natural phenomenon complete lie rubbish inadequate trash collection infrastructure poor education awareness litter hopefully situation will improve give recent campaign island

Content: Couldn't figure out why so many foreigners (mostly Aussies) flocked to a beach so dirty and stinky.  Yes, there was surfing waves, but it wasn't of any quality.
review: couldnt figure many foreigner mostly aussie flock dirty stinky yes surf wave wasnt quality

Content: I did prefer Seminyak Beach 23 years ago..but more to do for tourists now :) Lots of great places to eat or just watch the sunset.
review: prefer seminyak 23 year agobut tourist now lot great place eat watch sunset

Content: Great beach for walking running in the morning. There is not much chance of getting a good walk or run on the pavements in Seminyak. But this beach provides great access to a run to Kuta(10km) turnaround. Just be prepared to get your feet wet
review: great walk run morning much chance get good walk run pavement seminyak provide great access run kuta10km turnaround prepare foot wet

Content: There were gorgeous beaches, and others that were not so nice. The part in behind the Oberoi Hotel and Ku De Ta was fabulous. I even got a chair and a massage on the beach there.
review: gorgeous beach others nice part behind oberoi hotel ku de ta fabulous even get chair massage

Content: Good beach with a number of nice hotels but not really suitable for swimming due to strong current and unpredictable waves...
