You don't come here for the beauty of the beach as much as you would for the atmosphere. It's lots of fun and worth a visit.

Content: We walked for a very long time but definitely worth it and so many bars along the way to pop into. Unbeatable sunset viewing!
review: walk long time definitely worth many bar along way pop unbeatable sunset viewing

Content: Seminyak beach is really nice In my option, not quite the tranquil paradise like beach you think of when visiting Bali but this place has a really good surf beach which is clean and fun. The best part of Seminyak beach is at night, it really does come to life. Everyone gathers to watch the sun set drinking beers on all the bean bags they put out, really great atmosphere and amazing sun set!
review: seminyak really nice option quite tranquil paradise think visit bali place really good surf clean fun best part seminyak night really come life everyone gather watch sun set drinking beer bean bag put really great atmosphere amaze sun set

Content: A great beach with a reasonably shallow shelf so that even non swimmers can bathe comfortably. Evenings come alive with the music from several eateries with bean bags and chairs to enjoy the place. You may get a lot of salesmen peddling their wares but they are not at all persistent so not a bother. The sunsets are really great to enjoy with a beer or coconut drink alongside.
review: great reasonably shallow shelf even non swimmer bathe comfortably evening come alive music several eatery bean bag chair enjoy place may lot salesman peddle ware persistent bother sunset really great enjoy beer coconut drink alongside

Content: This is a beautiful beach as good as beaches are. White sands lined with kiosks of seafood are inviting. The view of sunset is superb and a leisurely stroll along the beach is relaxing. I could not go into the water as it was full tide and I am afraid of being drowned. All the beaches are more or less, the same.
review: beautiful good beach white sand line kiosk seafood invite view sunset superb leisurely stroll along relax go water full tide afraid drown beach less

Content: Beach is so nice with high quality sand..İts more quite than Kuta&Legian beach..For resting and sunbath its one of the best in Bali..Lot of clubs and bars beside beach.Because of high wawes if not a good swimmer it have high risk for to swim..Prices more expensive than Legian and Kuta beach..
review: nice high quality sandits quite kutalegian beachfor rest sunbath one best balilot club bar beside beachbecause high wawes good swimmer high risk swimprices expensive legian kuta

Content: first of all I don't like dark sand as it looks dirty but here it didn't help that it smelled badly as well
review: first dont dark sand look dirty didnt help smell badly well

Content: One of the most beautiful sunsets you can see in Bali is on the Seminyak beach. And if you like to enjoy sunset with a cocktail in your hand, there are plenty of bars with comfy bean bags. The atmosphere is great here! Although very crowded as this is a popular spot in Bali, so be prepared and come a bit earlier It can be nice during the day as well, not a typical “white sand blue water” kind of beach - but you can practice surf or have lunch while watching huge waves.
review: one beautiful sunset see bali seminyak enjoy sunset cocktail hand plenty bar comfy bean bag atmosphere great although crowded popular spot bali prepare come bit earlier nice day well typical white sand blue water kind practice surf lunch watch huge wave

Content: Do not recommend Seminyak beach. It is under reconstruction with lots of work going on. Choose another beach!
review: recommend seminyak reconstruction lot work go choose another

Content: Per the title, the beach was covered in winblown rubbish and driftwood. Nothing redeeming. Suggest going to one of the beach side clubs instead
review: per title cover winblown rubbish driftwood nothing redeem suggest go one side club instead

Content: We really like Seminyak Beach. Saw that many persons has written in their reviews that beach is poorly cleaned, but we did not experience that at all. Very clean beach and many nice pool/drink bars along the beach as well.
review: really seminyak saw many person write review poorly clean experience clean many nice pooldrink bar along well

Content: The beach would be nice but too many people trying to sell you something. It felt like getting asked every 5 meters if we want to surf.
review: nice many people try sell something felt get ask every 5 meter want surf

Content: Nice beach if you want to chill and have drinks with friends!It gets pretty crowded, since most beaches around have reefs and stones, and this is a sand beach, but it's still niceGood sunset view Unfortunately, many garbage left at the beach, like most places in Bali
review: nice want chill drink friendsit get pretty crowded beach around reefs stone sand still nicegood sunset view unfortunately many garbage leave place bali

Content: Good restaurants/ bars along the beach, great for sunset.  Like most southern beaches in Bali more rubbish than you would expect, and at night they open water from the city into the sea, from the smell as it goes in I will never swim here again!  Further north a little cleaner I think, but still got sick after swallowing too much water failing at learning to surf.  Slightly less crowded than Kuta, more than Berawa.
review: good restaurant bar along great sunset southern beach bali rubbish expect night open water city sea smell go will never swim north little cleaner think still get sick swallow much water fail learn surf slightly less crowded kuta berawa

Content: Stunning sunsets while sitting on the beach having a cold beer that can be purchased from one of the many vendors. New Years Eve was spectacular with fire works all along the beach as far as the eyes could see Potato head to the right and Kuta to the left
review: stun sunset sit cold beer purchase one many vendor new year eve spectacular fire work along far eye see potato head right kuta leave

Content: The beach is pretty nice but they are a lot of pollution like everywhere in Bali.. That is so bad because you swim between garbages.. (cans, chips packet,...) But still fun especially if you surf!
review: pretty nice lot pollution everywhere bali bad swim garbage can chip packet still fun especially surf

Content: The day we went the beach was quite clean, there hadnt been any rain the week we were there so i guess we were lucky. This definately isnt a white sand beach, its the regular black/brown sand you find in legian/kuta as well. There is plenty of places to eat along the beach and plenty of sun lounges to rent, we paid 10k for two for the day. The water is nice, there are plenty of waves, but its not a real good place for kids or the inexperienced to swim, there are several big rips and a strong current. While we were there 2 guys got pulled out the back behind the waves while everyone sat around and watched, there are no lifesavers here, eventually someone swam out to help them swim back in. You dont get hassled as much here as you do in Kuta but there are still plenty of hawkers walking the beach, but its bali and u come to expect that. Overall its an ok beach for a days swimming and people watching but i wouldnt recommend it for young kids or inexperienced swimmers, stick to sand castles
review: day go quite clean hadnt rain week guess lucky definately isnt white sand regular blackbrown sand find legiankuta well plenty place eat along plenty sun lounge rent pay 10k two day water nice plenty wave real good place kid inexperienced swim several big rip strong current 2 guy get pull back behind wave everyone sit around watched lifesaver eventually someone swim help swim back dont hassle much kuta still plenty hawker walk bali u come expect overall ok day swim people watch wouldnt recommend young kid inexperienced swimmer stick sand castle

Content: The beach is huge - lots of nice places to chill - but unfortunately very polluted with plastic and other rubbish. They are cleaning the upper section of the beach, but right at the water’s edge and in the surf is a polluted mess.
review: huge lot nice place chill unfortunately pollute plastic rubbish cleaning upper section right water edge surf pollute mess

Content: Was only a 10 minute walk from our Villa to Seminyak Beach and we only did it the once. Rubbish on the beach everywhere and to top it off were the two used nappies half buried in the sand. Left immediately and didn't return...chose the cleaner option of the pool in our Villa. Shame.
review: 10 minute walk villa seminyak rubbish everywhere top two used nappy half buried sand leave immediately didnt returnchose clean option pool villa shame

Content: Just like your regular beach, nothing to write home about...not so crowded though at about 5 in the evening...good for a nice stroll...
review: regular nothing write home aboutnot crowd though 5 eveninggood nice stroll

Content: My children are quite young and the beach wasn't really suitable for swimming but they still loved the walks.....
review: child quite young wasnt really suitable swimming still love walk

Content: post NYE this beach is disgusting. rubbish just sits there all over the beach...some places it was hard to see sand.
review: post nye disgust rubbish sits beachsome place hard see sand

Content: I cruised down here to watch the sunset the last 2 nights. There is plenty of room for everyone. The surfers, the swimmers, the tanners, the drinkers and even the dogs. The beach itself has more of a brown sand, but it is not rocky and very flat. You'll be surprised at how close some of the waves get to you. There are a couple of very trendy bars here as well to sip cocktails in. Definitely worth a visit.
review: cruise watch sunset last 2 night plenty room everyone surfers swimmer tanner drinker even dog brown sand rocky flat youll surprise close wave couple trendy bar well sip cocktails definitely worth visit

Content: great place to be for sunset, great cafe's, great bands good vibe about this place, pull up a bean bag and just watch the world go bye
review: great place sunset great cafes great band good vibe place pull bean bag watch world go bye

Content: Nice sunset......but beach was full of rubbish.  Was not nice seeing a man drown and all the tourist just taking pictures.
review: nice sunsetbut full rubbish nice see man drown tourist take picture

Content: I tried hard to ignore the plastic Bags, rubbish and pollution but there’s so much. The locals just don’t seem to care which is such a shame.Apart from that it’s a good place, there’s bars for Africa in the Legian area and overall it’s a good spot. I just wish the local govt would clean it up!!!
review: try hard ignore plastic bag rubbish pollution there much local dont seem care shameapart good place there bar africa legian area overall good spot wish local govt clean

Content: Beach and sea are so dirty, i was afraid to go swimming because of so much garbage. Only nice thing are sunsets
review: sea dirty afraid go swim much garbage nice thing sunset

Content: Our nyuh luxury villa seminyak offered free shuttle to this beach and definitely the cleanest and most happening beach in bali...went to a shack with bean bags...amazing sunset view
review: nyuh luxury villa seminyak offer free shuttle definitely clean happen baliwent shack bean bagsamazing sunset view

Content: Seminyak beach like that whole stretch from Kuta Legian to Seminyak is great. Get a lounge for around $5Aus for 2hrs ( negotiate ) and soak up the sun sea and all the carrying on around you. You can get a cold drink from the guy on the beach you just have to put up with the beach hawkers but if you dont want to buy or have a massage, nails done just so No. Like all the beaches its not the whitest sand but its great. Relax and enjoy.
review: seminyak whole stretch kuta legian seminyak great lounge around 5aus 2hrs negotiate soak sun sea carry around cold drink guy put hawker dont want buy massage nail do beach white sand great relax enjoy

Content: Dead flat, mid sized waves, super sunsets and a choice of reclining lounges or bean bags. It's difficult for an Australian to review a beach and go wow! Definitely not the reason your would come to Bali.
review: dead flat mid size wave super sunset choice recline lounge bean bag difficult australian review go wow definitely reason come bali

Content: this beach may not be clean, but has great sunset views at nearby restaurants and bars that line the beach.  Lounge chairs for rent are easy to find, and there are plenty of beach bars along the beach where you can sit in the shade while watching the surf schools catching some waves.
review: may clean great sunset view nearby restaurant bar line lounge chair rent easy find plenty bar along sit shade watch surf school catch wave

Content: Exactly, just another beach. There were pieces of rubbish along shoreline but this is a common sight of marine debris nowadays. The beach benches are rented for rp75000 per bench per hour.
review: exactly another piece rubbish along shoreline common sight marine debris nowadays bench rent rp75000 per bench per hour

Content: Our hotel opened on to this beach, which is wide, patrolled and with waves that you can surf or body surf. Great! Plenty of washed-up rubbish on the tide-line, but it did appear to be removed each day. Lounges and food are cheap and this end of the stretch isn't crowded.
review: hotel open wide patrolled wave surf body surf great plenty washedup rubbish tideline appear remove day lounge food cheap end stretch isnt crowd

Content: I didnt like  this beach, looks very dirty .Very bad smell.If u  want  white sands  and blue water this is not  that area!
review: didnt look dirty bad smellif u want white sand blue water area

Content: The beach is always fun to walk along , I find it best early in the morning or later in the afternoon as it does get very hot .It’s a surf beach so be prepared for some strong waves or currents and swim where the flags are.There is many spots you can hire chairs or just stop for a cool drink , there are a lot of  Balinese selling sarongs jewellery etc but if you take the time talk to them they do have interesting stories to share .You also are able to grab a massage along the beach and there is no shortage of food . I find the best way to walk down to Legion or Kuta as it does not seem as far compared to walking the main streets.When the tide is out there is some rubbish that you will see and the locals try to clean the beach up as much as possible .
review: always fun walk along find best early morning late afternoon hot surf prepare strong wave current swim flag arethere many spot hire chair stop cool drink lot balinese selling sarong jewellery etc take time talk interest story share able grab massage along shortage food find best way walk legion kuta seem far compare walk main streetswhen tide rubbish will see local try clean much possible

Content: An amazing sunset there was not to many persons there on the night we went there i would say a must stop for any person havi g a holiday in bali. Amazing photo opportunities
review: amaze sunset many person night go say must stop person havi g holiday bali amazing photo opportunity

Content: Semiyak Beach..... Beaches are always relaxing. Swimmer's enjoy this beach bcoz of waves. I would advice children and non swimmers to be careful as this beach is uneven and the waves are harsh..
review: semiyak beach always relax swimmer enjoy bcoz wave advice child non swimmer careful uneven wave harsh

Content: So much rubbish and dog poop everywhere.. plus all the people trying to sell you the same thing over and over.. yuck.  Guess i am spoilt for choice with Australian beaches..
review: much rubbish dog poop everywhere plus people try sell thing yuck guess spoilt choice australian beach

Content: An average looking beach that is made to look much worse because of all the garbage washed ashore. They going rate for sun chairs seems to be 200K for two people, which is way more than other places and you don’t even get access to food or toilets! Would never come back.
review: average look make look much bad garbage wash ashore go rate sun chair seem 200k two people way place dont even access food toilet never come back

Content: Lovely in the evening for a stroll. Daytime wil be busy with hawkers selling everything so just grab a chair (pay) sit down and enjoy the view.
review: lovely even stroll daytime wil busy hawker sell everything grab chair pay sit enjoy view

Content: Yuck---so many people and no place to sit without someone wanting to charge you. Noisy road next to beach and so much trash. Water not even that warm. Such a disappointment after the lovely beaches elsewhere in Bali. Not sure what the attraction is.
review: yuckso many people place sit without someone want charge noisy road next much trash water even warm disappointment lovely beach elsewhere bali sure attraction

Content: Nice white soft sand, but not an impressive beach. I'm told it's a public beach for surfers.The shops on the roads leading to the Beach are good for budget shopping. I couldn't find any shell necklaces, which I wanted to take back as souvenirs.
review: nice white soft sand impressive im tell public surfersthe shop road lead good budget shopping couldnt find shell necklace want take back souvenir

Content: We wanted experience the amazing sunset along the beach, we were not disappointed.People all over the place enjoying the sunset, bring a camera as the shots are amazing.
review: wanted experience amaze sunset along disappointedpeople place enjoy sunset bring camera shot amaze

Content: I visited in 2010 for the first time and was taken aback by the stunning sunset, however even then the beach itself wasn't great, and it grossly deteriorated ever since. Dirty, grey-ish sand, lots of rubbish, which is not cleaned. The water was murky and muddy, and wasn't inviting at all. One of the locals on a later visit also advised me that it wasn't 'good' to swim, especially after the rain, when all the inland rubbish gets washed via the streams into the bay. I saw lots of nasties floating in those streams, so would agree with that advice. It's such a shame that no one takes responsibility for keeping it clean, as it would have attracted many more tourists if it was maintained. The sunsets are beautiful and many people come to the beach-side bars just for it. Any beach-going experience will most certainly be interrupted by the local hawkers trying to sell you something.
review: visited 2010 first time take aback stunning sunset even wasnt great grossly deteriorate dirty greyish sand lot rubbish cleaned water murky muddy wasnt invite one local later visit advise wasnt good swim especially rain inland rubbish get washed via stream bay saw lot nasties float stream agree advice shame one take responsibility keep clean attract many tourist maintain sunset beautiful many people come beachside bar beachgoing experience will certainly interrupt local hawker try sell something

Content: A very beautiful beach and especially beautiful at sunset, worth going down to watch the sunset a couple of people trying to sell things on the beach but that's Bali. Worth taking time to go have a look at !
review: beautiful especially beautiful sunset worth go watch sunset couple people try sell thing thats bali worth take time go look

Content: This beach was beautiful and jam packed with resturants and activities but there was ALOT of rubbish scattered around the beach which was sad to see. The water was very dirty but it had lovely views. A once in a lifetime view.
review: beautiful jam pack resturants activity alot rubbish scatter around sad see water dirty lovely views lifetime view

Content: Really pleasing to see the effort to clean up SEMINYAK beach. Lots of small cafes and bars with cheap food and beer. Surfboard hire and recliners are available.
review: really please see effort clean seminyak lot small cafe bar cheap food beer surfboard hire recliner available

Content: My first time experiencing a beach with strong waves that I couldn't do anything in the sea. I don't surf so all I did was just lay by the beach and also workouts.
review: first time experience strong wave couldnt anything sea dont surf lay workout

Content: Good to hang out from morning to dusk. Sip in some really good beverages or try out some awesome dishes while relaxing at the beach from the numerous restaurants present there !
review: good hang morning dusk sip really good beverage try awesome dish relax numerous restaurant present

Content: Whilst the sand is not pure white by any means, this beach is cleaned daily and all rubbish (if any) removed. Deck chairs abound, and when the surf is “up”, it is ideal for surfing.
review: whilst sand pure white mean clean daily rubbish remove deck chair abound surf ideal surf

Content: many shop restaurante the best is sunset, the beach is very long beach so some part its clean some part is dirty, but the sunset gezz, so nice
review: many shop restaurante best sunset long part clean part dirty sunset gezz nice

Content: The only good thing about this beach is the sunset. I would not swim there personally. There is a good market at the back with many bars and restaurants to chose from to watch the sunset with a drink in hand.!
review: good thing sunset swim personally good market back many bar restaurant choose watch sunset drink hand

Content: In front of Champlung Cafe look on the beach for Ruddy, Rocky,Made and Eka. They are the nicest people who a always give a reasonable price and will remember you next time.made has great silver rings and ruddy does a great deal on bangles and belts. tell them Sandy & Barry says hello from Perth
review: front champlung cafe look ruddy rockymade eka nice people always give reasonable price will remember next timemade great silver ring ruddy great deal bangle belt tell sandy barry say hello perth

Content: Nice beach, lots of different bars and places to eat all the way along. Very good surf if that's your thing. Big waves a lot of the time. Can become pretty annoying getting pestered by the locals all the time. They are always trying to sell you stuff. Also if you want to lie on a sunbed you have to pay. But don't be afraid to haggle, there are so many people trying to get you on their sunbed so if they say a price that's too high then just go to the next man. Once you do have a sunbed then the guys running it are happy to bring you beers or whatever you want really.
review: nice lot different bar place eat way along good surf thats thing big wave lot time become pretty annoy get pester local time always try sell stuff want lie sunbed pay dont afraid haggle many people try sunbed say price thats high go next man sunbed guys run happy bring beer whatever want really

Content: Average type beach, Personally i would perfer Kuat beach although Seminyak is alot quieter it is alot dirtier with rubbish and broken glass frequently seen along the beach/waters edge. So manhy rips formed it was unsafe to swim the whole time we were there (1 week) Make the effort and vsiit nusa dua beach if your looking for the 5 star beaches in bali or always try Kuta beach and find a qutei becach bar top enjoy a few cold bevys.
review: average type personally perfer kuat although seminyak alot quieter alot dirtier rubbish broken glass frequently see along beachwaters edge manhy rip form unsafe swim whole time 1 week make effort vsiit nusa dua look 5 star beach bali always try kuta find qutei becach bar top enjoy cold bevy

Content: OK, Liked the fact, most places, that sold food drinks etc, had a decent toilet facilities....  didnt like the sun bed owners, trying "it on"  IE charge what ever price, that suits them. Or you have to batter!!!!!!  Not for a sun lounger..
review: ok like fact place sell food drink etc decent toilet facility didnt sun bed owner try ie charge price suit batter sun lounger

Content: Great place for sunset. Get an cocktail, listen to the bands and enjoy the view. During daytime many surfers, tourists and dogs.
review: great place sunset cocktail listen band enjoy view daytime many surfer tourist dog

Content: Cleaner than Kuta beach and less touts around the place.Heaps of waterfront restaurant and bars with live music and tables, bean bags, shade options on the beach to see the beautiful Seminyak sunset.Good nightlife in a more upmarket environment compared to the beaches of Legian and Kuta.
review: clean kuta less tout around placeheaps waterfront restaurant bar live music table bean bag shade option see beautiful seminyak sunsetgood nightlife upmarket environment compare beach legian kuta

Content: The very ew is quite amazing, don't always buy food at the restaurants along the beach go for a walk and get some of the tasty cobs of corn cooked by the vendors it is very tasty and cheap.
review: ew quite amazing dont always buy food restaurant along go walk tasty cob corn cook vendor tasty cheap

Content: We stayed at a beautiful resort in Seminyak and although the resort was fantastic, the beach and sea were quite dirty. The sand was grey with chunks of plastic and other debris. The water was also full of trash. Very disappointing to travel so far and find the beach in such condition.😔
review: stay beautiful resort seminyak although resort fantastic sea quite dirty sand grey chunk plastic debris water full trash disappoint travel far find condition

Content: waters warm not my type but great for learning to surf as this is really shallow. good for kids and family , be careful with the sun as its black sand
review: water warm type great learning surf really shallow good kid family careful sun black sand

Content: Honestly do not even bother going there! I was appalled when I saw how nasty this beach is. I mean Bali does not have nice beaches at all unless you are a surfer but this one is one of the worst. It just looks like you are at Brighton beach , NYC. The water is black, the sand is black with litter everywhere, the lounge chairs are 100 years old and vendors haggle you for a pedicure or a sarong every 5 minute! I had to leave to go to Kuta beach which is also disgusting. Bali is definitely NOT the place to go if you want turquoise water and white sand beaches!
review: honestly even bother go appalled saw nasty mean bali nice beach unless surfer one one worst look brighton nyc water black sand black litter everywhere lounge chair 100 year old vendor haggle pedicure sarong every 5 minute leave go kuta disgust bali definitely place go want turquoise water white sand beach

Content: Lovely beach and perfect for romantic stroll or a surfing session!vendors selling beer and soft drinks and snacks!enjoy 😉
review: lovely perfect romantic stroll surf sessionvendors sell beer soft drink snacksenjoy

Content: The beach is beautiful, less crowded than Legian Beach..You can come here just for relaxing..One of the top beach in Bali
review: beautiful less crowded legian beachyou come relaxingone top bali

Content: First visit in January 2016 was great. Unfortunately in November 2017 the beach was dirty. Every day. Nobody clean it
review: first visit january 2016 great unfortunately november 2017 dirty every day nobody clean

Content: This is a nice beach for walking on the sand. It's relatively flat with high waves that moves back-and-forth. Not that suitable for swimming. Probably good for surfing. Sunset view is spectacular. I enjoyed it.
review: nice walk sand relatively flat high wave move backandforth suitable swimming probably good surf sunset view spectacular enjoy

Content: When on holiday in the area we regularly met up with friends and family on this beach which is just wonderful - easy to get cheap beer and food on the beach or very nearby.  If in the area a must visit.
review: holiday area regularly meet friend family wonderful easy cheap beer food nearby area must visit

Content: Lovely beach, be prepared for hawkers selling stuff. But overall great beach to visit. Plently of places to eat and relax.
review: lovely prepared hawker sell stuff overall great visit plently place eat relax

Content: Pristine white sandy beach. Ideal place to relax or swim. Located in the vicinity of a chain of high end hotels. Amazing sunset views

Content: The beach is generally clean and there is room for everyone. There are sun lounges and umbrella, bean bags and kites flying overhead. You can even have a surf lesson. There are some hawkers, but they go away if unwanted.  Great sunsets.
review: generally clean room everyone sun lounge umbrella bean bag kit fly overhead even surf lesson hawker go away unwanted great sunset

Content: Visited this beach on 19 th April with my wife and son. Although it's a sunny day we felt comfortable with cool breeze from the sea. As we relaxed in one of the beautifully arranged big umbrellas for shade,our son enjoyed the surfing. Nice place to spend leasurly.
review: visit 19 th april wife son although sunny day felt comfortable cool breeze sea relax one beautifully arrange big umbrella shadeour son enjoy surf nice place spend leasurly

Content: You must visit this place to view sunset ! Beach is full of people who gather around 5 pm to click ..

Content: This is a broad, fairly maintained, if a bit rough patch of surf.  We walked up and down it at least once.  There were a few people out.  Some fisherman to avoid, too.
review: broad fairly maintain bit rough patch surf walk least people fisherman avoid

Content: very dirty from the blown in rubbish. wouldn't not recommend as a relaxing beach to hang out at. very different from Australia's clean beaches
review: dirty blown rubbish wouldnt recommend relax hang different australia clean beach

Content: The beach was filthy but at least they don't hassle you.  rubbish and what looked like a sewage film with no evidence that anything is being done about it. Sadly litter generally in Indonesia doesn't seem to be an issue that is being addressed as everywhere I have been has the same problem. I know that we as tourists have a responsibility to do what we can and I hope that most of us do.  we don't think we will come back to Bali.
review: filthy least dont hassle rubbish look sewage film evidence anything do sadly litter generally indonesia doesnt seem issue address everywhere problem know tourist responsibility hope u dont think will come back bali

Content: nice clean beach, the beach sellers get very annoying though. There are no lifesavers so you need to watch out if you have children.
review: nice clean seller annoy though lifesaver need watch child

Content: Such a shame that fellow travellers don't put their rubbish in the beach , they have ruined this beach .
review: shame fellow traveller dont put rubbish ruin

Content: Rubbish in the water makes this side of Bali a very sorry sight. People from the sunset clubs on the beach leave there rubbish behind and then you find yourself swimming in the ocean with hundreds of plastic bottles and rubbish. Stick to your pool side resorts!!!
review: rubbish water make side bali sorry sight people sunset club leave rubbish behind find swim ocean hundred plastic bottle rubbish stick pool side resort

Content: Great beach with white sand. There are sun loungers to hire with big umbrellas. There are hawkers trying to sell you things but they go on their way once you indicate you are not interested.
review: great white sand sun lounger hire big umbrella hawker try sell thing go way indicate interested

Content: The beach is not as famous as other beaches because it has lost its popularity due to cleanliness issue. However, this does not bother me that much. I just wanted to lie down and enjoy a sunset view. Lack of popularity now makes it slightly comfortable because it was not crowded.
review: famous beach lose popularity due cleanliness issue bother much want lie enjoy sunset view lack popularity now make slightly comfortable crowd

Content: great beach but bargin for chairs w umbrella.. I paid 80,000 they started at 200,000. gado gado restaurant is at the beach ..great but expensive.
review: great bargin chair w umbrella pay 80000 start 200000 gado gado restaurant great expensive

Content: Seminyak beach has its nice spots, but it has mostly turned into a tourist spot. Living in Australia I'm used to beautiful beaches, and to be honest Seminyak is pretty dirty. Waves are good for beginner surfers though, and it's easy to get here.
review: seminyak nice spot mostly turn tourist spot live australia im use beautiful beach honest seminyak pretty dirty wave good beginner surfer though easy

Content: Seminyak beach has to be on any Bali checklist. The Sunsets are super colourful with the umbrellas of La Plancha adding up to the scene! Good music, cocktails and vibes overall at the beach.
review: seminyak bali checklist sunset super colourful umbrella la plancha add scene good music cocktail vibes overall

Content: Beaches on the west coast tend to be quite rough and many had flags out saying swimming prohibited.  Lots of daybeds with umbrellas around to hire (about $2 or $3 AUS per day).  Beach sands were mainly volcanic, nice and dark.

Content: Quite crowded.Not very pretty - a bit dirty.Can be good for some water sports - saw people taking beginner's surfing classes, surfing on their own, water ski etc.

Content: Go there before 5 pm. Grab some beer and enjoy the sunset. The children do have a lot of fun. There are good eating joints along and  just outside the beach.
review: go 5 pm grab beer enjoy sunset child lot fun good eating joint along outside

Content: I was very disappointed in my trip here having heard so much about Seminyak and its beachReally this is just one very long beach that stretches from Kuta and beyond Seminyak.With so many 'world' restaurants I was hard pressed to find one serving the local food.the beach vendors (of which there are many) were pushy which added to my sad trip to this place.Basically the tourists have pretty much ruined these places in Bali, too many people for the infrastructure and everyone trying to get their $ from the tourists (and you cannot blame them)
review: disappointed trip heard much seminyak beachreally one long stretch kuta beyond seminyakwith many world restaurant hard press find one serve local foodthe vendor many pushy add sad trip placebasically tourists pretty much ruin place bali many people infrastructure everyone try tourist blame

Content: This beach is definitely not for swimming!  But it's fun to hang out on!! You'll find many people walking along the beach.
review: definitely swim fun hang youll find many people walk along

Content: Amazing beach and the sea is amazing the waves are dangerous but also fun and swimmable . The evening are really good with bean bags with live bands watching the sunset.

Content: I'm in love with Bali.. great beach, beanbag bars , live music, amazing sunsets ( don't get caught with people offering foot massage, we paid €12 small money but you can get a full body massage in a spa for €9)
review: im love bali great beanbag bar live music amazing sunset dont caught people offer foot massage pay 12 small money full body massage spa 9

Content: We had a great sunset view from Seminyak Beach during our visit in March 2016. Beach was clean and pleasant

Content: Lovely at sundown but so many hawkers! If you can put up with trying to relax but be awoken by the locals aiming to sell then youll love it. Great bars & restaurants
review: lovely sundown many hawker put try relax awoken local aim sell youll love great bar restaurant

Content: Ten minutes leisurely walk from the Marriott where we were staying. Crowded every evening with people socialising and watching the sun set.
review: ten minute leisurely walk marriott stay crowd every evening people socialise watch sun set

Content: Just returned from Seminyak and visited the beach on a few occasions. We found it very nice and great for a relaxing drink at sunset.Previous posters have commented that it was dirty. Yes the sand is sort of black but maybe that is it's natural hue. Dirty?......I'm not sure of that.In saying that, we were only there from sunset for a few hours, and found it lively and very relaxing.
review: return seminyak visited occasion find nice great relax drink sunsetprevious poster comment dirty yes sand sort black maybe natural hue dirtyim sure thatin say sunset hour find lively relax

Content: Clean than Kuta but not as nice as Jimbaran Beach.. Waves are good for surfers, but make swimming dangerous
review: clean kuta nice jimbaran wave good surfer make swim dangerous

Content: Seminyak beach is definitely not white sand which I prefer, but the beach itself is dirty and full of trash. There is really nothing special for me with this beach
review: seminyak definitely white sand prefer dirty full trash really nothing special

Content: Great spot to sit in bean bagd and watch sunset whilst drinking Bintangs.Only down side is rubbish left on beach

Content: Nice place to relax on a deck chair and have on of the beach boys look after all your needs and get you beers as well.

Content: good ...all is good and comfort to stay amd sleep amd eating. i will recommend my friend if visit bali stay at this hotel at seminyak
review: good good comfort stay amd sleep amd eating will recommend friend visit bali stay hotel seminyak

Content: Very very pretty at sunset and at night but during day just not that greatRubbish on beach which was disappointing Rips like nobody's business and tonnes of idiots swimming in there !Constant hagglers too who were pretty damn persistentStick to pool until 4 pm!

Content: heaven beach with turquoize ocean, white sand and friendly balinese, really love it! Also great for surfing
review: heaven turquoize ocean white sand friendly balinese really love great surfing

Content: Lots going on, many facilities for food, drinks, and activities. Easy to stroll most areas with some quiet spots and some very active. A great mix.
review: lot go many facility food drink activity easy stroll area quiet spot active great mix

Content: Amazing experience, lively colours, bargains, music, warm summer breeze, dinner and drinks in sunset set
review: amaze experience lively colour bargain music warm summer breeze dinner drink sunset set

Content: Bali my favorite place on this earth, I’m feeling so happy and relax, take your time and have a great holiday
review: bali favorite place earth im feeling happy relax take time great holiday

Content: We loved this beach.. Best for body surfing. 6-8 foot waves so not for little kids.. The water was refreshing. The best sunset every evening.
review: love best body surf 68 foot wave little kid water refresh best sunset every evening

Content: This beach can be a little busy, its not like our beaches in aussie, the sand is black as it is volcanic, overall the beach is good, the sunsets are amazing, great for a day relaxing on the sun lounges and watching the sunsets.
review: little busy beach aussie sand black volcanic overall good sunset amaze great day relax sun lounge watch sunset

Content: Kuta Beach is just 5 min by car away but it's worth.For hidden dream beaches you're at the wrong place , but for cheap drinks or coconuts you will get good offers.
review: kuta 5 min car away worthfor hidden dream beach youre wrong place cheap drink coconut will good offer

Content: a wonderful long beach with nice waves, however, the east side of Bali has the wind from the right direction.
review: wonderful long nice wave east side bali wind right direction

Content: I have to say, I wasn't impressed with Seminyak Beach. I just can't put my finger on it. Was it the putrid sand, the litter strewn from one end to the other, the broken glass? I even saw a guy with a dog throwing a light bulb into the ocean for the dog to retrieve, yep - a lightbulb!. Of course on one toss it broke and sunk for some unsuspecting person to cut their foot open on.It's not even pretty to look at, and doesn't compare to the thousands of golden beaches we have here in Oz.
review: say wasnt impressed seminyak cant put finger putrid sand litter strew one end broken glass even saw guy dog throw light bulb ocean dog retrieve yep lightbulb course one toss break sunk unsuspecting person cut foot open onits even pretty look doesnt compare thousand golden beach oz

Content: This is really quite a nice place to visit. I'd recommend getting here an hour before sunset, finding some bean bags at one of the beach bars and ordering some drinks and appetisers to watch the sunset.It's a nice vibe and most of the bars are either playing Balearic beats or have live acoustic musicians going on.It does get busy, but it's nicely chilled out and an enjoyable way to watch the sunset.There are lots of vendors walking past trying to sell you trinkets, but they aren't pushy and a gentle wave off sends them on to someone else.Plenty of places around for food and drink too.
review: really quite nice place visit id recommend get hour sunset find bean bag one bar order drink appetiser watch sunsetits nice vibe bar either play balearic beat live acoustic musician go onit busy nicely chill enjoyable way watch sunsetthere lots vendor walk past try sell trinket arent pushy gentle wave send someone elseplenty place around food drink

Content: Unfortunately the beach becomes very dirty due the the trash washing in to the ocean when it rains. But on so he days it was very clean and a wonderful beach to spend the day on. Beach loungers are available for rent. Many restaurants are available .some surfing schools offer lessons.
review: unfortunately become dirty due trash wash ocean rain day clean wonderful spend day lounger available rent many restaurant available surf school offer lesson

Content: Certainly a great spot to watch the sunset but is spoilt somewhat by the amount of rubbish near the waterline and in some places along the top of the beach.
review: certainly great spot watch sunset spoil somewhat amount rubbish near waterline place along top

Content: Seminyak beach is nice and clean. I found it some parts is is very busy and loud and other parts it is very quiet.I had an ocean view room at the hotel I was staying and the view was very relaxing.
review: seminyak nice clean find part busy loud part quieti ocean view room hotel stay view relax

Content: The beach is nice, and the water is warm, and it is a great place to learn to surf.  However, there are a dodgy smells and it would be nice to see a bit more care with cleaning up rubbish, etc.  The locals offer goods for sale, but they don't hassle you so that is fine.
review: nice water warm great place learn surf dodgy smell nice see bit care clean rubbish etc local offer good sale dont hassle fine

Content: It's a beach, it is clean and ad you'd expect has a good selection of lounger for the day. 50,000 seems to be the going rate. Some do towel hire too.The hawkers are there but not intrusive.  You will pay a bit of a premium for drinks the closer you are to the big hotels but the warungs rather than the beach huts offer better value and reasonable food. Try cantina to the right of W. Has a decent toilet too.Watch the current, it is strong and swim only where there is a lifeguard.
review: clean ad youd expect good selection lounger day 50000 seem go rate towel hire toothe hawker intrusive will pay bit premium drink closer big hotel warungs rather hut offer good value reasonable food try cantina right w decent toilet toowatch current strong swim lifeguard

Content: I want to first make a disclaimer that I went into this trip believing I would see crystal clear blue waters. Unfortunately that isn't what this beach looks like. Aside from the fact that the sand was as soft as silk the water was brown-ish. What a let down! The water was less than a foot deep for as far as I could see. Which did make for a great place for me to make my first attempt at surfing!
review: want first make disclaimer go trip believing see crystal clear blue water unfortunately isnt look aside fact sand soft silk water brownish let water less foot deep far see make great place make first attempt surf

Content: During sunset and after sunset on this beach the bars have live music and often 'happy hour' cocktails. Easy to have a few great nights.
review: sunset sunset bar live music often happy hour cocktail easy great night

Content: all the beaches in Bali are very beautifulSeminyak beach is located next to Double Six Beachhas its own beauty while enjoying the sunset
review: beach bali beautifulseminyak locate next double six beachhas beauty enjoy sunset

Content: There are many resorts near this beach and quite a few restaurants right on the beach with lawn chairs facing the water. There is less trash than on kuta beach, mostly just a little more effort to keep it clean but still trash around. There are a lot of people but it does have nice sunset views and seemed to be a decent surfing spot
review: many resort near quite restaurant right lawn chair face water less trash kuta mostly little effort keep clean still trash around lot people nice sunset view seem decent surfing spot

Content: I have to say that surfing there is awesome, as the breaks are big and you have a great time. Also the bars and cafes around are allright. on the other hand, the beach sometimes smells bad and there is some garbage around, homeless dogs also wonder around. If you are looking for good surf that's the place, but don't expect crystaline water and sand.
review: say surf awesome break big great time bar cafes around allright hand sometimes smell bad garbage around homeless dog wonder around look good surf thats place dont expect crystaline water sand

Content: Go in low season the beach is not that packed..u can get beautiful sunset scenery..ur kids can play in clean sand and catch the wave..a lots of beach club around if u want to sit back and relax.or just bring your own beach blanket(if u want to pay 100.000idr u can rent a beach chair).
review: go low season packedu beautiful sunset sceneryur kid play clean sand catch wavea lot club around u want sit back relaxor bring blanketif u want pay 100000idr u rent chair

Content: This beach offers you all comforts you can imagine: high waves for surfing, glassy surface during low tide; broad beach for jogging and games, strong push back during high tide; party beach with drinks and music or calm places back of the sea; spectacular sun downs as well as tropical thunderstorms; a happy and joyful get together of all nationalities regardless of any religion...this is how beach life should look like!
review: offer comfort imagine high wave surf glassy surface low tide broad jogging game strong push back high tide party drink music calm place back sea spectacular sun down well tropical thunderstorm happy joyful together nationality regardless religionthis life look

Content: You could get four couches for 50,000 per hour for the four, if you shop aroundGood fun trying surfingBeer o'clock lots of nice places after three hours in surf and sun
review: four couch 50000 per hour four shop aroundgood fun try surfingbeer oclock lot nice place three hour surf sun

Content: I'm always disappointed by Seminyak beach. It's not always clean.  Sometimes the hawkers get really annoying.
review: im always disappoint seminyak always clean sometimes hawker really annoy

Content: Spent the day at Seminyak beach ,it would no be a beach I would bring kids to ,tere is a lot of rubbish in the water and broken beer bottles in the sand not very safe for swimming either as tere was a strong rip beers was cheap $2.50 per bottle of Bintang
review: spent day seminyak bring kid tere lot rubbish water break beer bottle sand safe swimming either tere strong rip beer cheap 250 per bottle bintang

Content: Given, we do travel a lot. But this is, by far, the ugliest beach I ever saw. Yellow sand (not white as some say, or you have to be totally wasted), dirty (plastic) everywhere, beach 'bars' not taken care of, all playing their own music at the same time, etc. By far the worst beach experience ever.
review: give travel lot far ugly saw yellow sand white say totally wasted dirty plastic everywhere bar take care play music time etc far bad experience

Content: Really big waves- would be good for surfing. Sand is fairly fine. No where to keep our stuff so had to take it in turns going in the sea
review: really big wave good surfing sand fairly fine keep stuff take turn go sea

Content: Iconic beach, no white sands. A lot of vendors bothering you.Not entirely clean, seen better beaches, quite touristy. Untidy beanbags. Roaming dogs.In general ok, good for young people, noisy and a lot of Australians.Must not forget Bali/Indonesia is a relatively poor country. I am pleased for the locals that tourism brings much needed revenue. On the whole enjoyable but with some reservations.
review: iconic white sand lot vendor bother younot entirely clean see well beach quite touristy untidy beanbag roam dogsin general ok good young people noisy lot australiansmust forget baliindonesia relatively poor country please local tourism bring much need revenue whole enjoyable reservation

Content: This beach has a bit of something for everyone.  It seems a bit north of Jl. Camplung Tanduk is the quieter area with lots of rentable beach chairs and space for water activities.  It was far from overcrowded.  South of the street began the row of bars, restaurants, and related party atmosphere.  Much more crowded.  Lots of conflicting noises on that side.  But there were plenty of waves when we visited and the water is warm.  Some dogs around but they mostly prefer the sunshine to people.  So it's a nice public beach everyone (adults and families alike) can enjoy.
review: bit something everyone seem bit north jl camplung tanduk quiet area lot rentable chair space water activity far overcrowd south street begin row bar restaurant related party atmosphere much crowd lot conflict noise side plenty wave visit water warm dog around mostly prefer sunshine people nice public everyone adults family alike enjoy

Content: Beautiful and Nice beach.The sun is hot.The chair from the beach Rupiah 150000 is costly.No massage on the beach?
review: beautiful nice beachthe sun hotthe chair rupiah 150000 costlyno massage

Content: Went for a wander down to the beach last night and got the shock of my life. There where hundreds of beanbags and people sitting watching the sun set it was amazing. Restaurants all the way along with very friendly staff and great service. Bands played the whole time we were there. Definitely a must to do at night while on Seminyak
review: go wander last night get shock life hundred beanbags people sit watch sun set amaze restaurant way along friendly staff great service band play whole time definitely must night seminyak

Content: We walked the length of the beaches from petitenget to Kuta and stopped at Seminyak as it was the nicest part. There are fewer hawkers (although still quite a lot) and it is less busy but still had a great vibe. There are also restaurants on the actual sand which there aren't at Kuta. We stopped at Taris beach bar which was particularly good, with nice seating out front and very reasonable prices which included tax and service charges (unlike most places). The sand was lovely and soft (although too hot in the midday sun) and the water was great. Seemed a great spot for surfing too with lots of people learning in this area. Would definitely recommend it!
review: walked length beach petitenget kuta stop seminyak nice part few hawker although still quite lot less busy still great vibe restaurant actual sand arent kuta stop taris bar particularly good nice seat front reasonable price include tax service charge unlike place sand lovely soft although hot midday sun water great seem great spot surf lots people learn area definitely recommend

Content: This beach is peaceful yet lively one surrounded by many resorts and beach bars. We were mostly at the side where Hotel Alila Seminyak was and there were lots of people walking by the beach and enjoy the beautiful scenery. Would love to be back!!
review: peaceful yet lively one surround many resort bar mostly side hotel alila seminyak lot people walk enjoy beautiful scenery love back

Content: This beach is great to watch the sunset and sit at one of the many beachside bars and restaurants. Most of them have cushions and beanbags to sit at and enjoy the beach views. The beach is clean but watch out for your belongings as this place has a reputation for pickpocketing. There are a lot of people on the beach trying to sell you things. It's best to bargain the price at least to 50% and definitely say no if you don't want it because they are very pushy. Other than that, this beach is great for the whole family.
review: great watch sunset sit one many beachside bar restaurant cushion beanbags sit enjoy view clean watch belonging place reputation pickpocketing lot people try sell thing best bargain price least 50 definitely say dont want pushy great whole family

Content: We walked here from our hotel for our first look at the beach in Bali. The seas were high and the beach was quiet so we had a easy walk from Ku DeTa up to Petinget beach and back.
review: walked hotel first look bali seas high quiet easy walk ku deta petinget back

Content: I like the beach, coffee plantation and rice plantation.  The food in Bali is very good. One of the Indonesia restaurant known as Warung Mina located at Jln Kayu Putih No. 19, the food is excellent and value for money.
review: coffee plantation rice plantation food bali good one indonesia restaurant know warung mina locate jln kayu putih 19 food excellent value money

Content: Enjoyed lots of walksOn the beach Lots of people about some on chairs and loungers enjoying the sunsets.Good views along the long beach-front.  A 'must visit' at and before sunset!!
review: enjoy lot walkson lot people chair lounger enjoy sunsetsgood view along long beachfront must visit sunset

Content: Loved this beach! Ran on it every morning. Surfed, swam and sunbathed during the day and enjoyed the beach restaurants with live music every night! Paradise!
review: love ran every morning surfed swam sunbathe day enjoy restaurant live music every night paradise

Content: A wonderful place to sit back relax and watch the sun set while listening to great live music.Jus sit back in your bean bag, enjoy a drink, meal or even a massage. Fantastic spot.
review: wonderful place sit back relax watch sun set listen great live musicjus sit back bean bag enjoy drink meal even massage fantastic spot

Content: it is nice beach with a lot of bars where you can spend you time. most of people are tourists. have great sunset.
review: nice lot bar spend time people tourist great sunset

Content: The hype is totally justified! Try anything and it will be amazing. I LOVED the pancakes! Staff is awesome!
review: hype totally justified try anything will amaze loved pancake staff awesome

Content: We went for a walk on  Seminyak beach 2 days ago and were horrified to find how filthy and littered with rubbish it was. There is no beauty to this beach and even upon finding Ku De Ta (by mistake) we wouldnt have known it was there as the beach there was still filthy. There was rubbish in piles and mounds everywhere. Will not be back to Scuminyak beach nor will we suggest it to anyone :-(
review: go walk seminyak 2 day ago horrify find filthy littered rubbish beauty even upon find ku de ta mistake wouldnt know still filthy rubbish pile mound everywhere will back scuminyak will suggest anyone

Content: Very enjoyable beach paradise with many beachside restaurants and bars good food and drinking options.Lots of shops nearbyGreat poolbars restarantsMassage spas etc
review: enjoyable paradise many beachside restaurant bar good food drink optionslots shop nearbygreat poolbars restarantsmassage spas etc

Content: Great beach frequented only by tourists during the day and locals in the evening. Enjoyed the end of the day with a beautiful sunset and very good cocktails.
review: great frequented tourist day local even enjoyed end day beautiful sunset good cocktail

Content: I have been coming to Bali for 35 years and today the beach was the cleanest I have ever seen. We walked from the temple near Laluciola to Jl Melasti and the beach was very clean. Congratulations to the beach staff for a job well done.Terima Kasih
review: come bali 35 year today cleanest see walked temple near laluciola jl melasti clean congratulation staff job well doneterima kasih

Content: We recently stayed in Seminyak for 2 days and had just a few short steps to walk down to the beach. Unfortunately, the tide had brought in a lot of rubbish and there was hardly anyone in the water.We were told that the beach is cleaned every morning, but when the tide comes in, so does all the rubbish :(My best advice would be to got to the beach early in the morning, just after it has been cleaned.
review: recently stay seminyak 2 day short step walk unfortunately tide bring lot rubbish hardly anyone waterwe tell clean every morning tide come rubbish best advice get early morning clean

Content: Wonderful way to spend the day. We had a separate part of the beach due to the Marriott so no crowding, friendly attendant. Free water, lounges, towels, and wifi. Top notch.
review: wonderful way spend day separate part due marriott crowd friendly attendant free water lounge towel wifi top notch

Content: all restaurant facities are fantastic, the food is great and the staff are freindly and helpful, it is the people of Bali who make the holiday experinec what it is - amazing
review: restaurant facities fantastic food great staff freindly helpful people bali make holiday experinec amaze

Content: The beach is vast and glorious. You see many activities taking place here and can purchase many things from your towel such as scarves, jewellery, food and drink. Surf lessons are offered and both surf boards and body boards are available for rent at a decent price. You can also hire beds near the hotels. When we went 'swimming' however we struggled with the size and ferocity of the waves. It was great fun trying to body surf the waves and I'd totally go again. A close eye would be needed to be kept on children in and around the water.
review: vast glorious see many activity take place purchase many thing towel scarf jewellery food drink surf lesson offer surf board body board available rent decent price hire bed near hotel go swim struggle size ferocity wave great fun try body surf wave id totally go close eye need kept child around water

Content: Seminyak beach is a nice beach but not amazing by any means. Expect black sand though . You can get cheap cold bintang from the guys at the top and rent beach chairs for 100,000 rupiah . There are many sellers up and down the beach . Wasn’t to busy in the month of May .
review: seminyak nice amazing mean expect black sand though cheap cold bintang guy top rent chair 100000 rupiah many seller wasnt busy month may

Content: My boyfriend and I much prefer this beach over the many others we have been to thus far. In the evening the whole vibe on the beach is wonderful... lots of live music, hooka, beanbag chairs and lanterns you can light to the sky if you choose.
review: boyfriend much prefer many others thus far even whole vibe wonderful lot live music hooka beanbag chair lanterns light sky choose

Content: Enjoyed our days by the beach watching the surfers tackling sometimes crazy waves... beach is very clean & the beach sellers very friendly & accept it when you do not wish to be bothered. Make sure you negotiate your price for sun beds & umbrella.At sunset grab a beanbag & a Bintang & watch the sun go down, absolutely amazing & well worth doing.....
review: enjoy day watch surfer tackle sometimes crazy wave clean seller friendly accept wish bother make sure negotiate price sun bed umbrellaat sunset grab beanbag bintang watch sun go absolutely amaze well worth

Content: Unfortunately with current beach covered in pollution, they did have signs up apologizing for it, effort was been made to clean it up! Water was warm rough, great for surfing, unfortunately no swimming was permitted during the week 1 was there signs everywhere!
review: unfortunately current cover pollution sign apologize effort make clean water warm rough great surf unfortunately swim permit week 1 sign everywhere

Content: Awesome western sunsets into the Water with well priced beers sun beds and restaurants. Great swimming and fun for the whole family.
review: awesome western sunset water well price beer sun bed restaurant great swim fun whole family

Content: The Seminyak beach is long and wide, you can walk, walk and walk or stay wherever you want and watch people. Sunsets are so beautiful! Sea is not too quiet but you can still enjoy it. Beach is clean (city workers continuously clean it).
review: seminyak long wide walk walk walk stay wherever want watch people sunsets beautiful sea quiet still enjoy clean city worker continuously clean

Content: There is no real direction to the beach in seminyak. One end is carpark and the other is through the hotels and resorts. There is no board walk as such. If your staying in one of the hotels on the beach that would be fine.
review: real direction seminyak one end carpark hotel resort board walk stay one hotel fine

Content: Very nice beach with a lot of restaurants. I found the quality of the restaurants at the beach very poor. But it is very nice to watch the sunset on a beanbag.
review: nice lot restaurant find quality restaurant poor nice watch sunset beanbag

Content: I love Seminyak Beach <3. come often here just to watch the sunset, walking along the beach watching people riding horse (if ure lucky ;)). i love to spend my evening time in Seminyak beach and double six beach..
review: love seminyak 3 come often watch sunset walking along watch people rid horse ure lucky love spend evening time seminyak double six

Content: Great place for the wedding photos whilst the sun was setting. We all gathered here to watch all the activities happening on the beach  and to revel in the tranquility of the waves rolling in. At that time it wasn't too crowded.
review: great place wed photo whilst sun setting gather watch activity happen revel tranquility wave rolling time wasnt crowd

Content: Good destination for a few days if passing through. Local government together with hotels needs to try to tackle the issue otherwise people will stop coming.
review: good destination day pass local government together hotel need try tackle issue people will stop come

Content: its very dirty lots of people pestering you if i had children would not let their feet touch the floor
review: dirty lot people pester child let foot touch floor

Content: A wonderful beach with plenty of room nice waves and a big variety of restaurants and bars. Lay back and relax and enjoy your Holliday!
review: wonderful plenty room nice wave big variety restaurant bar lay back relax enjoy holliday

Content: Walked five minutes down the road from our hotel to Seminyak beach and what a disappointment!! Black sand, stray dogs sleeping under chairs, rubbish and hawkers selling their wares. Only upside was the water was warm. Preferred to stay at our hotels man made beach
review: walk five minute road hotel seminyak disappointment black sand stray dog sleep chair rubbish hawker sell ware upside water warm prefer stay hotel man make

Content: I entered near the W hotel. I must admit I didn't go very far. To me it was not a beach where you lay down and sunbathe so was quickly of again
review: enter near w hotel must admit didnt go far lay sunbathe quickly

Content: Dissapointment after Nusa Dua quiet beaches. This beach was a party beach, noicy, grouded and parties all night long.
review: dissapointment nusa dua quiet beach party noicy grouded party night long

Content: the beach was polluted with sewage going down to the water  that you need to walk through to get to some of the restaurants. the bean bags at the beach was nice with a great atmosphere its just the sewage that killed is for our romantic walk
review: polluted sewage go water need walk restaurant bean bag nice great atmosphere sewage kill romantic walk

Content: This place has views that are priceless however the beach was dirty and rubbish blowing all around you, people constantly badgering you selling their items was a pain and not the best place we felt for safety. View yes beach no it was nasty ,who goes to a beach to pick a spot sitting there with rubbish at the side of them. We chose here for our wedding vow renewal and were very disappointed, don’t bank on this place for a wedding shot there is so much better places then here in the hills by the rice fields Bali struggles at best.We had to clear rubbish first as there was no gaps on the beach as there was already rubbish there and strangely enough a person came along to pick it up removed leaves from the trees that had fallen on the beach and left the rubbish go figure very odd. The view yes but just to get this shot alone yep we had to turn in to rubbish collectors before our wedding vow renewal not ideal but we had flown so far it was poor to say the least not a great start for a special day.
