Content: Seminyak beach is less crowded than Kuta, still a lot of rubbish and debris in the ocean and on the shore.Nice enough to kick back and relax with a Bintang. Many resorts back into the beach.The wet season clouds make for a beautiful sunset.
review: seminyak less crowded kuta still lot rubbish debris ocean shorenice enough kick back relax bintang many resort back beachthe wet season cloud make beautiful sunset

Content: Great place to visit with the kids, I even managed to get around with my double stroller. Restaurants are a lil bit pricy for a family if comparing to the rest of Bali.
review: great place visit kid even manage around double stroller restaurant lil bit pricy family compare rest bali

Content: Seyminak Beach is beautiful when you first see it. The waves are crazy and it is a long and impressive. However, I was a bit disappointed as it was pretty dirty in places and sewage smell was also quite strong in certain sections. Also I was there in July and there were massive crowds. I would save my time for the beach in a better place on the island than here.
review: seyminak beautiful first see wave crazy long impressive bit disappointed pretty dirty place sewage smell quite strong certain section july massive crowd save time well place island

Content: One of the coziest beach experience i have ever had. everything was just perfect.There are a lot of options available with bean bag type couches you can just chill on.Beer and food are nicely priced and you can just enjoy all that with the view of the sunset plus with live music playing in the background (they accept requests), you can even sing along with the band if you wanted to.Just say no to the vendors and they won't bother you anymore.
review: one cozy experience everything perfectthere lot option available bean bag type couch chill onbeer food nicely price enjoy view sunset plus live music playing background accept request even sing along band want tojust say vendor wont bother anymore

Content: You cant go past this as a fantastic part of the beach to relax and enjoy the sun, the sunset or an evening meal.   Restaurants that sprawl out onto the sand with bean bags to match make an evening drink and a bite to eat a memorable experience.   This is what tropical holidays are supposed to be like ...
review: cant go past fantastic part relax enjoy sun sunset evening meal restaurant sprawl onto sand bean bag match make even drink bite eat memorable experience tropical holiday suppose

Content: A long shallow beach which felt safe, and provided just enough swell to allow some fun on the boogie boards. It was quite clean (though it looks much nicer at high tide than low), and economical sun beds and umbrellas for hire, along with surf & boogie boards.
review: long shallow felt safe provide enough swell allow fun boogie board quite clean though looks much nicer high tide low economical sun bed umbrellas hire along surf boogie board

Content: Nice beach, worth to go. Will go again. Was great for time lapse video and beach walk. Enjoyed my time there with sunset.
review: nice worth go will go great time lapse video walk enjoy time sunset

Content: It's just another awesome beach to kick off your shoes and find somewhere to stop for lunch or dinner.
review: another awesome kick shoe find somewhere stop lunch dinner

Content: I enjoy going down there at night and during the day. Although a little expensive for drinks the atmosphere is great.
review: enjoy go night day although little expensive drink atmosphere great

Content: Great surfing beach that is very affordable compared to US and LatAm even. Beers also are abundant and cheap. Not the most amazing beach in the world. Dont go there if you are expecting the famous picturesque clear water Bali beaches. Probably better to go to Nusa Dua.Also, the water is a bit dirty unfortunately :(End the day at KuDeTa or Potato Head for fancier drinks
review: great surf affordable compare u latam even beer abundant cheap amazing world dont go expect famous picturesque clear water bali beach probably well go nusa duaalso water bit dirty unfortunately end day kudeta potato head fancier drink

Content: We spent hours just strolling on this beautiful beach and tried some bars along the promenade. Very nice to see sunset also.
review: spent hour stroll beautiful tried bar along promenade nice see sunset

Content: OK, the actual beach is pretty grim - used syringes and nappies washed up. But go to one of the beach bars to watch the sunset, you will not be disappointed. Just steer clear of the actual shoreline, if you want a strip of sand go further up towards Potato Head
review: ok actual pretty grim use syrinx nappy wash go one bar watch sunset will disappoint steer clear actual shoreline want strip sand go towards potato head

Content: The beach is less crowded compare to Kuta. The waves are decent for beginner to start learning how to surf. Many vendors for board rentals, and the boards are much better shape compare to those in Kuta. I paid 50k IDR for 1 hour of long board soft top rental. But negotiated for lower rate when I rent more than 1 board or took it longer than 1 hour. Lot's of cafes too on the beach ground so you can relax and enjoy watching sunset afterwards. No public shower place, if I am not mistaken (Kuta has them).Lately people are complaining about the thrash in Bali beaches. When I ask a local, he said that there is periodical clean-ups of these beaches. So just before this you might encounter a very dirty beach. But I guess most of the time they are allright.
review: less crowd compare kuta wave decent beginner start learn surf many vendor board rentals board much good shape compare kuta pay 50k idr 1 hour long board soft top rental negotiate low rate rent 1 board take long 1 hour lot cafes ground relax enjoy watch sunset afterwards public shower place mistake kuta themlately people complain thrash bali beach ask local say periodical cleanup beach might encounter dirty guess time allright

Content: Dinner at Gado Gado at sunset just the best, the food was of the highest quality, if you get the chance soft shell crab is absolutely stunning
review: dinner gado gado sunset best food high quality chance soft shell crab absolutely stun

Content: The Seminyak Beach has several things going for it: fine sand, a deep beachfront and non-overcrowding (unlike Kuta). However, the main drawback is that there is little else in the way of things to do. No snorkeling, no diving, no surfing etc.One hour is more than sufficient for this beach.
review: seminyak several thing go fine sand deep beachfront nonovercrowding unlike kuta main drawback little way thing snorkel dive surf etcone hour sufficient

Content: We were not impressed at all with the beach in Seminyak. The locals told us it was because of the rain and storms which has washed all the rubbish ashore and deposited it in the beach, the place was so dirty and just disappointed.
review: impressed seminyak local tell u rain storm wash rubbish ashore deposited place dirty disappoint

Content: Many bars and beach clubs along the beach. Loved the beach as it is in general rather clean. It has beautiful and fun waves especially for surfers!
review: many bar club along love general rather clean beautiful fun wave especially surfer

Content: Warm gorgeous blue water. Shallow a long way out. While not the worst we've seen in our travels it is sad to see such a lovely beach with so much plastic and litter. "Hawkers" selling trinkets, ice cream, fruit etc were overall friendly. If you were not interested a simple but firm "no thank you" was sufficient. On average about 50,000 reps for beach chairs for 2 for two people the day.
review: warm gorgeous blue water shallow long way bad weve see travel sad see lovely much plastic litter hawker sell trinket ice cream fruit etc overall friendly interested simple firm thank sufficient average 50000 reps chair 2 two people day

Content: While walking along Seminyak beach just north of Moonlight I crossed a creek. Brown, raw, stinking effluent was pouring into the ocean right near swimmers and surfers. About 200 litres per minute. That's 10 tonnes per hour. When I asked them, the locals knew but didn't care. It was disgusting. The prevailing current carries it northwards.Be warned. Do yourself a favour, surf Double Six instead.
review: walk along seminyak north moonlight cross creek brown raw stink effluent pour ocean right near swimmer surfer 200 litre per minute thats 10 tonne per hour ask local know didnt care disgust prevail current carry northwardsbe warn favour surf double six instead

Content: The beach was very nice,just to get away from The hotel pool. Lots of people wanting to sell u goods,if u dont want to buy just tell them ur not interested. Lots of bargains if u like haggling
review: nicejust away hotel pool lot people want sell u goodsif u dont want buy tell ur interested lot bargain u haggle

Content: The beach is full of toxic garbage coming from the city with the rain flow. Others say that they come from the ocean from the fishing boats. No matter how they come its a terrible view (see 2 pics attached), people come with trucks and clean it every afternoon but they are so many that they can t do anything about it… or many they can? educate their people not tho throw garbage anywhere? of course this takes decades, meantime enjoy the little bar/restaurants on the beach which some of them have gray food!
review: full toxic garbage come city rain flow others say come ocean fishing boat matter come terrible view see 2 pic attached people come truck clean every afternoon many t anything many educate people tho throw garbage anywhere course take decade meantime enjoy little barrestaurants gray food

Content: Seminyak beach is filthy and so is the water. The idea of swimming or relaxing here is unthinkable. It should be cleaned up. It would be a simple matter to organise a Clean up Seminyak Beach event, and I read in one of the local What's On magazines that there is such an event. If it exists, it's not working. Littering should be penalised, as there is litter everywhere.
review: seminyak filthy water idea swim relax unthinkable clean simple matter organise clean seminyak event read one local whats magazine event exist work litter penalise litter everywhere

Content: The local authorities need to do a better job at cleaning up the beach. The water is warm, the beaches are groomed by tractors every morning, but the amount of plastic waste washing up is ongoing. Local beach businesses, wether it’s chair/umbrella, surf lessons or other Independant rental operators do their best to pitch in throughout the day, but it’s a bigger problem that needs a relook at how we as a society treat and use products. Good on Bali for eliminating plastic bags from many shops this year, hopefully it has a positive impact on what would otherwise be a lovely day out to the beach.
review: local authority need good job cleaning water warm beach groom tractor every morning amount plastic waste wash ongoing local business wether chairumbrella surf lesson independant rental operator best pitch throughout day big problem need relook society treat use product good bali eliminate plastic bag many shop year hopefully positive impact lovely day

Content: Clean beach and good for swim.  Nice restaurants in the beach with bean bags thrown around for sitting   Not expensive   Good beach for candid pictures   Good market parallel to the beach
review: clean good swim nice restaurant bean bag throw around sit expensive good candid picture good market parallel

Content: Quite gritty sand more for surfers I think. Went at sundown but it was quite cloudy. Our children (20 & 25 ) went three times & loved it.
review: quite gritty sand surfer think go sundown quite cloudy child 20 25 go three time love

Content: It is a happening place with locals playing  soccer, people swimming and surfing and people chilling with a drink...
review: happen place local play soccer people swim surf people chill drink

Content: This was the first beach I went to in Bali and I expected a lot more from it. We did go in December, but I found that it was very dirty and didn't really like being there. We walked up and down, then went and found something else to do
review: first go bali expect lot go december find dirty didnt really walk go found something

Content: The beach is not as nice as I originally thought, though it is clean enough and quiet. Sadly, it covers with lots of volcanic sand which has made it less attractive.
review: nice originally think though clean enough quiet sadly cover lot volcanic sand make less attractive

Content: Massages tickCold drinks tickBeautiful sunsets tickFriendly people tick This place has it all! 3rd time visiting I will 110% be back.. have added bars and restaurants we visited
review: massage tickcold drink tickbeautiful sunset tickfriendly people tick place 3rd time visit will 110 back added bar restaurant visit

Content: The seminyak beach is a local beach not a private one, lacks basic cleanliness.The water is very dirty filled with plastic bottles and caps and other junk.Please visit private beaches adjoining the resorts instead.The water temperature was warm for December.
review: seminyak local private one lack basic cleanlinessthe water dirty fill plastic bottle cap junkplease visit private beach adjoin resort insteadthe water temperature warm december

Content: Wife loved it.                       Said would recommend a look! Got drinks etc brought to them. Would go back for a look, but cant control the weather
review: wife love say recommend look get drink etc bring go back look cant control weather

Content: After taking hotel transfer to beach we were disgusted with the amount of rubbish lying around.  Beach actually closed for swimming!  Unfortunately local people do not appreciate how they are destroying their beautiful island with their (mainly plastic bag) rubbish.
review: take hotel transfer disgust amount rubbish lie around actually close swim unfortunately local people appreciate destroy beautiful island mainly plastic bag rubbish

Content: Does not offer too much, though quite relaxing. At least definitely less litter here than at other beaches. Great for a big walk
review: offer much though quite relax least definitely less litter beach great big walk

Content: The beach is beautiful and very powerfyl. If you're a surfer then you are in the right country. The waves are big and strong.
review: beautiful powerfyl youre surfer right country wave big strong

Content: Not a kind of beach you’d go to enjoy during the day neither for tanning nor for walking, but it was nice to watch sunset from the bars nearby
review: kind youd go enjoy day neither tan walking nice watch sunset bar nearby

Content: Not sure whether due to a rare weather condition or not but the beach is very windy all day! The sand gets all over our face and eyes! Lucky my 3yo and I wear our sunnies so it helps us to see a bit clear.  We made sand castle but the beach is so dirty that we only spent 15-20mins there. There is no shower facility to clean up too. Not sure why this beach is popular but I guess not for little ones. Or maybe I chose the wrong area of the beach. Won't be coming back.
review: sure whether due rare weather condition windy day sand get face eye lucky 3yo wear sunnies help u see bit clear make sand castle dirty spent 1520mins shower facility clean sure popular guess little one maybe choose wrong area wont come back

Content: I have very fond memories of the place at night when my bf proposed to me there. Bali is beautiful, the people are nice and the beach adds a wonderful combination to it all.
review: fond memory place night bf propose bali beautiful people nice add wonderful combination

Content: Courtyard Marriott Seminyak provides excellent service to their Private Beach. There are wifi, towels, water even ice blocks. Friendly staff as always. We cannot fault anything. Great service as always.
review: courtyard marriott seminyak provide excellent service private wifi towel water even ice block friendly staff always fault anything great service always

Content: The beach was filthy due to recent heavy rains and rubbish washed up, we weren't their for the beach though as we went Nusa Dua to have a lovely day at a clean beach!
review: filthy due recent heavy rain rubbish wash werent though go nusa dua lovely day clean

Content: Clean beach. Not overly crowed except at sunset! Lots of surfing places to choose from. Unobstructed beach so you can run/walk all the way to Kuta beach. Lots of restaurants/bars offering places to sit for the sunset. Definite recommend.
review: clean overly crow except sunset lot surf place choose unobstructed runwalk way kuta lot restaurantsbars offer place sit sunset definite recommend

Content: Really dirty beach. My husband surfed here and said the waves were good but not so fun wadding out in plastic and rubbish. If you like beaches on your holiday do not go to this side of Bali in rainy season go East
review: really dirty husband surfed say wave good fun wad plastic rubbish beach holiday go side bali rainy season go east

Content: Seminyak Beach has a few nice little restaurants right on the beach. Even though it is a bit touristy...the food is good and the price value ratio is also good. Had some fantastic fresh red snapper for dinner and the atmosphere around the restaurants was quite chilled out! When the sunset is happening quite a lot people sit around, eat and drink something and are watching the sunset - not bad at all!
review: seminyak nice little restaurant right even though bit touristythe food good price value ratio good fantastic fresh red snapper dinner atmosphere around restaurant quite chill sunset happen quite lot people sit around eat drink something watching sunset bad

Content: Bali is a place known for surfing and so the tides are harsh for swimmers... so swimmers be careful... for the people and families who want to enjoy the holiday on the beach please take your rubbish with you as you can see many people like you left their rubbish there... When I say people like you I mean humans so do not get offended and try to keep a larger clean vision in life
review: bali place know surf tide harsh swimmer swimmer careful people family want enjoy holiday please take rubbish see many people leave rubbish say people mean human offend try keep large clean vision life

Content: Probably wouldnt travel to this beach if we did not stay in the area. But it was good, clean and had little hawkers compared to elsewhere. Good restaurants in the area and go anywhere to view an awesome sunset. Great for kids to, lots of shallows and sand.
review: probably wouldnt travel stay area good clean little hawker compare elsewhere good restaurant area go anywhere view awesome sunset great kid lot shallow sand

Content: Love Seminyak beach for its sunsets, long walks, bean bag restaurants and merchants selling their wares.
review: love seminyak sunset long walk bean bag restaurant merchant sell ware

Content: Fantastic huge clean beach with lots of sun beds everywhere ands loads of cool bars it's the best place on the island to watch the sun go down in paradise
review: fantastic huge clean lot sun bed everywhere ands loads cool bar best place island watch sun go paradise

Content: Seminyak Beach was probably beautiful once.  But not anymore.  An early morning walk will reveal the beach and waters edge completely...yes completely...covered in plastic trash debris.  The poor labourers from beachfront posh hotels and the odd restaurant try valiantly to rake up this rubbish before the punters arrive expecting clean sand.  It is thoroughly depressing. An environmental catastrophy.  The walk behind the beachside cafes stinks and is full of litter.  As always the Balinese people are friendly and upbeat but how long can we all go on pretending this place is anything other than a polluted and ruined once-was-paradise.
review: seminyak probably beautiful anymore early morning walk will reveal water edge completelyyes completelycovered plastic trash debris poor labourer beachfront posh hotel odd restaurant try valiantly rake rubbish punter arrive expect clean sand thoroughly depress environmental catastrophy walk behind beachside cafe stink full litter always balinese people friendly upbeat long go pretend place anything pollute ruin oncewasparadise

Content: The Beach is definitely much better than Kuta, it is a little less busy has a few shacks. Good beach to go sit in a shack and have a drink or two.
review: definitely much good kuta little less busy shack good go sit shack drink two

Content: Nice enough, soft sand, very strong current in water and big dumping waves. In my opinion I would say not safe for swimming, but OK to paddle if you're careful.
review: nice enough soft sand strong current water big dumping wave opinion say safe swimming ok paddle youre careful

Content: Not the nicest beach in Bali, but ok. Full of pricey flash beach clubs if that's your thing. Better to venture to the Bukit peninsula for nicer beaches and clearer water! Try balangan beach/ Sundays beach club/ uluwatu / Padang Padang...
review: nice bali ok full pricey flash club thats thing well venture bukit peninsula nicer beach clearer water try balangan sundays club uluwatu padang padang

Content: Reached here at dark so just got an ok view of the beach but enjoyed the dinner at the shack wit nice breeze and gud music also good food had fun wished had come in daylight.
review: reach dark get ok view enjoy dinner shack wit nice breeze gud music good food fun wish come daylight

Content: Coarse dark sand and lots of rips. Good for small children as the waves roll in a long way so they can jump the smaller waves close to shore. Downside is the constant harrassment from sellers who never stop trying. Don't pay more than $10 for a day bed and umbrella, they often start bargaining at $30. Nice views.
review: coarse dark sand lot rip good small child wave roll long way jump small wave close shore downside constant harrassment seller never stop try dont pay 10 day bed umbrella often start bargain 30 nice view

Content: the ocean was great, waves not too rough, comfortable lounge chairs to hire at a vert cheap rate, 2 or 3 food and drink huts close by for refreashments
review: ocean great wave rough comfortable lounge chair hire vert cheap rate 2 3 food drink hut close refreashments

Content: This beach is ruined by the huge amount of rubbish on the shore. It makes it completely unappealing for swimming. This is something that needs to be addressed on a major scale. With no central rubbish collection, locals throw items into rivers and it ultimately washes up on Seminyak (and other) beaches. My view is probably marred by the pristine Australian beaches i'm used to, but I'd avoid this spot. it was really pretty gross.
review: ruin huge amount rubbish shore make completely unappealing swim something need address major scale central rubbish collection local throw item river ultimately wash seminyak beach view probably mar pristine australian beach im use id avoid spot really pretty gross

Content: This was actually my favourite beach in Bali (including Lombok and Gillis). It is wide and long, beautiful views. You can sunbath anywhere you fancy or hire a sun lounger for 100,000 for the full day. Lots of nice cafes and it is hive of activity in the evening with many many nice restaurants. Also worthy of note is that it is an excellent surfer beach, for beginners or professionals! The waves break quite far out giving you a really long surf back in.
review: actually favourite bali include lombok gillis wide long beautiful view sunbath anywhere fancy hire sun lounger 100000 full day lot nice cafes hive activity even many many nice restaurant worthy note excellent surfer beginner professionals wave break quite far give really long surf back

Content: We're from Perth so not quite the white sandy beaches we have at home still get gorgeous sunsets. Gets really busy with bikes and cars walking to the beach. Walking on the sand seemed safe enough only your feet do get pretty dirty. They clean the beach in the morning I think. Although we only ever went in the evening wasn't too bad aside from New Years Day night. I personally wouldn't swim there as I'm freaked out by the black sand and not being able to see the bottom, but there were quite a few swimmers and surfers. It's pretty cool to sit in one of the many bars on bean bags where you still get a great view without sitting right on the black sand.
review: perth quite white sandy beach home still gorgeous sunset get really busy bike car walk walk sand seem safe enough foot pretty dirty clean morning think although go even wasnt bad aside new year day night personally wouldnt swim im freak black sand able see bottom quite swimmer surfer pretty cool sit one many bar bean bag still great view without sit right black sand

Content: If you are looking for peace and tranquility, this is the place to be . Nice , calm , refreshing and relaxing , seminayak is the refined form of kuta which is noisy and crowded . Stay in seminayak if all you want is quite and calm . A completely different form of Bali and it's culture.lovely place to be . Just go for a stroll on the beach even if you are staying in kuta .
review: look peace tranquility place nice calm refresh relax seminayak refine form kuta noisy crowd stay seminayak want quite calm completely different form bali culturelovely place go stroll even stay kuta

Content: Great to relax on the beach :) beautiful spot to escape the madness of Bali traffic and enjoy a cocktail.
review: great relax beautiful spot escape madness bali traffic enjoy cocktail

Content: What a dirty beach not impressed at all .bars on the front seem ok but the beach is dirty and loads of rubbish  .hardly the bali i imagined
review: dirty impressed bar front seem ok dirty load rubbish hardly bali imagine

Content: Seminyak beach, although completely hounded by people trying to sell you items is a great place to watch the sunset. Pick any one of the amazing beach restaurants to sit it, get a beer and watch the sun go down

Content: Perfect for walks and relaxing. Just few steps from Courtyard Marriott hotel. Very happening place compare to other beaches in Bali.
review: perfect walk relax step courtyard marriott hotel happen place compare beach bali

Content: my husband and I are choose to stay at Seminyak for our honeymoon in Bali. What can I say is, Seminyak is a perfect location for those who want to stay at moderate area. Easy to find a Halal food for the muslim but if you can't find the Halal restaurant, just asked the local people because most of the Bali's local people are friendly and helpful.

Content: But maybe the worst place if you plan a swimming or snorkelling.At sunset, you can take a arcane photos
review: maybe bad place plan swim snorkellingat sunset take arcane photo

Content: Big waves, kind of crowded and lots of people wanting to sell you stuff. I'm not a surfer so I found it hard to appreciate the beach although I understand that surfers do. Wouldn't recommend it if you're not used to swimming with big waves and it's suitable for children.
review: big wave kind crowd lots people want sell stuff im surfer find hard appreciate although understand surfer wouldnt recommend youre use swim big wave suitable child

Content: Beach is great waves good for surfing, lounges cost 200,000 Rp per day $20Drinks available from vendors just don't have the ice.

Content: Please see review of Double Six Beach where essentially say beach is wide and great for walking yet feels a bit dirty with the occasional whiff of sewage. That said (!) it is a very nice walk past all the beach bars at sunset from Double Six right up to La Lucciola The W, Alila and all the great Beach bars around that part. Quite a social walking vibe at sunset
review: please see review double six essentially say wide great walking yet feels bit dirty occasional whiff sewage say nice walk past bar sunset double six right la lucciola w alila great bar around part quite social walk vibe sunset

Content: Pro :- Nice long beach.  Ocean view.  Pretty scenic.- Lots of restaurants and shops fronting the beach.Con :- It's a thrash heap during the rainy monsoon season (Dec/Jan) as the rain brings all the rubbish from the rivers to the beachside.... making it unsightly and smelly!
review: pro nice long ocean view pretty scenic lot restaurant shop front beachcon thrash heap rainy monsoon season decjan rain bring rubbish river beachside make unsightly smelly

Content: I recently stayed at the W Hotel on Seminyak Beach.  I'd researched prior to my visit, so knew this wasn't going to be a place of beauty in Bali.  The beach was fine, however the water was too rough to swim in.  There were a few people out surfing and a couple of locals in the sea further down the beach.  The litter wasn't too bad (I understand it's much worse during the Wet season).  If you're looking for a beautiful beach on the island of Bali, I suggest you go elsewhere.
review: recently stay w hotel seminyak id research prior visit know wasnt go place beauty bali fine water rough swim people surf couple local sea litter wasnt bad understand much bad wet season youre look beautiful island bali suggest go elsewhere

Content: Very disappointing sand is dark water is alot colder than i expected and water very average. Wouldn't bother coming here to swim..
review: disappointing sand dark water alot colder expect water average wouldnt bother come swim

Content: Had a few bintangs on the beach just over the road from Cocoon.Great live local entertainment at nights  but some of the bars have the music up loud to try and drown out the bar next doors music.Was a bit windy most nights but still pleasant. More for the younger age group who like sitting in beanbags, relaxing and enjoying the atmposphere.
review: bintangs road cocoongreat live local entertainment night bar music loud try drown bar next door musicwas bit windy night still pleasant young age group sit beanbag relax enjoy atmposphere

Content: A great beach for a long walk! Spoiled a little by litter is some places (and the odd broken bottle) but a great beach for walking, paddling or just sitting and sunbathing. Some places to try out surfing and overall the beach is reasonably quiet

Content: 4.30pm just perfect, u have 1.5 hours to swim, playing with the sands and waves a little bit and watch sunset with ur fam.

Content: Great waves, huge pull out to sea though so you have to be really careful with younger children. Cheap rental of sun loungers and surf boards. One warning if you buy anything from one of the beach seller's do it from a fixed one (there's plenty of little stalls) other wise they will all not leave you alone, we felt quite harassed at one point and we just all got in the sea to hide lol!!

Content: Lots of choice on the beach for live music dinner and drinks. Great value for money.Every evening whilst there we would wonder down for the beautiful sunset to top off our busy days. Lots of choice for meals . Italian, asian and western cuisine.

Content: Beautiful, white-sand beach, clean, with great atmosphere especially at night with good restaurants and live music. Very romantic especially at night.

Content: This beach has a beautiful sunset advantage point, the colours of the sky is amazing that I couldn't stop taking pictures of it. It's very touristy and so many people on it, so if you're wanting a quiet beach go elsewhere.
review: beautiful sunset advantage point colour sky amaze couldnt stop taking picture touristy many people youre want quiet go elsewhere

Content: Didn’t stay long as we visited in the late morning and it was hot, hot, hot! The beach was clean though.
review: didnt stay long visit late morning hot hot hot clean though

Content: The beach was filthy and covered in rubbish. Stray dogs all over the place and lots of dog poop. The weather wasn't particularly good either but the overall cleanliness left a lot to be desired.
review: filthy cover rubbish stray dog place lot dog poop weather wasnt particularly good either overall cleanliness leave lot desire

Content: I loved staying at the Seminyak Beach area. The beach is clean, the shopping  is interesting & the pubs are very lively. The place has loads of resturants serving mostly all international cuisines.
review: love stay seminyak area clean shopping interest pub lively place loads resturants serve mostly international cuisine

Content: There are many restaurants and offer sofas at the beach , drink cocktail and watch the sunset with your beloved one.
review: many restaurant offer sofas drink cocktail watch sunset beloved one

Content: Nice big beach that isn't dirty and full of trash unlike Kuta beach. Can rent beach lounge chairs with umbrellas, and the kids had a great time playing in the water and sand. Worth the visit! chez gado gado restaurant right ther as a good dining option as well.
review: nice big isnt dirty full trash unlike kuta rent lounge chair umbrellas kid great time play water sand worth visit chez gado gado restaurant right ther good dining option well

Content: do not buy and drink the cocktails as the will make u very sick.Its Bali moonshine they use.. it smells like fuel They told me its made from coconuts... no its not.It can be dangerous if ur on medication.The restaurants also offer these cocktails.Stay away from them.
review: buy drink cocktail will make u sickits bali moonshine use smell fuel tell make coconut notit dangerous ur medicationthe restaurant offer cocktailsstay away

Content: It's a shame we didn't get enough time here. The beach has big waves and a nice sunset. You can laze here whole day. It will be good to have public toilets (you can pay a small fee to the warungs to do your business)
review: shame didnt enough time big wave nice sunset laze whole day will good public toilet pay small fee warungs business

Content: The water is beautiful and the views of the sunset are spectacular.  However, there is way too much garbage on the beach.  And way too many people trying to sell you scarves and jewelry and hats, and do not listen and leave you alone when you say NO.
review: water beautiful view sunset spectacular way much garbage way many people try sell scarf jewelry hat listen leave alone say

Content: Just walking with my new fliper itu was so clean and beautiful sunset , but you must keep clean also at there because , Local people at there is really love they beach
review: walk new flip itu clean beautiful sunset must keep clean local people really love

Content: Seminyak ended up being my favourite beach spot! Not so crowded as its southern neighbours!! Some fine restaurants and beach bars! And that's when we start to see some quality resorts!!

Content: Nice beach for learning surving and gòod for take the family walking to the beach..also many good beach reataurant sorrounding

Content: Great wide beach for strolling swimming or tanning. Dark sand with rough waters. Lots of action and will be an up and coming beach in Bali in the years to come. Invest in it now before it grows!
review: great wide stroll swim tan dark sand rough water lot action will come bali year come invest now grow

Content: This is a much better beach than Kuta Beach. Its much cleaner and bigger. Loads of lounge chairs and surf boards for rent. The beach sand is quite dark compared to Thai beaches. As for the waves, i'm not brave enough to go near them.
review: much good kuta much clean big load lounge chair surf board rent sand quite dark compare thai beach wave im brave enough go near

Content: My friend and I got a sun-bed for 200k Indonesian Rupees for the whole day - that's 100k each, we tried other beaches around the area and the prices asked were about the same; you can, if you're up to, bargain the prices a little bit though. The guy, who lent us the sunbeds took great care of our things too - the one time our shoes were washed away by a wave, so he secure them for us, etc. The beach is amazing to have a sundowner drink, the bars/restaurants will let you then sit on a beanbag at the beach with some fancy small umbrellas - super cute.
review: friend get sunbed 200k indonesian rupee whole day thats 100k tried beach around area price ask youre bargain price little bit though guy lent u sunbeds take great care thing one time shoe wash away wave secure u etc amaze sundowner drink barsrestaurants will let sit beanbag fancy small umbrella super cute

Content: Great at night time bands playing , bean bags to sit on listen to music , the quieter one is the coffee lounge sign on it I think it's capil beach restaurant our favourite on Tuesday Wednesday  , they all offer music and dinner it's nice to eat on the beach , move around to different ones see which one you like but great at night time
review: great night time band play bean bag sit listen music quieter one coffee lounge sign think capil restaurant favourite tuesday wednesday offer music dinner nice eat move around different one see one great night time

Content: Seminyak's vibe is hipper and cooler than Legian, and in particular, Kuta. It's very chilled and relaxed. The beach clubs are all pretty good, if not a bit same-same. The beach is lovely but the sand is darker than expected. Sunsets are amazing.
review: seminyaks vibe hip cooler legian particular kuta chill relaxed club pretty good bit samesame lovely sand darker expect sunset amaze

Content: Beautiful and clean beach. Good place for surf . Lots of bars good beer and cocktails vibrant beach umbrellas.
review: beautiful clean good place surf lot bar good beer cocktail vibrant umbrella

Content: This is a great beach for walking and jogging for it has sturdy sand and it has a lot of space! The small waves don’t seem good for swimming but ok for just having a dip in the water when you get too hot. Many nice shells to pick and many Beach chairs to pay for, restaurants and amazing sunsets!!
review: great walk jog sturdy sand lot space small wave dont seem good swimming ok dip water hot many nice shell pick many chair pay restaurant amaze sunset

Content: Seminyak has become the upmarket area of Bali ... The beach is lovely and the sunsets are amazing. Take a stroll and stop at The W for a couple of drinks and a swim in the pool.
review: seminyak become upmarket area bali lovely sunsets amazing take stroll stop w couple drink swim pool

Content: Do not go to Bali beach expecting Golden Sands. Seminyak Beach is no exception, the beach is clean and the water warn, surf is ok but that's where it ends. Vendors  set up beach beds and hawk them for 100,000ir for 2 . Then once you are settled the hawker approach aggressively selling anything from beer to kites, surfing lessons to towel hire. Our choice was to use the resort pool where we were staying . Far more comfortable and hassle free. If you are not staying at a resort with a pool ,use the beach but be prepared for the price you must pay for being a TARGET TOURIST

Content: Seminyak beach is very picturesque.  Long expanse of white sand, dotted with beach clubs, restaurants and hawkers selling their wares.  You can sit in bean bag chairs with a Bintang and watch the sunset.  There was one man selling black Pirate Ship kites that looked amazing floating over the ocean.  The waves are very strong, I just walked into the water a little way and the pull from the waves nearly had me off my feet.  The water is a great temperature.

Content: I have been coming to Bali on Business for years and one of the trip's highlights is the blissful moments where I can walk the Seminyak beach! Although the sand is not white but more volcanic black it is not as black as other beaches in Bali.  I enjoy the short motor bike ride to the beach where I park it. I then walk for about 45 minutes towards Batu Belig Beach where I dine at Warung Pantai, a superb and very reasonably priced beach restaurant. I enjoy the sunset there, usually order grilled Mahi Mahi with Salad and steamed rice or vegetables spring rolls, fresh squeezed lime juice, have a great cup of Bali Coffee before heading back by night towards Legian beach. At night there are very few people on the beach, it is cool and all the night lights of all the beach venues are so pretty.  The authorities/ residents have really cleaned up the beach a lot and this year I witnessed very little litter in spite of the fact that by day there are people in abundance. Walking the beach at different times you will see the hoards of sunbathers by day, resident expats walking their dogs, children playing, oldies walking, local balinese with their families, people making offerings, people doing yoga, brides and grooms having photo shoots on horseback or in the waves....you will see so much as you walk this beach.  Depending on the time of the day the sea will also have a different beauty...sometimes calm & blue, in the evening navy blue with golden  reflections of the sunset, all the spray of the rolling waves catching the beautiful sundown rays.
review: come bali business year one trip highlight blissful moment walk seminyak although sand white volcanic black black beach bali enjoy short motor bike ride park walk 45 minute towards batu belig dine warung pantai superb reasonably price restaurant enjoy sunset usually order grill mahi mahi salad steam rice vegetable spring roll fresh squeeze lime juice great cup bali coffee head back night towards legian night people cool night light venue pretty authority resident really clean lot year witness little litter spite fact day people abundance walk different time will see hoard sunbather day resident expat walk dog child play oldie walk local balinese family people make offering people yoga bride groom photo shoot horseback wavesyou will see much walk depending time day sea will different beautysometimes calm blue even navy blue golden reflection sunset spray roll wave catch beautiful sundown ray

They can be quite intrusive if you are trying to have a conversation.If the clouds are right, the sunsets on this beach are not to be missed, cameras at the ready, you will get some great shots here.

Content: You have to visit Seminyak forget Kuta that has just gone downhill. Seminyak is the place to stay, go to Double Six beach, meet Judi, Lollipop, Ina, Tina, Jennifer, Eric, Milky, Martin and the rest of the sellers and beer boys.  Best place in the world to buy a beer and sit in comfort and watch the world go buy.  Buy your souvenirs or get your nails done even have a massage I can personally guarantee you will get a better deal and treatment from these people than any of the shops, markets or spas that you attend.  We did.  There are so many warangs to get cheap meals, it is cheaper to stay here than any place in Kuta or Legian. Kura-Kura buses run regularly and travel all over the main parts of Bali. I simply can go on and on but go and find out yourself.

Content: Oh Seminyak, your streets in general were so well maintained but the public beach strip was a disgrace. I know that we were there in rainy season and the sea throws up more garbage than usual, but watching the tourist hordes also treat the beach like a dumping ground and only a few bars/hotels making an effort to clean up was extremely disappointing. I've lived and worked in Asia in similarly touristy destinations and this is the worst I've seen in a long time. Friends staying further along the coast had an entirely different experience so that's reassuring but we didn't even swim in the sea because of this. Bali, you are a beautiful island with beautiful people, culture and food. Please don't forget the beaches (and kick the butts of tourist litter louts!).

Content: As lovely as the weather was in Bali last week, the one thing I just could not stay silent about is how dirty the beach was. There were rubbish that formed a tide line here on Seminyak, and also along Kuta. It was such an eye sore. And worse, true to its name, there were oil slicks coming in with the waves. Seminyak in bahasa means "one oil". I guess Bali really didnt want to disappoint. If you want the beach, go elsewhere. Heard Sanur is far better...or even Nusa Dua....or anywhere else, but...But if you dont want the beach, then why even go to Bali? I just had the misfortune of not doing enough research about the island. Probably deluded by the many glorified romantic tales - blame eat pray love for that! But if you seek to just chill and unwind, then, this island is ideal. And this part of Kuta (contrary to popular belief, Seminyak, Legian and Kuta is in reality ONE area) is the quieter portion. Food wise? For Asians, it's not really value for money at all. Drinks are rather pricey too. Shopping for the ladies? Sure...Bangkok's cheaper. Heck, even KL is far cheaper. Nightlife? In Seminyak? They only have 2 options, apart from dinner. One is the high end restaurants-turn-club-after-dinner, the other...well, if you dont swing the other way, and do not like diva shows, then hail a cab and hit Jalan Legian, Kuta instead.But the one thing I enjoyed Seminyak for was the hospitality at the hotel and restaurants I went to. But probably an advantage that I can speak Indonesian.
review: lovely weather bali last week one thing stay silent dirty rubbish form tide line seminyak along kuta eye sore bad true name oil slick come wave seminyak bahasa mean one oil guess bali really didnt want disappoint want go elsewhere heard sanur far betteror even nusa duaor anywhere butbut dont want even go bali misfortune enough research island probably delude many glorified romantic tale blame eat pray love seek chill unwind island ideal part kuta contrary popular belief seminyak legian kuta reality one area quieter portion food wise asian really value money drink rather pricey shop lady surebangkoks cheap heck even kl far cheap nightlife seminyak 2 option apart dinner one high end restaurantsturnclubafterdinner otherwell dont swing way diva show hail cab hit jalan legian kuta insteadbut one thing enjoy seminyak hospitality hotel restaurant go probably advantage speak indonesian

It is so nice to see the kaleidoscope of color, the sky merging with the ocean as the shore reflects the colors of the sunset when the water rushes back to the sea...a respite from the crowd of tourists in Bali.

Content: Black sand that sticks to your feet. The amount of plastic and rubbish washed up on the beach is absolutely horrendous and upsetting. I cleared rubbish up on numerous occasions.  They should employ people to clean the beach often to keep it clean. The sea is too rough to swim in but ideal for surfers. Has the most amazing sunset and is very popular for that.

Content: After seeing only underwhelming Sanur Beach previously, Seminyak Beach represents its polar opposite. The sunsets are fabulous and there are many entry points to this beautiful beach with fine sand; it's like I told my traveling partner: this place is like a "poor man's Maldives."  This area will be my primary beach area if and when I return to Bali

Content: Great fun to be had with the sellers on the beach. Sun shinning everyone happy. Can't wait to return one day. Fab atmosphere on this beach. Not to busy during the day but comes alive at sunset.We walked along the beach to Kuta we didnt like it there way way to busy stick to semyniak
review: great fun seller sun shin everyone happy cant wait return one day fab atmosphere busy day come alive sunsetwe walk along kuta didnt way way busy stick semyniak

Content: It is a great place to visit. White hot sandy beach all round. Very busy place, Lots of restaurants and plenty to do or just relax on the beach.

Content: Seminyak beach has 'black' sand and average water clarity. During the day it's all about relaxing, having a coupe of beers and reading a book. If you want a chair and some shade you have to pay around $10-20 per couple. I would recommend heading there in the evening to watch the sunset, have a cocktail and listen to some live acoustic music at one of the many restaurants which supply bean bags and cute colourful shades.

The waves are very high, not able to swim either. Black sand not a problem if the beach is clean. I would say Nusa Dua beach more beautiful, cleanest and quiet than Seminyak beach.

Content: The last time that we visited was in 2009....fast forward to 2018 and the place has been cleaned up away from the beach. The restaurants and the shopping areas are not modern and a lot cleaner. The shop keepers do not pester you to purchase, if you want to look and buy then you are able to do so in peace. The beach itself we visited and there was a lot of rubbish on the beach. Given that it was just after New Years Eve this may have be part of the reason. I will be back in the future for sure.

Content: This beach can have a lot of litter washed up each morning, but it is cleaned each morning. Lots of people walk this beach each morning for exercise. This is easy to do especially when the tide is out. Good for swimming and surfing , but look out for the strong current when the waves wash back out

Content: Good clean beach with good surf on the doorstep of Seminyak. Tasty bars and cafe which supply beanbags if you buy a drink or food. Hawkers are good natured and no too aggressive ( just be polite, they're trying to make a living too) easy to hire surf or bogey boards and rips are ok. Clean water unlike Kuta.

Content: If you can't swim, be stay somewhere close to where people do sunbathing. The sometimes waves can go very long distance within few second. Extra careful if you are with camera and phone.

Content: Seminyak beach has more restaurants along the beach. We hv made right choice to stay at seminyak. Quiet and nice place

Content: Seminyak beach is a really long stretch of dark sand, so don't expect the postcard white sands.... It is a lovely place to visit, however, even without the white sands. Head to the part further south in the direction of legian (but try to avoid legian itself if you can) near to the royal beach resort.. Then hire a beach bed for around 15000 and relax- the day we went there were plenty of interesting people heading back and forth along the front but it wasn't busy, just right... In the evening there are pleasant enough bars set on the front if you fancy that too.
review: seminyak really long stretch dark sand dont expect postcard white sand lovely place visit even without white sand head part south direction legian try avoid legian near royal resort hire bed around 15000 relax day go plenty interesting people head back forth along front wasnt busy right even pleasant enough bar set front fancy

Content: Good because is a good area to stay in hotels ., but it has many bars and restaurants so, many people ... not clean enough but ok.
review: good good area stay hotel many bar restaurant many people clean enough ok

Content: Beautiful beach with white sand but heavy waves - recommendable for surfers, but not for children and families.

Content: Very nice place.....not too much crowdy..lot of restos..cafes on the beach..relaxing area. Enjoy surfing practice...

Content: Went for a walk along the beach at Seminyak for about 45 minutes and we were saddened to see the amount of rubbish washed up on the shoreline. Considering the beaches on Bali are the main attraction, I believe that a lot more should be done to clean them up and keep them clean. There were literally thousands of plastic bags, drinking straws, cigarette lighters and innumerable other items that just should not belong on a beach.One can only be saddened to think of what this rubbish, particularly the plastic bags, is doing to the sea life.Please Bali - Clean up your act!
review: go walk along seminyak 45 minute sadden see amount rubbish wash shoreline consider beach bali main attraction believe lot do clean keep clean literally thousand plastic bag drink straws cigarette lighter innumerable item belong beachone sadden think rubbish particularly plastic bag sea lifeplease bali clean act

Content: For one of Bali’s main beaches this is disappointing. Whereas some effort has been made to tidy it up particularly in front of the nicer hotels many people are taking their dogs for a walk and making no effort to big up their poo from the sand so not a pleasant walking experience. Also still many strays despite efforts to collar some of them. There are also a few streams emanating from the town that run across the beach with foul smelling water to paddle through. Not many people sunbathing in it which probably sums it up.

Content: Seminyak Beach, jalan Raya Seminyak, 24 hours. Seminyak Beach is a beautiful white sandy beach situated in north of Legian Beach. The white sand stretch 3 km from Tuban Area has made it as a fascination for tourist to visit this place. Seminyak Beach is favored by the great wave that is ideally for surfing adventures hence many surfers visit this beach to conquer the waves and enjoy the surf adventures. This beach is also featured by beautiful panorama to the Indian Ocean, the wide white sand, complete public facilities, the word class hotels, international restaurant and more.

Content: I arrived on 27/12 and this was my first trip to Bali. The beach was filled with rubbish, which I learnt soon enough happens every year in Seminyak. The sand was the colour of dirt - not very enticing to lay a towel on! It was a shame that the hotel I stayed in employed guys to "clean up" the rubbish, but this literaly involved pushing the stuff further up the beach, either out of view of the hotel guests, or just far enough so that when the tide came in, it took the rubbish back out into the sea! Really disappointing that this hasn't been dealt with considering it happens every year.

Content: My wife and I really enjoy Seminyak Beach. We surf using surfboards, body boards, the property of The Legian Bali Hotel where we stay, and plain surfing and swimming.  When the tide goes out the beach is fantastic for long walks on firmer sand. The ladies who sell beads and sarongs to keep their families housed and fed are all pleasant and beautifully mannered. Kikki, Rosy and Sally also provide massages on the beach, manicures, pedicures to a high standard which we take advantage of to add to the attraction of the beach. They treat us so well we return to the magnificent  The Legian Hotel Bali as often as we can. The really good fun is once every stay I get into a bartering discussion buying goods from them. At the conclusion I pay the agreed price and give them back the goods and tell them to sell them to someone else. Their well being is much more important to my wife and I than the goods or the money. They are lovely ladies in happy marriages with a strong sense of family. They add value to the beach in the area that is accessed by the public whether they are visiting the beach or staying at a hotel along the beach. I never cease to be amazed at how these ladies and their children speak perfect English and are so inquisitive about our 5 children, their spouses and our 13 grandchildren. It all adds to the beach that is regularly cleaned and well policed. We will return soon.
review: wife really enjoy seminyak surf use surfboard body board property legian bali hotel stay plain surf swim tide go fantastic long walks firm sand lady sell bead sarong keep family house fed pleasant beautifully mannered kikki rosy sally provide massage manicure pedicure high standard take advantage add attraction treat u well return magnificent legian hotel bali often really good fun every stay barter discussion buy good conclusion pay agree price give back good tell sell someone well much important wife good money lovely ladies happy marriage strong sense family add value area access public whether visit stay hotel along never cease amazed lady child speak perfect english inquisitive 5 child spouses 13 grandchild add regularly clean well police will return soon

review: surf amaze beachapart dirty heavy rain rubbish java get wash onto even plastic bag wrap around leg sea bar good woman seller persistent irritate try relax

Content: I consider myself a bit of an expert on nice beaches.  Seminyak is a great beach with nice sand.  It's a very wide beach, and when the tide is out it can be 200 meters or more wide.  There is no drop off, and the bottom is sandy.  Great for surfing, body surfing and swimming.  There are some rip currents when the surf is big, so pay attention to the flags.  You can also rent chairs with umbrellas if you don't want to lay in the sand.  Plenty of restaurants on the beach, and great for sunsets.  I'd give it 5 stars,but…  there is a definite problem with the amount of plastic garbage that washes up on the beach.  And here's my suggestion - the government should take a portion of the entry tax they collect and hire people to pick up the beach.  People work for very little in Bali.  Start on one end and just pick it up.  With tourism seemingly the main industry in Bali, I'm surprised they don't do a better job.  And the hawkers can become a bit much as well.  I mean, I don't really need a painting of an elephant or buddah.
review: consider bit expert nice beach seminyak great nice sand wide tide 200 meter wide drop bottom sandy great surf body surf swim rip current surf big pay attention flag rent chair umbrellas dont want lay sand plenty restaurant great sunset id give 5 starsbut definite problem amount plastic garbage wash heres suggestion government take portion entry tax collect hire people pick people work little bali start one end pick tourism seemingly main industry bali im surprise dont good job hawker become bit much well mean dont really need paint elephant buddah

review: go long walk run cant say crazy quite irritated want sit glass wine hawker constantly try sell ware plenty place sit enjoy meal drink

Content: Very crowded beach. Not like what we imagine. Views were blocked by sea of people and their ongoing activity..

Content: The beach was covered in rubbish & the water was brown.  The sand was very grainy, it's appearance was greyish & it smelt terrible.
review: cover rubbish water brown sand grainy appearance greyish smelt terrible

Content: Very disappointed in what is claimed to be a 'beach'. By Australian standards this beach doesn't even rate; ugly black brown sand, refuse constantly being raked up by locals, serious feeling of absolute filth. Vendors of sun lounges and umbrellas all distant cousins of Arthur Daly, but with a lot less tact. Slightest hint of rain and they tip you out their sun lounge to save them from getting wet, weird?Footpath or motorbike 'highway' broken up in many places and dangerous for pedestrians.....but what do you expect, after all it is Bali............stay by the pool in your hotel is safer and more hygienic..........
review: disappoint claim australian standard doesnt even rate ugly black brown sand refuse constantly rake local serious feel absolute filth vendor sun lounge umbrellas distant cousin arthur daly lot less tact slight hint rain tip sun lounge save get wet weirdfootpath motorbike highway break many place dangerous pedestriansbut expect balistay pool hotel safer hygienic

Content: Amazing beach. Level flat sea very dangerous due to heavy currents mini spots to swim and surf. High waves. Behind beach there is a big dump well back from beach but needs cleaning. Water quality is very good.
review: amaze level flat sea dangerous due heavy current mini spot swim surf high wave behind big dump well back need cleaning water quality good

Content: Not the cleanest beach around..............lots of plastic washed up every morning. Would not recommend swimming here
review: clean aroundlots plastic wash every morning recommend swimming

Content: We went when tides were mostly high so the red flag was up a lot. The sand is beautiful. Only some parts of the beach are badly littered.
review: go tide mostly high red flag lot sand beautiful part badly litter

Content: the beach was a short walk from our hotel. it is very clean and goes on for miles. the water is very pleasant and are able to swim and surf freely. there are plenty of beach umbrellas to hire so u can lazy around and enjoy the view
review: short walk hotel clean go mile water pleasant able swim surf freely plenty umbrella hire u lazy around enjoy view

Content: Didn't like the beach at all.the sand was black and the surf was rough..i will stick to the swimming pools..

Content: Staying at double six hotel has allowed us to use the beach daily for running and swimming which has been wonderful.The beach is clean without any rubbish in the oceanPerfect for swimming, the current is strong swimmers need to be aware of the undertow
review: stay double six hotel allow u use daily run swim wonderfulthe clean without rubbish oceanperfect swim current strong swimmer need aware undertow

Content: Nice beach with warm water and grey (not white) sand. Lots of tourists and locals enjoying the day and watching the sun set. Locals selling kites and necklaces with out too much hassle. It is not as good as white sand beaches of many countries but how can you complain when the water is warm and the sun is setting with a nice cooling breeze as the sun sets.
review: nice warm water grey white sand lot tourist local enjoy day watch sun set local sell kite necklace much hassle good white sand beach many country complain water warm sun set nice cool breeze sun set

Content: Lovely beach which is clean and well-maintained. Great vibe at the bars/hotels on the edge of the beach. Sunsets are stunning! Watch out in the hotels ... drinks are pricey!
review: lovely clean wellmaintained great vibe barshotels edge sunset stun watch hotel drink pricey

Content: We ventured down the road to Seminyak beach today and it was lovely. We got there via Ku De Ta (you can park up on the side of the road and walk through) and there were plenty of sun loungers available to rent, people who own them were more than happy to move them into the sun for us. You do have lots of people strolling the beach to sell bits and pieces but they will leave you alone after a smile and a no thank you. Lots of surfing going on but not much swimming due to the big waves. I only went in up to my waist before the tide felt too strong and the waves were crashing around me and didn't feel comfortable going out any further. Lovely clean beach, very friendly people just a shame we couldn't go for a proper swim in the sea but there are plenty more beaches to choose from for that in Bali!
review: venture road seminyak today lovely get via ku de ta park side road walk plenty sun lounger available rent people happy move sun u lots people stroll sell bit piece will leave alone smile thank lot surf go much swimming due big wave go waist tide felt strong wave crash around didnt feel comfortable go lovely clean friendly people shame couldnt go proper swim sea plenty beach choose bali

Content: Great location and always fun to be at but this time the rubbish washed onshore was so bad it rendered the beach as unusable. Still, we'll be back!
review: great location always fun time rubbish wash onshore bad render unusable still well back

Content: Fruit, drinks, pedicures, manicures, hair braiding, relaxing, shopping, reading, sleeping, in the shade, in the sun.... Etc.Wonderful!
review: fruit drink pedicure manicure hair braid relax shop read sleep shade sun etcwonderful

Content: Seminyak Beach is much quieter than the famous Kuta Beach, a couple of cafes here n there. But there’s not much peddles plying n trying to sell you to buy their items. They are very calm n if you say “No thanks” they will walk away.n leave you to enjoy the view n relax.
review: seminyak much quieter famous kuta couple cafe n there much peddles ply n try sell buy item calm n say thanks will walk awayn leave enjoy view n relax

Content: It is a nice beach.The boys had some surf lessons and they did enjoy the time and the waterIt's not the last time we will go there if we are in the area.
review: nice beachthe boy surf lesson enjoy time waterits last time will go area

Content: As usual there were numerous dogs defacating on the beach. It's strewn with rubbish and there is a large drain flowing with poluted water.Don't let the photos cool you.
review: usual numerous dog defacating strewn rubbish large drain flow poluted waterdont let photo cool

Content: Dirty beachGuys get the authorities to start the cleaning process Ugly dorky beach ! Not for sun loungers Many restaurants and each clubs located on it
review: dirty beachguys authority start clean process ugly dorky sun lounger many restaurant club locate

Content: Walk over night on this beach so peaceful l. We can enjoy the wave and wind come from the see. Really good beach for relax time !
review: walk night peaceful l enjoy wave wind come see really good relax time

Content: While it may not be the best beach around it was certainly a fantastic experience to sit on a bean bag chair, sipping a cool bintang and watching the sunset over the ocean.
review: may best around certainly fantastic experience sit bean bag chair sip cool bintang watch sunset ocean

Content: The surf here was good and safe for body boarding. The beach was clean and you could rent sun loungers off the local people for a reasonable price. They also rent boards and you buy extremely cheap beer from them. There are lots of sellers of sarongs, hats, watches etc, but most of them were not pushy!
review: surf good safe body board clean rent sun lounger local people reasonable price rent board buy extremely cheap beer lot seller sarong hat watch etc pushy

Content: Seminyak beach is a great place ti spend an evening with friends relaxing on a bean bag sipping drinks, having a nibble and chatting with friends. Great atmephere to just sit back and chill. Music can be loud. Pick your favourite bar and sit back. Enjoy a sunset if there's no cloud. We missed out. 2 weeks of cloud cover. Day time take a swim but expect debri on beach coming in with the tides. Water is warm. Dont expect white sandy beaches as it is dark grey volcanic sand.
review: seminyak great place ti spend even friend relax bean bag sip drink nibble chat friend great atmephere sit back chill music loud pick favourite bar sit back enjoy sunset there cloud miss 2 week cloud cover day time take swim expect debri come tide water warm dont expect white sandy beach dark grey volcanic sand

Content: I have to concur with some of the others who have reviewed this beach, in particular Leylandbros who reviewed only yesterday. I walked from my hotel this afternoon looking forward to a nice walk on the beach following a lovely few days in Ubud. My initial impression was ugh, but I  proceeded to walk hoping things would get better. In the end my partner and I were so disgusted by the amount of rubbish on the sand that we had to leave, vowing never to set foot on this beach again. I was horrified by the beaches of Sihanoukville but this is the Wes Craven version of horror! :-(
review: concur others review particular leylandbros review yesterday walk hotel afternoon look forward nice walk follow lovely day ubud initial impression ugh proceeded walk hop thing well end partner disgusted amount rubbish sand leave vow never set foot horrify beach sihanoukville wes craven version horror

Content: Great beach at sunset, or any time of the day. There is some litter but they are trying to sort the issue. The biggest issue for us was the shear quantity of hawkers. At one stage whilst trying to see the sunset we had 3 bothering us and whilst they aren't threatening they are persistent.There were signs warning about rips so we didn't swim but it isn't really a swimming beach as there are big waves.
review: great sunset time day litter try sort issue big issue u shear quantity hawker one stage whilst try see sunset 3 bother u whilst arent threaten persistentthere sign warn rip didnt swim isnt really swim big wave

Content: The beach was okay. Stays shallow for awhile but has a big break , so not good for swimming. It was also very dirty in the water and beach. Farther up “north” of Seminyak beach google pin is the only section we saw that wasn’t dirty or littered. Farther down towards Kuta was so cluttered with litter it wasn’t even enjoyable to walk on the beach. Also a pretty windy beach. Definitely not a picture perfect “Bali” beach , but enjoyable and you can have a great beach day if you make the most of it.
review: okay stay shallow awhile big break good swimming dirty water far north seminyak google pin section saw wasnt dirty litter far towards kuta clutter litter wasnt even enjoyable walk pretty windy definitely picture perfect bali enjoyable great day make

Content: Lovely long beach with white sand huge waves. Strong current at times. Lots of restaurants for lunch and dinners and absolutely amazing in the evening with after-beach cushions and lanterns. SO romantic.Beach chairs with umbrella is exensive. 300 000 ruphies for a day for 2 beds. However, sunbeds are super luxury so really a treat but if you plan to go to the beach everyday it adds up. Especially if you are a big family. WIndy.
review: lovely long white sand huge wave strong current time lots restaurant lunch dinner absolutely amaze even afterbeach cushion lanterns romanticbeach chair umbrella exensive 300 000 ruphies day 2 bed sunbeds super luxury really treat plan go everyday add especially big family windy

Content: Our first visit to Bali and our first outing/sightseeing/exploring adventure started along Seminyak beach. Excellent intruduction to what could be expected of the rest of the islands very busy and touristy beach areas. Holiday vibe came through very strong. Many nice pubs and restaurants along the promonade walk. We walked for what felt like hours and never got bored or felt unintertained. You can rent a surf board just about everywhere, endless watersport possibilities etc etc etc. And then of course the sun-set, when hundreds and hundreds of people descend onto the beach. Great party vibe, sundowners and good music of any flavour. A must experience
review: first visit bali first outingsightseeingexploring adventure start along seminyak excellent intruduction expect rest island busy touristy area holiday vibe come strong many nice pub restaurant along promonade walk walk felt hour never get bore felt unintertained rent surf board everywhere endless watersport possibility etc etc etc course sunset hundred hundred people descend onto great party vibe sundowner good music flavour must experience

Content: quite beach than kuta beach, good for relaxing and swimming, enjoying sunset with afternoon drink, good time in afternoon and got fantastic moments with couple, friends or family.
review: quite kuta good relax swim enjoy sunset afternoon drink good time afternoon get fantastic moment couple friend family

Content: All the rubbish being washed up on the shore. There were cleaners but still very dirty. Don't dare to go into the sea, just got some tanning. Worse part was the oily water.

Content: By far this is one of the good spot at Bali to hang out around the beach. However the wave could be strong some time, that's why you should put attention on how strong the current at that day...

Content: This oZZie (Australian)  Outback themed  Pub  is totally complete with original Aussie outback  relics and even a crocodile on the front entrance to geet you and get your holiday pics with him... Dinki Die Aussie foods , International & Indonesian meals to satisfy tourists or locals visiting  plus  Icy Cold beer thirst quenching  and large range of Cocktails and spirits for the after 5 pm set.....Be entertained with GREAT Live Music nightly  but Sunday.  Aussies can enjoy their  latest Sports  high definition TV....

Content: Love the soft sands and calming sea! We went to the beach around the evening so it is great to look at. At night, there are a lot of restaurants that will set up chairs and table at the beach. You get to listen to the sound of the waves as you dine. A great experience indeed! however, you have to plan your route around tot he beach. The first time when we arrived, we were not clear of how to go and ended up arriving after the sun sets. We went there for a second time to catch the sunset. A tip, plan and ask clearly on how to go!
review: love soft sand calm sea go around even great look night lot restaurant will set chair table listen sound wave dine great experience indeed plan route around tot first time arrive clear go end arrive sun set go second time catch sunset tip plan ask clearly go

Content: Being Australian and spoiled by our pristine beaches, I still enjoyed an early morning run and/or an afternoon stroll on Seminyak Beach, which was only a short walk from where I was staying. In the evening there was plenty of atmospheric lounging on the beach where you could wine and dine on the many bean bags and listen to great chill out tunes.
review: australian spoil pristine beach still enjoy early morning run andor afternoon stroll seminyak short walk stay even plenty atmospheric lounge wine dine many bean bag listen great chill tune

Content: Sunset in beautiful Seminyak never disappoint. This is my 16th Bali trip and always love looking across the ocean and watching the sunset
review: sunset beautiful seminyak never disappoint 16th bali trip always love look across ocean watching sunset

Content: A very very large beautiful beach, there are busier bits or quiet bits, very peaceful with big slashing waves, great if your a surfer. Water is warm, just overall beautiful.
review: large beautiful busier bit quiet bit peaceful big slashing wave great surfer water warm overall beautiful

Content: Such a striking difference from the other beaches.  Seminyak beach has a classier atmosphere, so much space, and it doesn't have the haggling vendors at Kuta beach.  The price to lounge, for food and drinks is much more here but you get what you pay for.
review: strike difference beach seminyak classy atmosphere much space doesnt haggle vendor kuta price lounge food drink much pay

Content: Great views but pit about the volcanic soil making the beach black and the pollution. I will not swim in the water.

Content: Great place to sit with a beer and watch the sun setting over the Java sea. The sea is great for surfers here and is so lovely and warm
review: great place sit beer watch sun set java sea sea great surfer lovely warm

Content: We enjoyed the view of Seminyak beach from the Legian hotel.Pros - warm water, not to many hawkers, sand dark but not black sand as we know it, felt safeCons - rubbish on the beach, some stray dogs which were easily avoided, streams flowing to sea across beach smelly, surf too rough when we were there to swimLooked fantastic from the hotel pool but wasn't a swimming option for us.

Content: Seminyak beach is one of my favorite beach, it's near my fav beach front cafe like la plancha and the champlung, my friends and me enjoy every sunset over there with the bottle of beers, so come and try the beach ✌😎🌊🌅
review: seminyak one favorite near fav front cafe la plancha champlung friend enjoy every sunset bottle beer come try

Content: I spent two night in Seminyak close to the beach...If you are here you have to see sunset on the beach It’s really wonderful and you can see perfect

Content: The beach is nice but it is polluted. It is not the best place to swim. The waves are very strong. There are some parts where sea pulls you into the ocean. Please be careful and don't go far from beach. When you try to rest in the beach, many sellers try to sell things and never let you alone.
review: nice pollute best place swim wave strong part sea pull ocean please careful dont go far try rest many seller try sell thing never let alone

Content: We found this beach to be one of the nicest during our time in Bali.Its not as hectic as the others but yet still boasting lots of local character, the bars are rather more upmarket but yet you can still find the odd local hideaway thats well worth the find so its a lovely blend of local to luxurious.The good thing we loved was that your not as bothered by all the beach sellers as you are on other beaches and also the sellers here are a lot more chilled.
review: find one nice time baliits hectic others yet still boast lot local character bar rather upmarket yet still find odd local hideaway thats well worth find lovely blend local luxuriousthe good thing love bothered seller beach seller lot chill

Content: My first impression of Seminyak beach was simply: "wow".We went on a day that would be classified as an overcast but yet the beach was filled with people. Luckily the beach stretched on for miles on either side so there was plenty of room for everyone. I did not rent a lounger as I only planned on staying for a couple of hours but upon talking to the locals they were very friendly and the rates were reasonable to rent loungers.The sand on this beach is like no other, it is so soft yet sticks to your skin like paste. The beach was very clean and the water very refreshing. It was fun to watch surfers try to catch a wave.
review: first impression seminyak simply wowwe go day classify overcast yet fill people luckily stretch mile either side plenty room everyone rent lounger plan stay couple hour upon talk local friendly rate reasonable rent loungersthe sand soft yet stick skin paste clean water refresh fun watch surfer try catch wave

Content: It may not be as nice as some of the white beaches in the south of Bali and you will never be alone here, but for families this is a good beach to relax, with food, massages, drinks and everything you need at hand. There are no rocks in the water, just watch the current during outgoing tide.The surf is good for beginners, so a nice place to have a lesson. On good days the waves can be good even for more advanced surfers, but chances are you'll find more quality breaks further south or west...
review: may nice white beach south bali will never alone family good relax food massage drink everything need hand rock water watch current outgo tidethe surf good beginner nice place lesson good day wave good even advance surfer chance youll find quality break south west

Content: the restaurants was amazing on the beach with sand in your toes...   Had Christmas lunch there . stunning

Content: Seminyak beach has a very clean sand and easy access. The sunset is an amazing moment at this wonderful beach.

Content: This beach is very relaxing with deck chairs you can hire local girls with massage tables and locals selling their wares,Very safe beach and surf boards for hire along with drink

Content: I have been to much nicer beaches than this in Bali. It's not very clean, we didn't walk too far so it may be slightly nicer in other places - but certainly the part we were on wasn't nice at all. It's not very clean and smells like drains

If you want a beach holiday in Bali this is not a place to go. Will not return and will not recommend tourist to go

Clean and drug free.

Content: I used to visit the Seminyak beach especially the private beach of Marriott ... the beach is clean and so is the water ... something that cannot be said about its counterparts in Kuta ... it is not tio crowded unlike Kuta and Legian and has a classy feel to it ...
